name: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:.Scent Type:.Key Notes:.About:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Citronellol, Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Eugenol, Limonene, Citral......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: All fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body: apply 1-2 sprays at the pulse points of your body (wrists, neck), or in the creases of your knees and elbows for a stronger, more enduring scent. Reapply as needed...Primary packging currently not recyclable. Secondary packaging is 100% recyclable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful earthy, sweet and subtle fragrance. Been wearing it for a couple years now. I’ve tried others but I never get as many compliments as when I’m wearing this. People ask me what it is and I almost don’t want to tell because I don’t want to let the secret out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume...just not on me. Devastatingly cool girl fragrance - warm but a bit unapproachable. Beautifully green, like straight up walking through a forest with cedar and vetiver in the opening but also clean; with a soapy and lightly sweet and mildly musty dry down. Lots of comparisons to Santal 33 but this stands alone to me. Unisex but slightly femme leaning, warmer as well. I love this, but it's doesn't match my vibe, I almost exclusively reach for it on rainy fall days or when I want to cosplay as mysterious and unbothered.

reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorites of all time! It’s a light santal with a sweetness to it and it’s perfect year round with long staying power.

I am one of the very few that when I smell sandalwood I smell pickles so it does have a pickle smell to me as well so if you’re one of the ones that smell sand wood in that way, just forewarned, it may smell like pickles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This must be one of those fragrances with synthetic fragrance molecules that not everyone can smell genetically, but unfortunately this brand isn’t transparent about what notes are truly natural and what is synthetic(for example: is the sandalwood note actually sandalwood, or is it a lab-created molecule like javanol that mimics the scent of sandalwood). When I smell this the only thing I get is cucumbers, and not in a pleasant way. THATS IT. Borderline pickle. It smells like that to me no matter what or who I spray it on and it doesn’t change as it dries down. Meanwhile, I had my husband test it blind and he described it as “autumnal” and “smooth and woody and a little spicy”…. While I get CUCUMBERS

The weather is getting colder and this is perfect for the season. I love how it smells so fresh yet warm at the same time. If you are used to fruity/floral this is not for you so I can understand that. I think it’s not for everyone. Even after showering, the smell is still there. I just love it so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could return it. I redeemed this one with a voucher on accident from a sample kit. So this was my fault. The scent last forever even after I washed my clothing. Too bad I hate the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only reason I didn’t give this fragrance 5 stars is because I don’t think the scent is for me and I wish it lasted a bit longer. Due to the reason this review was collected as part of a promotion I was excited to go out on a limb and try something new, as the notes of this fragrance aren’t my typical selections. Sandalwood and spice are scents that I favor, however I tend to lend towards warm sweeter scents.   It has a very fresh sent that I would describe as clean and woodsy. I did receive many compliments while wearing this perfume. What worked best for my liking was layering with other of my favorite scents. I would recommend this if you are a clean type of gal/guy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Loui No. 04 Bois de Balincourt Parfum has a blend of cinnamon and earthly smells that are strong and noticeable with just one spray. The perfume is perfect for an everyday use as it is smooth and not strong. I followed the directions suggested on the package and did the spray on my wrist, neck and elbows. That allowed the product to last for hours and had me smelling good and receiving compliments at work! I would recommend this for others that enjoy a more earthy smell with a cinnamon hint!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am addicted to this perfume. It is truly beautiful. I love how feminine and luxurious this fragrance is. The packaging of the bottle is the peak for me! The packaging is minimal and chic. Next the fragrance is the next best part! The fragrance really has a beautiful blend of jasmine mixed with the ruby pamplemousse and mandarin that leaves almost a sharp yet floraly and spa. The rich in fragrance that also has a warm vanilla tone makes it perfect for summer nights! I received many compliments when wearing this fragrance for after work happy hour! I did reapply the scent mid shift as my skin tends to soak scents. A little goes along way. The smell itself is not to strong or sweet; it’s a light scent that sits on your skin all day making you feel fresh and light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume reminds me of how “Grandma’s house” smells. It's not modern, but reminds me of a specific smell from back in the day. This scent reminds me of summer camp. It reminds me of wood cabins or camping. I think it is a very nostalgic scent. It's definitely not what I was expecting at all. It smells like something grandpa would spray on for cologne. It reminds me of spending summer with my grandparents. This scent has a specific aesthetic about it. I don't hate it. This is a scent that feels best for layering! It's the kind of scent you use for a base note and pair with something flowery or maybe citrus to blend out. It is highly unique. With layering the scent you can create your own specific smell that I promise will be very specific to you. It takes some playing with to decide your perfect combo. For instance, I love when I pair it with vanilla scent. I also found successful with Marc Jacobs or Chanel number 5. When I paired it with the Channel number 5, I was surprised that the match actually reminded me of the it reminded me of the iconic scent “Dimonds are forever” by Elizabeth Taylor. Which made a very classy scent that I would wear formally. I had to play with it to decide what I prefered best. So, I would purchase with the intent to layer.

reviews.review_title: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is a great scent, woody and flora, I would say this scent can be worn as a masculine scent and feminine one. The bottle and packaging are classy and look great on a shelf. This #4 reminds me of Herve Leger from the late 90's that I wore all the time. I am new to reviewing scents. This is the second one I have reviewed for Maison Louis Marie. As an esthetician for the last 14 years I am trained to be be mindful and limiting of scents on my body and in my environment. I am also very sensitive to fragrances. Maison Louis Marie makes what I consider to be pure and clean fragrances. From pulp to bottle they strive to be sustainable in the way they produce and manufacture their fragrances. I have not experienced any headaches or nausea from their fragrances. I am happy to explore more from them and I encourage any and all to do the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a captivating and sophisticated fragrance that has quickly become a staple in my collection. From the moment | first applied it, l was enchanted by its sweet warm, woody aroma that exudes both elegance and comfort! The top notes offer a delightful blend of sandalwood and cedarwood, creating a rich and earthy foundation. It also has a subtle, smoky depth that is both alluring and refined. The base notes of amber wood provide a creamy, slightly sweet finish I’m obsessed with that lingers beautifully on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its so extremely spicely and cinnamonly that it will hurt your head. My husband told me that day as how the No 14 is the bestest perfume of yours and No 4 is the worst of all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Are youready to be swept away with notes of cinnamon, Sandalwood and cedarwood? This fragrance is well rounded with deep bottom notes of spicy cinnamon and nutmeg ( no we are not making a pie!).  Maison Lois No. 4 is unlike any other fragrance on the market. I personally align with their mission of planting trees for our planet, they do this as their organizations charitable contribution.  Not only do the folks at Maison Louis Marie help the planet, they have a beautiful family history that is most definitely worth delving into! We can start with the intentionally simple packaging. The white boxes are adorn with a seal that the product creators Grandfather created. Lovely. The company does not spend their money on packaging as they prefer to keep it simple and let the product organically speak for itself.   The scent is amazing,  lasts all day and is elevated in ways I can not describe when paired with their oil.  I have gotten so many compliments wearing these scents... and a few unwanted almost numbers LOL.   Buy this now!

reviews.review_title: I am absolutely taken with this fragrance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has been a long time since a perfume affected me the way this one does.    At first glance, the simple square bottle and unassuming label made me think of simple, clean, fresh.  But it is way more complex than that.    The top note of this perfume is sandalwood, which is calming and promotes focus and enhanced memory in aromatherapy.  The mid note of vetiver actually combines in this fragrance to almost a floral jasmine-like scent.  Vetiver is wonderful for relieving stress and anxiety.  The base note of amber wood has to be what draws me to this scent.  Amber wood also has calming effects and increases cognitive function as well as reducing inflamation due to the antioxidants it contains.  We all could use some grounding and calm in our lives, and this fragrance does it for me.  It reminds me of my visit to India with my father years ago.  We would walk the markets and the smell of sandalwood was everywhere. We brought home tiny sandalwood boxes that always took me back to that time.  LOUIS MARIE HOUSE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a refreshing escape from the sugary-sweet or intensely floral scents that seem to be the norm for women's fragrance.    This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second time trying something from Maison Louis Marie, and I have to say they make very wearable scents. No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is a lot less woodsy from what I anticipated it to be from the notes. It is something that I can wear year-round, since it isn't heavy, like I even wore it in humid 100 degree weather. Its an inoffensive slightly woody airy scent. Think of it as a scent that you can wear post shower during the day. Staying power is only three/ four hours for me though, wish it lasted longer. There is a slight sweetness at the very beginning that disappears quickly, so I can imagine this would layer well with a sweet vanilla scent. No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is a true unisex scent. I can see everyone enjoying this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie is a clean brand known for its luxurious fragrances with clean ingredients and ethically sourced materials. I was so happy to try no.04 Bois de Balincourt. The only way that I can describe this fragrance is by thinking about a luxurious hotel. I recently went on a trip and as soon as I entered Te Ritz the lobby smelled of Bous de Balincourt! To me this fragrance smells very earthy, clean and almost bitter. I don’t usually tend to go for sense like this so this isn’t something I gravitate towards. It does last very long time and the intensity lingers evenly throughout the day. Every time I smell this fragrance, I think of a woman who is sophisticated chic and has that clean girl aesthetic. This fragrance is perfect for year-round wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is very nice slick and beautiful. If you were looking for an elegant, unique and special smell, this, it is just white, nice, basic and classy as one meetieight￼ this is a very nice ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance enthusiast, I found MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt delightful over a month. Its warm blend of sandalwood, cedarwood, and cinnamon lasts impressively long. Subtle yet sophisticated, it’s perfect for daily wear. I rate it 5 out of 5 stars for its unique, enduring scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is absolutely beautiful. Each note of this fragrance comes through in its own way. You immediately smell the cedar and amber wood and when it dries down you get hints of nutmeg and cinnamon. It dries down sweet on my skin and I’ve gotten so many compliments. I absolutely adore this fragrance, it’s beautiful to wear alone and to layer with other parfumes. It reminds me of a childhood memory that brought tears to my eyes. It literally unlocked a memory.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello! As a beauty enthusiast, I love testing products and giving my honest opinion on how well these beauty items have worked for me. This is the second scent I have tried from Maison Louis Marie and upon learning about the scent, figured it was a more musky/masculine leaning scent. The No. 04 Scent Bois de Balincourt perfume smells quite woodsy on first scent, think cedarwood. The first scent is pretty strong, but as it wears throughout the day, it definitely smelled more earthy and a little bit more amber forward. I enjoyed how the scent developed throughout the day and really encourage people to wear it for a full day before forming an opinion on this product. It easily lasted 6+ hours on my skin and really is such a unique scent to add to my collection! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Elegant and Long-Lasting Fragrance with a Warm Sce
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using Maison Louis Marie EDP No.4 Bois de Balincourt for a few days now, and I'm really impressed with this fragrance. The scent is a perfect blend of sandalwood and cedarwood, with a hint of spicy cinnamon that adds warmth without being overpowering. It is ideal for both day and evening wear.  One of the things I love most about this perfume is its longevity. It lasts all day on my skin, and I often get compliments hours after I've applied it. The fragrance evolves beautifully, revealing its deeper, more complex notes.  The packaging is elegant and minimalist, which reflects the brand's overall aesthetic. The bottle looks chic on my vanity and is also convenient for travel. The only reason I'm not giving it a full 5 stars is that the initial scent can be a bit strong for some people. It takes a few minutes to settle into a more subtle fragrance.  Overall, Balincourt is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a high-quality fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a captivating fragrance that evokes a sense of sophisticated luxury. Opening with notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, it immediately sets a warm and inviting tone. The heart notes of vetiver and nutmeg add complexity and depth, blending seamlessly with the base of amberwood for a rich, earthy finish. What stands out most is its longevity and sillage, ensuring it lasts throughout the day without being overpowering. This fragrance is perfect for those who appreciate a refined yet subtly adventurous scent profile. Overall, Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a timeless choice that effortlessly combines elegance with a hint of mystery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing and lasts all day. It’s not overly sweet, but smells beautiful and gets a lot of compliments. This review was collected as a part of a promotion  T

reviews.review_title: the best of maison louis marie
reviews.review_text: As a licensed cosmetologist I have the pleasure to experience multiple brands scents. No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is truly unique in that they create a sensory experience with notes that transport you to feeling luscious and stunning. For me the notes of vanilla pair so well to feel warm and beautiful. I do think the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is very long lasting after only using two sprays I smelled the scent all day. I would wear this daily to have the power of feeling beautiful and full of life. When paying for a parfum you want a great scent and longevity and No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum offers this both perfectly. The branding is stunning and simple. The box is such a nice material but simple. The bottle does not offer any distracting elements as it is straight to the point. I received something in exchange for this post (free product, payment, sweeps entry)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie is a new brand to me but is doing things old school which I prefer because as the result a customer is left with a superb product that is very high quality and great attention to detail.  No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum comes in several different sizes in a glass container with clear juice inside. It has a micro sprayer and is pretty convenient to use since all you need is just a couple of shots.   No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum has several notes that I absolutely love which are sandalwood and cedar and the fragrance itself is really balanced. It is gender less and would wear beautifully on everybody.   I usually wear this fragrance by itself but sometimes I like to mix it in with either oud or vetiver oil to go deeper into the notes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Living within the earthyness of this scent. It makes me feel like I am in the forest on a camping trip. All these notes blend so well together. I noticed It last a very long time.  I forgot I had it on and I turn and get a whiff of the scent and Just fall in love again. When you apply it, it is an oil based parfum. Love that is gender neutral that my husband can wear it too, sniffing him all day. This scent can be worn day and night all year round.   *received complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion The first thing I would have to say about the Maison Louis Marie No.4 is definitely not for the younger or even mid aged people. The perfume is definitely meant for the older generation. By this I mean grandparents or elderly. It does have that bougie grandma vibes to it. Scent wise it is very strong. If you are easily prone to headaches I would not suggest this, but if you love people being able to smell you from a mile away, this scent is for you. The perfume wasn't sweet, floral or even fruity which is great for people who do not like sweet scented perfumes but like more mature elegant scents. The packaging though was a very minimalistic beautiful bottle that was easy to use as well. Overall, meant for older people who enjoy strong smelling perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, and I must say, it has made a significant impression on me. This fragrance offers a very clean scent profile with a little spiciness that sets it apart from many other perfumes. The spiciness is subtle yet distinctive, providing a sophisticated edge that makes it suitable for various occasions.  One of the most remarkable aspects of No.04 Bois de Balincourt is its longevity. This perfume lasts a long time, often carrying me through an entire day without needing to reapply. It's a testament to its quality and the careful crafting of its formula. For those who value durability in a fragrance, this one certainly delivers.  While I appreciate the overall aroma, I generally prefer scents that have a slightly sweeter note. No.04 Bois de Balincourt leans more towards a fresh and clean scent, which is wonderful in its own right but just a touch away from my ideal fragrance profile. Nevertheless, it has grown on me as a fantastic option for daily use.  The versatility of this perfume is another highlight. Its clean and refined scent makes it appropriate for both casual and professional settings. It's not overpowering, which means it can be worn comfortably in close quarters without overwhelming others, yet it has enough presence to be noticed and appreciated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a professional makeup artist and licensed facial specialist, I'm always on the lookout for new perfumes to layer and create unique scents. After testing MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, I must say it has quickly become one of my recent favorites.   The sandalwood note, which I wasn't initially accustomed to, blends beautifully when layered with other scents, particularly fruity and fresh ones. The result is a perfectly balanced fragrance that's both sophisticated and inviting.  The packaging is sleek and luxurious, complementing the high-quality mister that dispenses just the right amount of perfume. This scent is an excellent addition to any fragrance collection, whether used alone or for layering. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Lyndsey. I am a licensed cosmetologist of over eleven years. While my focus is primarily on hair skin and body are also a passion of mine. Especially fragrance. I have discovered this brand in the last year and I love that each and every scent is extremely layerable. While working for so many various situations, they also provide a fragrance that is light enough to wear during the day as well as for a night out. This is a extremely earthy and natural scent and I feel it's a great base scent for those who are looking to create a signature scent instead of a standard scent profile. I feel like this would be versatile for multiple genders as well. The bottle is clean and elegant and the packaging is sleek as expected with the brand. This is a product I would recommend to any earth based scent lover. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: The Best Le Labo Santal 33 Dupe!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the closest fragrance to Le Labo Santal 33 Dupe. If you're looking for a budget perfume but doesn't wanna justify spending over $300+ then this is perfect. My mom and I absolutely loves it! No. 4 Bois de Balincourt EDP is a sensual, earthy and woody fragrance. It has a hint of spicy cinnamon and nutmeg creating warmness. However, this is more lighter than Santal 33 which I love. It's less musky and floral.

reviews.review_title: Masculine appeal with a sweet twist
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I gotta say, my first impression was not great. The initial spray hit me and I was like, What is this? But it gets better as it dries down. It's definitely a unisex fragrance but to me it leans more towards the masculine side. It starts off almost like a mix of banana with a dash of cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove sprinkled on top. There's this musky sweetness to it that's kinda intriguing, albeit a bit unusual. I wouldn't say I'm head over heels for it, but I don't hate it either. The lasting power is impressive though. It hangs around for at least 6 hours which is a big plus. And can we talk about the packaging? It's sleek, minimalist, and downright sexy. They nailed the whole aesthetic vibe. It's not for everyone but if you're into something unique that evolves over time, give it a shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm giving this product 3 stars when it really should be 2.5 ONLY because I feel like I didn't have a fair chance to really review it. Unfortunately when I received it I was getting over a cold, so I couldn't really smell it too well. When I did wear it at work I felt the scent was so strange and nauseating. A co-worker them came up and said it smelled musty in the building. I think the smell of ongoing construction was interfering with my perfume and making my feel sick. A few days later I had to go to the hospital and the smells in the hospital plus the perfume were again making me feel sick. I'm not sure if I'm extra sensitive or if something in the perfume is contributing to making me feel this way. I will say that when I first sprayed it and smelled it I felt that it would be better suited for fall or winter since it is a warm scent (it's currently summer). It also smells genderless, I can see a man wearing this no problem. If you really want to try this, maybe start with a travel size spray and see how you feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried the Maison Louis Marie No.04 it was actually in the oil received as a sample and I immediately added to cart! Today I am reviewing this beautiful EDP, I am a beauty enthusiast and enjoy testing and reviewing all things beauty, fragrances are so personal but I will try my best to describe how this scent feels to me personally. My favorite type of scent really depends on my mood and occasion. This scent to me is a perfect fresh and woody scent, with a little bit of citrusy and spicy dry down, warm enough to wear daily, and also great to layer.   The top notes are Sandalwood and Cedarwood, with middle notes being Vetiver, Nutmeg, and Cinnamon, spicy in the best way! The Base note is Amber Wood, which I will say I don't pick up much of this more complex woody scent. It's absolutely one of those scents that will stop someone in their tracks to ask what you are wearing. If you like Clean, Warm, and Woody scents, this one is definitely a must for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a Beauty Expert, I enjoy being able to try out new products as they come out but it's a really nice treat when I get the opportunity to try a fragrance. I was recently graced with that opportunity from MAISON LOUIS MARIE to try their No.4 Bois de Balincourt EDP. This is the second fragrance I've tried from them and the first one(No.14) was a hit, so here's my thoughts on No.4: This perfume is extremely woodsy obviously with the top notes being wood scents, sandal and cedar, which isn't a bad thing if you like the woody scent. I found the base note of amberwood to be very strong on my skin and I did not get nutmeg or cinnamon at all. It didn't last very long either. Like all perfume, it mixes different with everyone's pheromones and it didn't go well with mine. I like the scent but I don't think I'm cut out for woody scents on their own. If you are a floral and or sweet scent lover with just a hint of woody, then this is not the sent for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt perfume has a very unique scent. It smells like a forest full of pine trees and pinecones. It also reminds me of rain and limes. It has a very earthy and citrusy scent. Definitely smells like citronella a lot and is more on the masculine side than the feminine side. Personally, I couldn't smell the cinnamon notes too much which I expected more of and the sandalwood as well. It's a very unisex scent and I prefer it more when it is layered. I highly recommend this perfume to any man because the cedarwood scent is very strong in this fragrance. It would be perfect on any man honestly. It's okay on its own but I like it more layered with my other perfumes.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the simplistic yet beautiful packaging that Maison Louis Marie uses, the plain box with the name and the notes on the front is unique and classy. I really like being able to see the notes upfront and know exactly what to expect. The top notes for Bois de Balincourt are sandalwood and cedarwood. This scent is very heavy on the woodsy scents.  I have noticed with this fragrance that it is very long lasting. I can spray it on and still catch a whiff of the scent hours later. My favorite notes from this scent are the cinnamon and nutmeg. It reminds me of winter and baking. The woodsy scents are a bit too strong for my liking. I am still in the process of discovering what scents suit me best. I have found that I like to match my scents to the season so currently this fragrance does not suit me but I am going to try it more when it starts to cool down a bit and see it the change in weather helps me acclimate to the fragrance more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincoirt Eau de Parfum is the perfect classic, layerable, easy-to-reach-for sandalwood scent that anyone can add to their collection!   This fragrance is completely gender-neutral and is great for wearing alone or for layering. On its own it gives a deep, warm, woody scent that feels cozy and comfortable while remaining subtle and natural. When layered, it adds warmth and depth to any fragrance and pairs wonderfully with nearly any scent family.   The clear glass bottle and simple ivory label look timeless and beautiful displayed on my vanity, and the atomizer sprays an even, fine mist that makes it easy to apply to specific points on the body or all-over.   When worn as a standalone fragrance, this EDP has a deep, intense woody scent upon initial spray and dries down to a gentle skin scent. It lasts several hours on my skin - not all day, but plenty long enough that I don’t feel the need to reapply midday.   Overall, I do really love this scent and am happy with the performance of this EDP, however it’s difficult to recommend this fragrance in particular when there are so many nearly-identical sandalwood fragrances that are more cost-effective and have better projection and longevity.   This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie Bois de Balincourt perfume is a true delight for sandalwood enthusiasts. From the moment you unbox it, the beautiful packaging exudes a sense of luxury and elegance. The bottle itself looks fancy, making it a perfect addition to any vanity. The scent profile is a captivating blend of sweet and earthy notes. The top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood create a harmonious balance that feels both sophisticated and grounded. It’s a fragrance that feels timeless and versatile, suitable for any occasion. The perfume comes in a great size and is reasonably priced, making it an excellent value for the quality. With a lasting power of about 7 hours, it stays with you throughout the day. For those who desire an even stronger, longer-lasting scent, pairing it with the oil version is highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has never tried a scent with sandalwood in it, No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum was definitely a new enchanting olfactory journey for me, through serene woods and warm spices. The sandalwood note evokes a sense of calm and blends nicely with amber wood for a true woody depth. As it settles, hints of amber emerge and adds a subtle sweetness that is not overpowering. The overall experience is natural allure, and I think it would be perfect to wear this for both daytime wear and evening occasions. Its longevity on the skin is fairly good and lingers throughout the day without fading completely. No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a fragrance that really captures the quiet moments in nature, making it a unique scent in my collection for its blend of tranquility and sophistication. I gave it 4 stars because it is different from the scents I normally wear. This review was collected as part of a promotion .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a fragrance lover and a beauty professional with nearly 30yrs of industry experience. Over the past couple of years I’ve really enjoyed experimenting with layering scents. And, this perfume is an ideal base for cocktailing with other notes to create a truly personalized and unique fragrance. I tend to be drawn to either crisp and fresh or heady and richly warm aromas. I steer clear of sweet and floral perfumes. I love that this one translates sophisticated, understated, and brightly refreshing. I’ve liked wearing it both ways - solo and mixed with other favorites creating customized presence. The bottle is so refined and the packaging and scent appeal to both men and women. I do find that when worn by itself that the scent will fade if I don’t apply it on multiple areas.

Unfortunately, No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum by Maison Louis Marie is a pass. While this brand is one that I wouldn't be opposed to try again since it is a clean brand and contains no toxic or environmentally harmful ingredients, No. 4 simply is an under performer. The longevity is horrible. After an hour, the scent is gone, thinking maybe I had gone nose blind, but even my partner couldn't smell it on me. Performance is a huge part of fragrance wearing and if it doesn't even last an hour, I cannot recommend it. The scent is much lighter than expected. From the notes, I was expecting something heavier, but No. 04 is wearable for the daytime, even in the Texas heat. Go sample this if you like the notes or else you may end up disappointed like me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who loves exploring new fragrances, No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum has quickly become one of my favorites. After a week of daily use, I can say this perfume is exceptional. The initial spray provides a gorgeous blend of sandalwood and cedarwood, and evolves nicely throughout the day without being overpowering. What I love most about this fragrance is its staying power. One or two sprays is enough to keep me smelling amazing through the day, and honestly my clothes still smell like it a few days after. The bottle design is sleek and elegant, with a substantial weight. Since I started wearing Bois de Balincourt, I've received a number of compliments from my friends and bf. If you're looking for an elegant, woody fragrance, this is a beautiful choice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty expert, I am able to discover different scents and learn about new brands. This is the second fragrance from Maison Louis Marie that I have been able to discover.   The bottle comes in an elegant container that is just beautiful for the vanity. The box is also stunning packaging. It creates an elegant unboxing experience.  The Bois de Balincourt fragrance creates olfactory experience that is unique and mood boosting. I did not notice a smell at first but the dry down is when I notice the scent.   The scent is soft and not overpowering. It’s a soft and refreshing scent that makes perfect for layering. You can create your own scent with the layering possibilities. The spray of the fragrance feels so refreshing.  It smells so great on my friends and family as well. It smells differently on everyone but continues to keep that fresh scent. It’s rare that there is a fragrance that mixes well with so many people.   The dry down scent is definitely my favorite note. This is a great scent for those who wishes to take the fragrance journey that will transport them to a feeling of bliss and calmness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a captivating scent that makes my sense of smell perceive the most unique scents. It has a woody infused scent that is retained strongly in the perfume. I love that this perfume is a rare gem that makes me smell good in the most unique way. The perfume lasts for a long lasting time and saves time on reapplying the perfume. A product that makes a statement of pleasant atmosphere whenever I apply it on my body or clothes. Most importantly, there is a pleasant scent of spices that are sweet in the perfume and it appeals in the most amazing to my sense of smell. It is a product that makes me happy and excited to use whenever I need to go outside. The perfume is portable to carry when traveling and it is not heavy at all. I feel confident in my own body whenever I use the perfume in this summer season.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a beauty enthusiast who is just in love with this brand!! Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is such a phenomenal scent experience! It amazes me how diverse and layerable each scent is. The underlying sandalwood scent is so warm and calming. The cedar scent is bold and enticing, mixed with the softness of the sandalwood. There are hints of warm cinnamon, which accentuates the raw, earthy aroma of this beautiful parfum. It gives it a a sort of sweetness on top of the woodsy smell. It is such a light yet enticing scent that lasts throughout the entire day! It's not too overpowering either and can be worn any time of day. And of course I always appreciate a brand that is clean, uses natural ingredients, and supports global initiatives to help the environment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt is truly an earthy and Woody fragrance. With its Keynotes of sandalwood, vetiver, and amberwood it has this fresh botanical scent of nature. This perfume also carries subtle notes of nutmeg and cinnamon which add a spice to this fragrance. I've discovered that I love mixing this perfume with vanilla and more gourmand scents. Doing so turns a sugary sweet perfume into a more sophisticated experience that you can wear anytime. I had my mother try this perfume as well and she enjoyed wearing it on its own. She loves warmer earthier scents that over time melt into the skin and smells fresh and clean like nature after it rains. I know not everyone will love this fragrance at first but I think it's a unique fragrance that everyone should try at least once and they should try mixing it with other perfumes they have for a new experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty and fragrance enthusiast, i was excited to try Maison Louis No. 4. I wanted to give this perfume a try for professional settings since it contains notes such as Sandal wood, Vetiver and Amber wood to name a few. I usually like warm scents in my home, which it made it all the more exciting to try.   However, the scent was a bit underwhelming. On initial spray the smell of cinnamon and nutmeg is very strong with some citrusy elements. And as it dries down it becomes slightly sweeter but sadly the scent doesn’t last. Within an hour or so i could barely smell it on me. One repeat application it smelt more and more like a cologne. I know its a unisex fragrance but to me it felt like a male perfume. Also the smell of sandalwood never came through even when applied in the air.   The packaging is very elegant, and i think it would make a nice gift for men who prefer woody scents, especially in the winter months. Unfortunately i don’t think it did well with my body chemistry. It did not last long i could not smell the top notes of sandalwood at all. So for me personally it’s not going to be signature scent.   This was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Maison Louis No.04 Bois de Balincourt and let me start of by saying I haven’t gotten so many compliments in a scent in a while! This fragrance is sophisticated and comforting and is perfect for everyday wear, adding a touch of elegance without being to much. As someone who loves warm scents Its blend of sandalwood, cedarwood, and spicy notes creates a warm, woody scent that's amazing. A few spritzes linger beautifully on the skin, evolving throughout the day from woodsy opening to a super cozy finish. Personally the first initial scent might come off a little too strong for my taste but nothing too much, it's versatile enough to wear anywhere you go. I'd definitely recommend it if you love scents that are memorable and very unique. It's a lovely addition to any perfume collection and sure to get you compliments! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this perfume it has cinnamon in it, and I never have used the perfume with that in it. It is very light and elegant and I have had plenty compliments. This is for something like going to dinner or party. This will be a great smell to wear around. It would also be a great smell to just wear out when you go out. It also will be a great smell to just wear just to have fun .You can really wear this perfume to any event and plenty peoples heads. believe I came across a great smell of perfume like this. I also like the bottle that the perfume is in.It is very nice. It makes me feel very special just to be able to have a perfume bottle. Would recommend this perfume to anyone because of the sweet smell that it has. Anything like this will drive a man crazy lol!!! So if you’re thinking about buying this product, please do!!! You won’t be disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m absolutely in love with Maison Louis Marie and their No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. The bottle looks stunning with its sleek and elegant design. The scent lasts a long time, which is amazing because I don’t have to reapply it throughout the day.   Since I adore sandalwood in perfumes, this one was perfect for me. The cedarwood and sandalwood notes are really noticeable right from the start, creating a warm and woody base that I love. Then, after a little while, the subtle hints of cinnamon and nutmeg come through, adding a spicy and slightly sweet touch that makes the fragrance even more interesting and complex.  I can’t wait to keep wearing No.04 Bois de Balincourt. It’s become one of my go-to scents, and I look forward to enjoying its beautiful aroma every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When it comes to fragrances I have normally gone for very fruity floral scents. However, I have recently started venturing into more woody and warm scents as they smell more unique to me and seem to last longer on my skin. The Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt eau de parfum is exactly what I've been looking for in a fragrance for some time now. It smells very mature and sexy, and the notes of sandalwood and Amber wood really stand out to me. It's definitely a very warm, woody scent. My favorite thing about this fragrance is that it keeps that deep woody smell for hours after applying it and doesn't develop into something completely different as I've experienced with other fragrances with similar notes. This is my new go to perfume for nights and I can't wait to have this as my winter scent as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve long been a buyer of basically one fragrance that’s super sweet and have been looking to expand into something that’s a little more grown up and great for all seasons.   The Bois de Balincourt is the first “woodsy” fragrance that I actually really enjoy.   I feel like the spicy notes come out on top and fade very quickly into a warm sandalwood and cedarwood scent.   This blends in on my skin so I almost feel like it’s a better version of me that’s just been outdoors minus the sweat.   I like that it leans masculine but not overly so. The scent is soft and non abrasive, the only thing is I wish that it lasted a little longer.   I think this would be wonderful layered with something floral or just a hint of sweetness.   Overall this has been something I’ve been reaching for daily and I’m interested in trying more from the brand!

reviews.review_title: For a long time in my radar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to confess, this perfume has been on my radar for a long time and is truly one of the most intriguing additions to my extensive collection. It's the kind of fragrance that requires me to be in a particular mood, but when I wear it, it stands out remarkably. After eyeing it for a year, I finally have it, and it has since become a staple in my beauty routine.  Wearing this perfume evokes memories of a cozy cabin in Vermont during the crisp fall season. It blends a seductive, elegant charm with a prominent woody undertone that particularly shines in autumn and the early weeks of winter. Each time I apply it, I find myself continuously drawn to the subtle, alluring scent on my wrist. There's something for me about wearing it with a clean white cozy sweater during fall.  While there are other perfumes with similar sandalwood  profiles on the market, this one stands out as the most feminine and distinctive among them. Its unique blend of sensuality and elegance and its woody warmth make it a delightful choice for anyone seeking a memorable fragrance experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie's No. 4 Bois de Balincourt is a very sophisticated perfume. It emits a beautiful, romantic and warm scent. It is truly a work of art and I enjoy wearing it so much. It's radiates a soft, earthy and woody fragance blend. Its dominant notes are of sandalwood and cedarwood and it is purely gorgeous. It makes me feel like I'm standing in the most beautiful woods in the middle of autumn, just surrounded by sacred nature. I love that even though it is made of woody top notes, it is not an overwhelming scent at all. It is light, creamy and effuses such an amorous scent.           I also need to mention that the Maison Louis Marie brand's mission is absolutely beautiful. Its main focus is all about the creation of fragrances that blend history with a modern twist. This is the second scent I try from this brand and they truly do such an amazing job connecting memories through the art of perfumery, all while preserving their deep and respectful connection with the natural world.         The commitment this brand has to clean beauty and environmentalism and their amazing ability to create unique signature scents, has truly impressed me. I can't wait to try more of their products and see what else they are going to create for us in the coming years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are interested in smelling like THAT girl who has their whole life together, then Maison Louis Marie Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is the fragrance for you. This mysteriously captivating feminine scent boasts incredible staying power, lingering subtly on the skin even at the end of a long day.  The fragrance offers a warm, woodsy base with a sweet and light twist, creating a perfect balance that feels both sophisticated and inviting. Overall, it’s a very clean and fresh scent that is truly unique.   Moreover, for those with sensitivities to certain fragrances, Maison Louis Marie stands out. As someone prone to allergic reactions from perfumes, I can attest that this is the second Maison Louis Marie fragrance I've tried, and neither has caused any irritation. It's safe to say that Maison Louis Marie fragrances are gentle on my skin.  This review was collected in part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum by Maison Louis Marie is an extremely pleasant unisex scent. The aroma is spicy, gives me a little bit of a black pepper with an underlying scent of something sweet like vanilla. I know it’s not supposed to have any kind of vanilla notes but that’s what it smells like on me when I’m wearing it. This perfume lasts a majority of the day and it stays on clothing even longer. No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum makes me feel good about myself. I also don’t find it to be overwhelming/or bothersome to others. I get a lot of compliments on this perfume when I wear it. I would highly recommend this perfume to others like myself and enjoy an androgynous scent that has a spicy/black pepper hint to it. It’s worth the money for the quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a bold journey in fragrance from the prestigious Maison Louis Marie brand. The fragrance is formulated without phthalates, parabens, or sulfated and packaged in an understated yet elegant bottle. I loved that the product itself was colorless, very aesthetically pleasing on my fragrance shelf.  The first spritz of this Eau de Parfum shocked me. I wasn’t expecting such a bold and interesting scent to come out of such a minimalistic bottle. The top notes are Sandalwood and Vetiver which translate to a very clean smell of green, lemon, and cedarwood. It reminded me of a very nice candle, and I wasn’t sure if I liked it that at first, but this is one of those fragrances that needs to “melt” into skin before the warm cinnamon and amber scents come through.  By hour three or four I downright love it. It’s also kind of gender neutral too, if that’s something you’re looking for.  I didn’t think it was feminine or masculine, just clean, warm, and even a little sensual.  It reminds me of clean clothes and cocoa butter in the best way possible. I’d recommend pairing this with a sweet-smelling lotion and just living it up.  **This review was collected as part of a promotion**

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 - Bois de Balincourt is a sophisticated and luxurious fragrance that captivates the senses with its exquisite blend of notes. The top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood create a warm and inviting opening that sets the tone for the rest of the fragrance. As the scent develops, the mid notes of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon add depth and complexity, providing a spicy and aromatic quality that is both alluring and captivating. The base note of amber wood anchors the fragrance, adding a rich and sensual undertone that lingers on the skin long after the initial application. The combination of these notes creates a harmonious and well-balanced scent that is perfect for both day and evening wear. Overall, Maison Louis Marie No.04 - Bois de Balincourt is a truly exceptional fragrance that exudes elegance and sophistication. Its unique blend of notes creates a captivating olfactory experience that is sure to leave a lasting impression. Whether you are looking for a signature scent or simply want to indulge in a luxurious fragrance, Maison Louis Marie No.04 - Bois de Balincourt is a must-have addition to your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance lover that enjoys woodsy scents the No. 04 Bois de Balincourt by Maison Louis Marie this scent smells like a lush forest. The cedarwood and sandalwood pair together and dance beautifully with the notes of vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon, and amber wood so seamlessly. The longevity and scent power is so nice and this scent lasts so much longer than so many scents I’ve tried. It lasts for awhile on my skin and at least 6 hours and you can smell the layers as it fades into a more powdery scent. It’s truly such a gorgeous and complex fragrance. This reminds of my camping in the forest as a child with my family it’s super cozy and comforting. I also love that it’s unisex and my partner is a huge fan of this scent as well and keeps gravitating towards it. This would be the perfect fragrance for fall since it’s such a comfy fragrance. The bottle is very sleek and gorgeous and the mist is very fine and not messy. Such a gorgeous sent that I’m so happy to have in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying a Maison Louis Marie and I must say I love the brand and everything they stand for. The quality is amazing, from packaging/presentation to the clean ingredients. This perfume is prestige at an entry level price!  The 04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum itself was such a unique scent, unfortunately it pulled more masculine than I liked on my skin. I’m disappointed because the longevity was amazing, and the scent is strong. I don’t get much of the cinnamon or nutmeg, it dries down heavily woody on me. I do enjoy layering it with some of my sweeter, citrusy or floral scents to tone them down for a night out or during the winter. Despite the scent not matching my skin chemistry (this is definitely one of those scents you need a wear test for), I’m committed to using it because the quality and uniqueness of the perfume is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love a warm and woody fragrance especially for layering and I absolutely adore this one. I was very excited to try this scent and it did not disappoint, I fell in love with this scent on my skin almost immediately. This No. 04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum includes top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, middle notes of vétiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon, and base note of amber wood. These notes pair and blend beautifully together to create a gorgeous warm, woody, and earthy fragrance. This smells amazing just out of the bottle but I love it even more as it sits and settles on my skin. This is also a very versatile fragrance. I love it on its own, but I also find that it layers very well with many fragrances. I liked it layered with a warm vanilla that just gives it a touch of sweetness. My favorite way to layer it was with No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum. I loved the warm, woody, floral, and slightly sweet scent that they created when worn together. I think this is a fragrance that I could definitely wear year round. I found that this perfume had a great longevity too. I can smell it on myself all day after applying. If the notes in this perfume interest you, I highly recommend trying this one out as I don’t think you’ll be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First things first, packaging is so sleek and unique. It states all the notes from first application to the last base of it. Upon opening it was beautiful to my eyes. My biggest thing about perfumes is the spritzer. When I sprayed some on, it came out so beautiful. I sprayed 2 pumps. One on my neck and my wrists. I went on about my day, man oh man, everyone at work was asking what perfume I had on. As the day went on, the different notes started to appear more. The easiest way to explain the scent is upon first is like clean/floral. As it wears out it, it turns into woodsy scent. The next day I used the same sweater and the scent wore beautifully. Overall, this is definitely a special event or date night perfume. It will last forever and will be a head turner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Imagine stepping into a grand library, where the air is thick with the wisdom of the ages. As you walk through the aisles, surrounded by the great novels of the world, a sense of warmth and worldliness envelops you. This is the sensation Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt evokes.  The opening notes greet you with a burst of vetiver, grounding you in a woodsy embrace reminiscent of ancient wooden bookshelves. As the fragrance unfolds, the rich heart of sandalwood and cedar wood takes over, weaving a tapestry of warmth and refinement. The subtle hint of the cinnamon nutmeg blend is a spicy revelation, infusing the scent with an exotic allure.  One of things I love about No.04 is its impressive sillage. A single spritz lingers beautifully in the air, leaving a trail of elegance. The longevity is exceptional; the scent clings to skin for hours and I often find myself catching whiffs of it and marveling at its complexity throughout the day.  I really enjoy treating myself to this perfume on days dedicated to self-care. After a long run under the Florida sun, I revel in a luxurious, long shower, followed by slipping into cozy pajamas. With all my favorite skincare rituals complete, a few sprays of this perfume are the perfect finishing touch. The scent transforms my relaxation time on the couch into a truly indulgent experience.  But No.04’s versatility is just one of its many charms. It transitions seamlessly from a day at work to a romantic night out, adding a touch of sophistication and allure to any occasion. Whether you're cozying up on the couch and diving into one of the great literary classics, or simply enjoying a night out, No.04 is the perfect companion. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give this fragrance a 3.5 I would. Not quite a 3 and not quite a 4 and not because I think it stinks. I think it actually smells pretty pleasant but I like it better in my diffuser. It smells a little masculine to me. Doesn’t really give a super feminine vibe. I can easily smell a man wearing this. At the very least I guess it could be unisex but as a fragrance to walk around in daily, eh. Again, it is a pleasant smell just not a wearable smell for me in my opinion.

reviews.review_title: Reminiscent of a walk through a magical forest
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What a magical, earthy scent! I am pleasantly surprised with the versatility of this scent from Maison Louis Marie.  With its name derived from the family home of the creators where they took long walks on a magical trail called “Lover’s Lane”, No. 4 – Bois de Balincourt is a fragrance that transports you to a beautiful, lush forest filled with magic and mystique.  This fragrance is a warm, earthy scent with top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood that melt into an amber base with middle notes of vetiver, nutmeg and cinnamon.  After a long, leisurely walk through the forest, let No. 4 – Bois de Balincourt help you settle into the evening around a warm bonfire listening to the sound of a gentle breeze on a warm summer evening.  This is a unisex scent that is perfect for everyone and layers really well with other fragrances.  I especially enjoy layering this with No. 14, to add in a touch of warm floral to make the scent a little more feminine.  Clean, cruelty-free and planet friendly, what’s not to love about this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a fragrance for dreamers and adventurers. It's perfect for anyone who wants to carry a piece of the forest with them, no matter where they go. If you're a fan of woody, warm, and slightly spicy scents, this one is worth adding to your collection.

reviews.review_title: Luxurious Yet Affordable: Maison Louis Marie No. 4
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a content creator dedicated to recreating luxury looks with affordable options, I was eager to try Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt. After using it for about a month, I can confidently say this fragrance is a hidden gem. From the first spritz, the warm, woody notes of sandalwood and cedarwood envelop you, creating an inviting, sophisticated scent that lasts all day. The subtle hints of spicy cinnamon and earthy vetiver add depth without being overpowering, making it perfect for any occasion.  One of the standout features of Bois de Balincourt is its remarkable longevity. Even after a full day of wear, the fragrance remains noticeable, evolving beautifully over time. Unlike many high-end perfumes that fade quickly, this one maintains its presence, allowing you to enjoy its complexity throughout the day. I also appreciate its versatility; it seamlessly transitions from day to night, making it a staple in my daily routine.  The packaging is elegant and minimalist, reflecting the brand’s commitment to quality. The sleek glass bottle with a simple, chic label looks stunning on my vanity, adding a touch of sophistication to my collection. Additionally, Maison Louis Marie’s dedication to using clean, cruelty-free ingredients aligns perfectly with my values, making me feel good about my purchase.  Overall, Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt has exceeded my expectations. Its luxurious scent profile, impressive longevity, and beautiful packaging make it a must-have for anyone seeking a high-quality, affordable fragrance. As someone who frequently tests and reviews beauty products, I give this perfume a solid 5-star rating. It’s a fantastic addition to any fragrance wardrobe and a testament to the fact that luxury doesn’t have to come with a hefty price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a 31 year old fragrance enthusiast with a pretty sizable collection that I’m extremely fond of. I have a variety of perfumes in all different price points and love using them on various occasions. The EDP No 4 by Maison Louis Marie is my latest addition and I have been thoroughly enjoying it. Since i’ve received it, i’ve reached for it more than my other perfumes. When i first got it, i was definitely a little skeptical but i’m usually a fan of woody scents and i gotta say ive been in love with it. It’s pretty sandalwood forward and it fades to the most amazing amber scent that I can't get enough of! It’s perfect for wearing for days or nights. I’ve been wearing it to work everyday and have gotten a ton of compliments! I love how versatile it is and it is a cute addition to my vanity! I would highly recommend this to anyone who loves woody fragrances but if you’re someone who does not enjoy woody earthy scents, this is probably not for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Surrounded by an ancient mysterious forest, Balincourt is the name of our family home where we took long walks on a magical trail called 'UK k look jLover’s Lane'. This romantic scent is a Sandalwood fragrance with a dominant Cedarwood and Sandalwood accord that's supplemented by a spicy Cinnamon Nutmeg complex with an earthy Vetiver note. #4 Bois de Balincourt by Maison Louis Marie Top note: Sandalwood, Cedarwood Mid note: Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon Base note: Amber Wood  This is a very soft perfume free of femininity or masculinity . Of all gender neutral scents that I have smelled over the past few years this is definitely the one that got it perfect! Alone it is just a Devine scent created for all of us equally.  It layers perfectly with more feminine scents like vanilla to create the ultimate feminine scent full of romance and subtle beauty. Layered with masculine scents created a party for my olfactory senses!   I highly recommend this wonderful scent to anyone who loves great perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance enthusiast, I'm always eager to explore unique and sophisticated scents that can complement my lifestyle. I had the pleasure of trying the Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum from July 2nd to July 9th, and I'm thrilled to share my experience. The Louis Marie Maison No. 04 The description of Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is sandalwood-heavy, with earthy vetiver and spicy cinnamon nutmeg accords supporting the main sandalwood and cedarwood notes. I discovered over the week that this scent is quite adaptable and great for daytime or evening wear. A few mists on my wrists and neck provided me with hours of entrancing perfume, demonstrating the product's remarkable lingering power. Throughout the day, the fragrance unfolded nicely, commencing with a warm, spicy note and settling into a calming, woodsy background. Every inhale reveals new layers of warmth and calm, evoking the feeling of strolling through a peaceful woodland. Anyone wishing to add a little elegance to their collection of fragrances will benefit from its gender-neutral profile. Because its warm and comforting elements are best savored in the fall and winter, this smell is especially well-suited to those seasons. It's a great option for evening wear as well, giving each event a touch of sophistication and depth. To everyone looking for a distinctive and opulent aroma experience, I heartily suggest it. Regardless matter your level of experience with fragrances, this Eau de Parfum is guaranteed to captivate and excite you.  **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance was inspired by an ancient, mysterious forest named Balincourt and this scent captures that perfectly.  The woodsy, almost romantic scent of Sandalwood is complemented by earthy Cedarwood. The fragrance intensifies and matures as a result of body heat and notes of Vetiver, Nutmeg and Cinnamon whisper softly. Amber wood anchors the scent and every note adds a different dimension to this beautiful fragrance.  The fragrance is genderless and can easily be layered with other favorites. For me it’s perfect on its own and I love the earthy, cozy vibes of this fragrance. Its luxurious, warm scent is long lasting and has become a firm favorite of mine.

reviews.review_title: great scent but not long lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love many different fragrances and have a pretty large perfume collection. The Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois  de Balincourt Eau De Parfume is such a unique and different scent. I love the pretty bottle! After opening the simple, elegant box, the bottle is high quality and a nice shape with a large amount of product.   Upon first spray I smell a clean, beach. It is light and reminds me of when you go to a very expensive restaurant and the bathroom entryway is scented (in the best way!). I love how fresh and cool it is especially in the summer heat. The cedarwood pulls full nicely and I smell the light hint of cinnamon which is a nice addition. It layered very nicely with my vanilla based body sprays.   Unfortunately, it did not last long at all for me. For something labeled an eau de parfume it lasted as long if not less than eau de toilette.

reviews.review_title: My fav Maison Louis Marie scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Maison Louis No. 14 and 13 and fell in love with their unique scents. I obviously had high hopes for the No. 04 as well and this EDP seriously exceeded my expectations! My top pick by far out of the 3 scents that I own. On my body chemistry, it smells a bit powdery, fresh and subtly warm. It’s light without me worrying about the scent being offensive to others even if I spray a lot. There are some fragrances that can be too overpowering that I would be mindful how much I spray especially when going to work as I work with patients. Not an issue with this No. 04. My daughter even complimented how good I smell. This scent particularly gives me an overall feeling of freshness. I love how it’s a unisex and layerable scent. Right now I have been using it a lot especially during the warm summer weather but I do feel like that this can be used all year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone in her 50s, I was initially drawn to Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum because of its description for being a unique and sophisticated scent. Upon first spritz, I was met with a robust blend of sandalwood and cedarwood. It’s a unisex scent that geared towards masculine rather than neutral. It's a fragrance that carries a sense of strength and refinement, perfect for those who prefer a more grounded, earthy scent.  The longevity of this perfume is nice; it lasts for 3 to 4 hours but not projected too far. I appreciate that it doesn't overpower but instead settles into a subtle, enticing aroma that garners compliments. It's versatile enough for various occasions, whether I'm heading to a meeting or an evening out. While it leans toward a masculine profile, I find it empowering and enjoy the bold statement it makes. For anyone looking for a mature, sophisticated scent with a hint of masculinity, Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a fantastic choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this Moison Louis Marie EAU the parfum, the scents transport me to the woods in a very sunny beautiful day fill with fresh air, it is very woody, earthy and depth fragrance, perfect for any day anytime during summer, very refreshing and elegant notes of Sandalwood, Vetiver, Amber Wood who last hours in my skin while I'm feeling clean and fresh, every time I wear it I got lots of compliments and questions about it. i appreciate the fact that it is made with clean ingredients, without parabens, the bottle is so simple yet elegant, just a couple of sprays it is enough for the day, i also find this perfume unique and different, the mixes of the notes make it one of my favorites of all time. I definitely recommend it if you want to smell divine!

This perfume has a sandalwood fragrance with a dominant cedar wood & sandalwood that is complemented by a spicy cinnamon,nutmeg and with a hint of earthy vetiver creating a deep earthy fragrance.  My take on this perfume, This is so sleek and so aesthetic With beige box written with black bold letters which is just pleasing to look at. As soon as you open the box the glass bottle welcomes you with a crystal cap and an earthy woody fragrance which I love . On first spray you will feel the warm sandalwood and earthy cedar wood, it dries down with a spicy and sweet cinnamon and amber notes which is my favorite part of this perfume.I don’t enjoy dark and sandalwood fragrances but oh my oh my this is just a luxury in a bottle. It is really long lasting,when I say long lasting it lasts the whole day on me.

reviews.review_title: New favorite added to my collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pretty impressed with this perfume . The scent is not over powering and it is very long lasting . I have been using it as a new daily perfume . I love the blend of smells and I’ve gotten so many compliments. Definitely a must have .  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Maie Bois De Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a scent you literally won't find anywhere else. It is a very unique scent that is earthy and comforting. I have received alot of compliments. Tjis parfum is not strong, its a softer scent that does last all day.  I love that the packaging, which is very elegant yet simple gives you the top notes, mid notes, and base notes. I love seeing the symbol stamped on the packaging which is original to the brand. I love the square shape of the bottle, its easy to hold and is classy and different than anything i have seen before. This parfum brings a calm to me, And makes me feel so elegant when wearing it. I suggest this parfum for everyone who loves earthy relaxing scents. The best part is anyone can wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum by Maison Louis Marie carries a unique fragrance that triggered immediate nostalgia from wandering in deep forests and basking in evening rays by murmuring springs; I feel like I am a woodland goddess when I wear this fragrance.   When I first sprayed the fragrance on my skin, I noted how light, even and saturated the mist was—it gives sweeping coverage of the skin, and one spritz covered my entire neck. The mist settled into my skin instantly, leaving a subtle, satiny lustre. The fragrance itself smelled strongly of cedar and cinnamon, which warned to a sweet vanilla and blue pine, with cool water notes. I also smelled pine ash, like a bonfire in distant forests with hints of sandalwood and nutmeg which were warm and earthy.   I wear this fragrance day and night, as it lasts for at least eight hours, and layers very well with other scents, especially deep florals with citrus notes. I highly recommend this fragrance for anyone who is looking for a warm, earthy, nostalgic and soothing experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Michelle, I am a long time avid skincare and beauty consumer. The No. 4 Bois de Balincourt scent is beautifully sophisticated and versatile. Of all the notes in this well crafted blend of scents, sandalwood stood out the most with hints of nutmeg and pepper. One spritz gives you a light scent and lasted a few hours. Multiple spritzes give you a stronger and longer lasting scent. When I applied multiple spritzes in morning, this scent was still going strong later that afternoon! The No. 4 is also a great scent to use as a base to pair with another perfume and make a custom scent! I absolutely love the ethics of Maison Louis Marie as a brand, because they are committed to providing quality, unique products with safe and quality ingredients! So happy to add this to my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been testing out the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum from Maison Louis Marie and I wasn’t really feeling it at first, but it started to grow on me. The fragrance opens with a beautiful musky mix of sandalwood and cedarwood, creating a warm and earthy scent that feels both luxurious and comforting. As it dries down, there’s a subtle sweetness that adds depth without overpowering the woodsy notes.  I could tell that this scent is very suitable for Autumn, where the weather is about to change to chilly. It’s sophisticated enough for special occasions, yet subtle enough for daily wear, not to mention it’s unisex. I find that it lingers nicely on the skin. The longevity is impressive, lasting through my busy day without needing a touch-up. It’s also nice as a base layer for other sweet warm perfumes.  The packaging is elegant and minimalist, which I appreciate. The cap though, could be improved to be more secure. This is a scent that feels both timeless and modern, making it a wild card addition to any perfume collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness, it’s so dreamy! Maison Louis Marie is top tier when it comes to fragrances. They hit the nail on the head every single time. This is scent is extraordinarily beautiful. It’s sensual and sexy and at the same time it’s soft and pretty. First spray is Earthy and woody, but the dry down is such a nice powdery smell. It’s super calming and relaxing. Another scent from Maison Louis Marie I use to help me sleep as well! To me it’s just a lovely feminine scent. The dry down is addictive. The projection is great and it lasts a good while on my skin. I’m absolutely obsessed! Another thing to note is my partner doesn’t usually like woody fragrances, but he adores this! I would wear this all year long, but it’s perfect for Fall/Winter. It’s just so comforting. I 1000% recommend this to anyone and everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying that I am an absolute fragrance fanatic! This was the first scent that I have tried from this brand and it did not disappoint. My first impression of the Maison Louis Marie No.04 was the elegant packaging that it arrived in. This scent was woody and earthy, as advertised, but it also had hints of floral scents.
