Personally, I liked this scent best when layering over a floral scent, as it brought out more of the floral notes. In my opinion, this scent will layer well over just about any floral scent of your choosing. This scent was nostalgic and brought back memories of younger years and it reminded me of a scent that you’d smell walking into Hollister. For me, the only thing I did not like about Maison Louis Marie No.04 was that the scent didn’t seem to last very long.

reviews.review_title: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE with yet another fragrance by Maison Louis Marie! No.04 Bois de Balincourt is the perfect earthy & grounding scent that encapsulates my senses. The notes of this fragrance are very distinct, specifically the comforting sandalwood that wraps around you, and the soft floral notes that balance out its strong earthiness. Everything about this product is sophisticated, from the elegant and clean box to its beautiful and simple glass bottle. I love how this can be an everyday fragrance for me without overpowering my style or situation. And let's not forget, Maison Louis Marie is a clean brand leaving out all of those pesky parabens while still delivering a divine fragrance. I find the scent really lasts throughout the day without reapplication as well. Another fan favorite for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I found this product to be very nicely, scented and lasts all day. Remind me of being in a fancy mall and walking past an elegant woman and being entranced by her scent. it’s very clean. I would really enjoy wearing this on a hot day just to feel fresher or even in the winter I could see myself enjoying the scent. Also it seems like it’s a comfortable scent for all times of the year. Not very sweet I smell the sandalwood it. The packaging is also quite enjoyable. I sprayed this on all of my heat points and even days after I could still smell the scent on my clothes. This is my first time trying the brand product and I’m very impressed by it and overall I would highly recommend this to anyone who wants a mature scent that is not too sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a fan of cinnamon but this is the only perfume i will put on! The scent is so unique, luxury and smells amazing! If you love woody fragrance you cannot miss this! Give it a try  Note  TOP : Sandalwood, Cedarwood  MID : Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon  BASE : Amber wood  This Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum lasts impressively throughout the day it long-lasting without reapplication i can smell it on my body even after 5 hours!, i also love that it’s not overwhelming, The Packaging of Maison Louis Marie keeps it simple elegant with a minimalistic glass bottle, this perfume Its warmth and depth make it ideal for cozying up in sweaters during autumn or winter  Overall this No.4 perfume from Maison Louis Marie is beauty and perfect for those who love woody scent highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a fragrance from Maison Louis Marie, and I'm blown away. The Eau de Parfum No.4 Bois de Balincourt is unlike any other fragrance in my collection. It stands out not just because of the alluring, mysterious scent, but also because it has a romantic, almost secretive nature to it. It's discrete and wears close to the skin. Something you have to be close to smell. I love that about it- it's giving signature scent!! That also makes it a wonderful scent for layering. I can spray a few times on my skin before getting dressed, and then use a different fragrance over my clothes and I have a dynamic scent that lasts all day. I prefer woodsy, unisex scents to sweet scents, so that's what initially piqued my interest in No.4. It's warm and inviting, yet fresh and green. It's great in the summer, and I think it will transition well in to fall too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie’s Bois de Balincourt fragrance is a captivating blend of sensuality and sophistication, wrapped in a clean, fresh allure. From the first spritz, you are immediately greeted by the unmistakable aroma of cedarwood. This note is both grounding and uplifting, evoking images of towering trees and the rich, earthy scent of a forest floor. As Bois settles on the skin, the heart of the fragrance begins to reveal itself. Nutmeg, with its spicy and slightly sweet profile, adds a layer of intrigue and depth and I feel that the spice note is perfectly balanced and once the fragrance continues to evolve, amber emerges as a key player, adding a rich, resinous quality that enhances the overall warmth of the scent. One of the most enchanting aspects of Bois de Balincourt is its dry down. As the hours pass, the fragrance fades into a beautiful accord of woods and warmth. The cedarwood, nutmeg, and amber notes meld together seamlessly, creating a scent that is both enduring and evolving. This transformation is subtle yet noticeable, allowing you to enjoy different facets of the fragrance throughout the day. No4's ability to linger delicately on the skin while maintaining a beautiful evolution throughout the day is a testament to its quality and artistry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with No. 4 Bois de Balincourt! This was my first time trying Maison Louis Marie, and it surely won’t be my last. I immediately fell in love with this scent. It has a perfect balance of earthy and woody notes that feel natural yet sophisticated. This fragrance reminds me of the smell of trees after it rains…the wet leaves and fresh earthy scent in the air. I find it worth noting that I pickup a hint of dill weed/pickles in this, which seems to be common amongst woody fragrances, but can be a love/hate for some people. I think this would complement any gender and could really be worn for any occasion. The packaging and presentation were beautiful, and I love how simple and minimalistic the bottle is as well. It looks beautiful on my vanity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 4 has quickly become one of my favorite fragrances. I absolutely love its warm woody scent, which is perfectly balanced with a subtle peppery note. It's never overwhelming, making it ideal for daily wear. The longevity of the scent is impressive; it lasts all day, and I often receive multiple compliments whenever I wear it.One of the best aspects is how well it layers with my Mandarin body butter, creating a unique and delightful combination. If you're looking for a sophisticated, long-lasting fragrance with a touch of spice, Maison Louis Marie No. 4 is a must-try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I visually imagine this scent, I see a wooded area with fresh grass and a garden after rainfall. It is definitely unisex, because it is not too masculine or feminine. There is a strong  cedar and sandalwood note at the beginning. But it doesn’t become fresh and clean later on. I had a friend says it reminds of dill pickles. But that is not what I got. It is a woody clean fresh scent.  I think there a lot of different not a on this fragrance that, it makes it a time Machine where you can smell different scents as certain times. I smell a spice note like nutmeg and cinnamon at times but it doesn’t that without being spicy.  Then I no an also smell fermented grains at times. I feel like the dry down is fresh and woody. It is different from what I usually wear but I love that. It lasts a very long time and i smelled it all day. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product comes in a glass bottle with a clear top and a super cute minimalist packaging that's lists the different blends/scents used to make this wonderful perfume. When using this scent it takes me away to a beautiful venue where high society is dress in their finest with beautiful big hats and sipping on the world's most exquisite teas, it is such a fine and sophisticated smell that tickles at your nose and makes you think that you are a 1950's polished doll sitting in the beautiful garden and drinking tea with your girlfriends, chatting about the latest scoop around town. That's the only way I can describe this scent, it's lush, fancy, and fabulous smelling. It is a great scent to also layer with as I have layer this and played around with multiple different ones, they have all paired fantastic with this. I love Maison Louis Marie brand, and they have definitely done their homework and assignments when it comes to high end perfume. The fact that this is such a clean conscious brand is also top tier. I highly, highly recommend this product to everyone, even the men can wear this as it is very versatile! I received this product as part of a promotion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was not previously very familiar with the Maison Louis Marie brand, but I really enjoyed trying their No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. It has a warm, sexy, woody smell that I tend to really like. It’s unisex, and I could easily see my husband or I wearing this, which I don’t always say for products banded as unisex. For the females wearing this, it is a little bit more of a slightly masculine female scent, but I personally enjoy that scent profile. Some of the stronger notes I get out of the perfume are sandalwood, amber, and cinnamon. Overall, I think this is a sophisticated, classy perfume, and I like the minimalist bottle. I don’t find it overpowering and could wear this all day personally, but I think it would make a great evening out perfume in particular.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Coming from someone who is very picky with perfumes, this one in particular is a must have! I find myself grabbing for this one almost every day! From the first spritz, the scent envelops you in a warm, woody embrace that is both sophisticated and comforting. The top notes are a delightful blend of sandalwood and cedarwood, which create a fresh yet earthy aroma. As it settles there is a subtle hint of vetiver and nutmeg, adding depth and a slight spiciness that is perfectly balanced. It’s a versatile fragrance that I can wear on any occasion, whether I’m dressing up for an evening out or simply enjoying a quiet day at home. The minimalist packaging and the brand’s commitment to clean, sustainable ingredients also resonate with me, adding to the overall experience. It lingers beautifully on the skin without being overpowering. I absolutely love getting whiffs of this fragrance through out my day! The gorgeous bottle looks stunning on my vanity!   ***This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my third scent from them and I'm bummed is an understatement. The scent notes are absolutely down to earth and so refreshing. It did not give me a headache not did have a very strong scent. When I sprayed the top notes hit really strong but then dries down to vetiver. That was the only scent I could smell all day. I was thinking of sandalwood being the on the main thing but it was barely noticeable. The packaging is absolutely gorgeous but the beautiful scent of sandalwood is not really fresh. It feels old

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am an avid beauty enthusiast. I love all things beauty, especially fragrance. I was excited with the initial first spray of this parfum. However, the dry down left little to be desired, unfortunately. This fragrance is unisex and tends to lean more to the masculine notes, in my opinion. I definitely detect notes of clove in this parfum, and although the scent is earthy, it is also fresh with a hint of spice.  The actual wear time of the fragrance was around 6 hrs for me. I think this scent can be worn all year round, but I feel it is more appropriate for the fall months.  This scent is perfect for the person looking for an earthy and fresh scent that is not too sweet or feminine smelling. Although I was not a big fan of the scent, I appreciate the uniqueness this scent brings and the unisex aspect of it. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Words cannot describe the love I have for Maison Louis Marie's No.04 parfum but I am going to try... Sandalwood is my favorite in both comfort and scent. This woodsy-romantic scent mixes warm sandalwood and cedar with spicy cinnamon, nutmeg, and earthy vetiver that is a true masterpiece!! It's a scent that feels comforting and familiar, perfect for fall! It evokes memories of summers up by my grandparents house playing out in the woods and it has just rained.  I found the scent to start soft and as it dries down, it builds to the most beautiful linger that will have you constantly smelling yourself. Like for hours, 5-6hrs to be exact!! I especially love wearing this on a rainy day, you'll have to try it to fully understand what I mean. It's woodys, earthy, fresh, refreshing, warm, romantic.. it's completely intoxicating!! You will receive endless compliments too!!   This has easily become my favorite Maison Louis Marie scent but definitely won't be the last one. I'm obsessed!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this parfum! The fragrance is elegant and sophisticated, with a perfect blend of floral and woody notes that make it both refreshing and warm. It has a long-lasting scent that stays with you throughout the day without being overpowering. The packaging is also beautiful, reflecting the high-quality and luxurious experience of the product. This review was collected as part of a promotion, but my opinions are genuinely reflective of how much I enjoy wearing this perfume. Highly recommend! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. I  really enjoy this scent!  It is giving fresh and clean and light and warm.  It is hard to pinpoint an exact scent because it just smells so good overall. It is a great light scent for everyday wear. I really think it would compliment almost anybody. I really enjoy the clean ingredients this company uses as well. Initially liking the product was great, but also after learning about the company and what it stands for it makes this product all that much better. The only drawback is that it is not very long-lasting. If you want to smell like this all day then you will definitely have to reapply, however I think it is due to the clean ingredients which I think is so much more important than the all day lasting scent. I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is amazing but doesn’t last. As soon as you spray it you can spray again. It literally evaporates. I have the oil version too and it is the same case unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm grateful to have the opportunity to try Maison Louis Marie no4 perfume. I love the story behind the brand & their mission to create beauty products that are clean, safe for customers & also the environment. I love that the scent is not overwhelming, it lasts throughout the day for me & sometimes catching a whiff of it, made me smile. This perfume is unisex but in my opinion, it leans more toward men's & too masculine for me. But this perfume blends great with others, I layered it with a rose perfume then with jasmine one ( my top 2 favorite scents)  & some  others, they all smelled wonderful. So have fun playing with it. Other than that, I love the perfume, the bottle is classic & beautiful, the packaging is eco friendly, minimal & chic.

reviews.review_title: High quality woody and earthy scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy trying different kinds of scents, but gravitate more towards florals in day to day life. Therefore, the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum represented an opportunity for me to make earthy and woody scents a more regular part of my routine. The product is a clear liquid. I applied one spray each behind my ears in the creases of my elbows. That was definitely enough to smell a strong combination of sandalwood and cedarwood. About an hour later, the woody scents started to settle in and I noticed the scent of vetiver emerging. A few hours after that, the amber wood overtook the vetiver. The quality of the scent was great, as it lasted through a day with a lot of moving around. I also think that this scent can be unisex. Overall, I feel that anyone looking for a high quality woody and earthy scent would appreciate this product.

reviews.review_title: Eau de Parfum No.04 Bois de Balincourt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing that I was curious about this scent was where did the name Bois de Balincourt from.  The name of Maison Louis Marie’s #4 comes from the founder's family home, Balincourt, which is surrounded by a forest a trail called Lover's Lane. Very French and romantic. As is the scent. The tradition of this company of using exquisite botanicals with no chemicals or toxins as many perfumes have makes all the difference in how it the scent is perceived by your nose. And others. It’s a delicate balance they have mastered.  This is a very woodsy earthy scent which I normally like to wear during the fall and winter months. They feel too heavy for me especially in the triple digit heat we’re having here in Las Vegas.  But this was lovely. I think the vétiver, which is earthy but can have an astringent quality is the key. There’s nothing heavy, overbearing, or too warm about this scent at all. I will wear this scent all year round.   This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fragrance enthusiast and I have picked up the habit of exploring different scents. I have come to learn that I like EDPs, scents that are strong, long lasting and can be layered. I like different notes including woody, floral, vanilla, amber, bergamot, and oriental. I was very excited to try the No. 04 Bois de Balincourt given its woody notes. I also really like that Mason Louis Marie is a clean brand that also gives back to the planet.  I first want to say that the packaging was very simplistic yet alluring. I loved that it had the notes written on the outer box. When I sprayed it, I initially felt like the top notes were too harsh and almost very masculine. I did not like the initial notes that I experienced. After the fragrance settled, it evolved into this warm and earthy smell. Like I was a forest, surrounded by gardens and woods. This, I was in love it. I also used it to layer it with a vanilla scented perfume and the outcome was electrifying.   When I first started using the scent, I did not like the top notes. However, with time, I got used to it and it didn’t bother me as much. I liked that I could layer it with different fragrances which produced good outcomes. However, for an EDP, it had very poor longevity and performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so familiar to me, yet I can’t quite place it. This means I keep smelling it, teasing at the memory, trying to make it come into focus. That’s a good way to make me fall in love with a fragrance.   At first spray it smells bright and clean, then it settles into green woody notes with some slight smoke and sweetness. It’s a lighter scent than I expected from the listed notes (cedar and sandalwood and spice), though it lasts fairly well on my skin. This is a fresh unisex scent that I could imagine working for anyone. It seems best-suited to spring and summer, but it could be worn year-round, especially if layered with a warmer scent.   The simplicity of the bottle only adds to the appeal: the clean lines echo the clean scent and clean ingredients. Monochrome labeling and the pared-down aesthetic show that sometimes simplicity is best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a perfume connoisseur, I was very excited to test out this perfume. I’m a huge fan of sandalwood so I was intrigued. The Maison Louis Marie No. 04 perfume was a product that didn't disappoint! I’ll first start off by saying that this perfume is definitely unisex. I can imagine both a woman or a man wearing this scent. Upon first spray, this perfume has a heavy hit of sandalwood mixed with other spicy notes. I will say that the opening wasn’t my favorite, but as it settled into my skin, the perfume became addicting. It settled into a soft musky smell, and I couldn’t stop smelling my wrist all day. I’ll admit that you have to have a woody scent profile, or it may be too overwhelming. I would recommend this perfume during the fall/winter season because of the heavy notes.   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a stay-at-home mom to two boys and love trying new products for skincare, makeup and hair care. I have recently started dabbling into perfumes and I am so glad I got to try this Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. The packaging is very clean, elegant, timeless and beautiful. I also love that they have the notes listed on the outer packaging so if you ever want to glance through, you have easy access. The perfume itself is a woody earthy scent that takes you to the outdoors, be it camping or hiking in the woods. You can definitely smell the sandalwood and cinnamon notes. It is quite strong and lasts for hours.. Overall, it is definitely a win for me and I recommend it for anyone who likes long lasting earthy/woody scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love all things beauty and enjoy trying out new scents. I really love the scent of Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, it is very earthy and has a lot of hints of wood, mainly from the top notes of sandalwood & cedarwood, and base note of amber wood. I also really like the fact that I can layer this. I have been layering it with no.14 and really enjoy the scent. It honestly made me like no.14 even more. As for the longevity of the scent I don’t feel like it lasts long, I personally can’t smell it anymore after just a little while. The packaging is simple but nice. I love that it tells you the notes that are in it, which is helpful to see if you’ll like it before even trying it out. The perfume bottle gets stuck in the box a little bit so I did have a little trouble with that and the cap pops off but overall I like it and it has an elegant yet simple bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second experience with Maison Louis Marie perfumes and I'm highly impressed with how they approach fragrance, nostalgic scent profiles, care for the environment, and timeless aesthetically pleasing glass bottles. This perfume, No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, has a powerful earthy profile with woodsy notes like sandalwood, amber, cedarwood, and nutmeg. At first, I was a little startled by how earthy the scent profile was upon spraying it for the first time, but I quickly grew to love it as the dried-down scent is almost musky and it reminds me of being in a forest. This isn't a floral garden nature scent, this is a true you're hiking in a remote and ancient forest woodsy scent. This scent is truly unisex, but if you're not used to earthy scent profiles, you may feel like it leans more masculine. I like to vary my perfumes so I enjoy this aspect and because it's a layering scent, I can play up the masculine or feminine elements with other perfumes layered on top. I've really enjoyed adding some sweeter floral/vanilla perfumes on top and it's created a really unique scent profile. My husband and I both wore this out and enjoyed the long-lasting scent and how well it projects. I highly recommend this for my woodsy scent lovers and appreciate how Maison Louis Marie captures timeless and nostalgic scents in beautiful packaging.

This brand is considered a clean luxury fragrance line. I love the brand’s philosophy; they do not use harmful ingredients for the environment nor for the body. From the packaging to the bottle, it’s such a luxurious product. The scent is woody with hints of florals. This brand says that their fragrances are unisex, and I would agree, although in my opinion, this scent leans a little more on the masculine side to me. I like that this scent isn’t too strong which is a plus for me since I’m more of a fan of mellow scents. Even though this scent isn’t too strong, it does fade throughout the day but I honestly don’t mind. The instruction recommends spraying on areas where there isn’t friction/rubbing (knees/elbows) so that the fragrance last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is a gorgeous and unique fragrance.  Two of my favorite notes, sandalwood and amber wood, are in this fragrance, which explains why I love it so much. It has a woody and earthy scent that is sophisticated, cozy, and beautiful. My first impression was that it felt unique and somewhat soothing.  It layers beautifully with other fragrances, and the packaging is stunning—minimalistic yet elegant.  I was also impressed by its lasting power; it lasted for many hours without needing to reapply.   The first time I wore it was for a family gathering, and I received so many compliments! Since then, I’ve been wearing it every day, and it exceeds my expectations every time.  My final thought is that it is a must-try fragrance that provides a luxurious experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not that I expect anyone to be paying attention to the Chronicles of Cait, but if you happen to have come across me, you might know that a goal of mine for 2024 was to become a fragrance girlie and maybe even find my signature scent - and guess what?!We have a winner!  It feels like Maison Louis Marie No. 4 was created for me, but specifically the fiery Aries part of me that owns an abundance of combat boots and sundresses. No.04 Bois de Balincourt really helps me feel the balance between my masculine and feminine energies, which I think represents my personality and sense of style thoroughly. I have always told people my favorite scent is “sun warmed evergreen trees”. It puts me completely at peace and takes me back to the best parts of my childhood. No.4 brings me that kind of nostalgia with the combination of cedar wood and sandalwood.  The warm spices are just enough to bring me confidence and vetiver just speaks to my soul.  The combination reminds me a bit of ozone, in a sweet and earthy tone. I don’t think it’s a coincidence the notes of this scent come from a group of plants that’s are spiritually affiliated with grounding, peace, and happiness. This little hedge witch will be wearing Maison Louis Marie No.4 until further notice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is a vegan, paraben-free scent that exudes warm and earthy notes. This layerable fragrance is genderless and perfect for anyone looking for a unique and long-lasting scent. The blend of sandalwood, vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon and cedarwood creates a rich and inviting aroma that is perfect for any occasion.  I like that this sprays a fine mist which allows me to control the intensity of the perfume. I highly recommend this fragrance for those who appreciate high-quality, natural scents that last. This lovely fragrance comes in a beautiful presentation box that  makes an elegant gift or keep this for yourself. Give it a try and experience the luxury of Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt for yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm Ashley and I have loved perfume and fragrance for the past decade!  This MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a beautiful fresh scent! It is a clean, lovely scent with hints of Sandalwood and Amber which create the most beautiful balance. I would say this perfume is an amazing cross between a fresh yet warm and cozy woody scent. If any of those are in your preferred sent profile, I think you will love this perfume!  I also love the packaging of this perfume. The bottle looks clean and elegant and is perfect to keep on display on my perfume shelf. The luxurious feel of the bottle and product inside really elevates the experience using this product even more! This perfume has quickly become one of my absolute favorite fragrances in my entire collection, and that's saying a lot!  I think anyone who enjoys clean, fresh, cozy or woody scents would absolutely love this fragrance. I have recommended it to so many friends and family already and everyone has loved it!   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The woody scent of Bois de Balincourt is very unique. I have never tried anything like it. The earthy almost grounded scent profile is very welcoming and reminded me of warm summer rain in my hometown. I tried layering the Bois de Balincourt with a light crisp floral fragrance. This for me felt like I was inhaling summer. It almost felt like smelling the earthy woody plant and light crisp flowers together and was very enjoyable. While I really enjoyed the scent by itself and layered, the fragrance is a little mild and did not last very long for me. When layered, it was overpowered by the scent of the floral fragrance which lingered longer. Saying that the scent profile of the Bois de Balincourt was well worth the respritzing for me. I would wear this fragrance during the summer as a day time perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt EDP by Maison Louie Marie is a light earthy yet elegant smelling fragrance. Its notes are truly unique, it’s woodsy with a hint of sweetness! And the packaging itself is just elegant yet minimalistic. It’s definitely a unisex fragrance because I can truly see anyone wearing it and not think it lean more one way than the other.  I love that I can smell it on myself all day. I get so many compliments when I wear any Maison fragrances. I can’t wait to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a seasoned cosmetologist and lover of fine fragrances, I've discovered a gem in MAISON LOUIS MARIE's No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. From the moment I spritzed this fragrance, I was transported to a serene forest glade, surrounded by the subtle interplay of cedarwood and sandalwood notes. The scent unfolds gracefully, revealing hints of spicy cinnamon and earthy tones, creating a harmonious balance that lingers throughout the day. What I adore most about this perfume is its versatility. Whether I'm heading to work or attending an evening class, its warm and comforting aura never fails to uplift my spirits. The longevity is impressive, staying true to its essence from morning well into the evening without overpowering. The elegant simplicity of its packaging complements its sophisticated blend, making it a staple on my vanity or a perfect gift for anyone who appreciates understated luxury. MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum has certainly earned its place among my favorites, embodying both timeless elegance and the tranquility of nature in every spritz. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is delightful. It perfectly suits my busy lifestyle as a full-time working mom and blogger. This scent, part of the earthy and woody family, is warm and inviting, making it an everyday essential. From the first spray, you’ll notice the comforting aroma of sandalwood, paired beautifully with cedarwood. There’s also a hint of spicy cinnamon and nutmeg, adding a cozy touch that feels like a warm hug. Maison Louis Marie have definitely nailed it with this one. Plus, I love the fact that it’s free from phthalates, parabens, sulfates, and it’s cruelty-free, so I feel good about using it. As a mom always on the go, I appreciate how this perfume makes me feel put together and confident, no matter how hectic my day is. It’s a little luxury that fits perfectly into my everyday routine, and I can’t recommend it enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have previously tried their No. 14 and have absolutely loved it. Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum has also surprisingly made me fall in love. It did come on as too strong for me at first as I was not too fond of woody scents. However, as soon as it settles it just grips you and takes you to a feeling of lush jungle. This one has simply stolen my heart and never thought I could love a woody scent. The mix of sandalwood, cedarwood, and spices gives you an intoxicating sense. It does not make me feel overwhelmed and is neither too strong. It is as elegant as it gets and I am glad to have found this fragrance. The packaging is minimalist and feels luxurious  and elegant. I you are someone who does not like woody or spicy scents, do give this a try once and you will fall in love. I have definitely added it to my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing goddess like scent with the earthy notes, yet sexy at the same time! I have had this for over a week and it's absolutely replaced all of my favorite scents lately. I love the notes in this especially the sandalwood and amber scents as they tend to be my favorite. The dry down is my favorite on my skin, as it brings out a warmer combined scent that smells fresh and clean yet woodsy and mysterious. I feel like a goddess wearing this scent and I have received so many compliments while wearing this out. I'm in my mid 30's and this is a classy yet very unique scent that I am proud to have in my collection. I enjoy that it is unisex as well, it smells so delicious on my husband when I have sprayed it on him as well. The scent lasts through the day without being overpowering which I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a perfume lover! Even better for me if it's a unisex fragrance because although I appreciate all scents, I enjoy more masculine fragrances.  The Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt is a perfect scent for me: warm, woodsy, and a tad earthy. The cedarwood is prominent as the top note then as it dries down, it lightly sweetens to Amber wood.   The best part of the final dry down stage is that this fragrance smells very clean on me. Unfortunately, the fragrance didn't last very long on my skin   I sprayed this on my partner before going outside on a hot day. It smelled so different on him. The Sandalwood was more prominent as the top note, I could smell the cinnamon and nutmeg on him opposed to how it wore on me and it became really sweet on him; I liked it.   The fragrance wore longer on him than it did on me, so I layered mine with other fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a big perfume collection and this one is completely different to all of them, is 100% unisex and all year round, but I could say that is a little bit more masculine, at least on me smell more masculine, I like it but the performance is very poor, probably last around of 4 hours, so you need to reapply it trough the day. It’s very fresh but with a hint of spicyness, this perfume is perfect for any men or for a woman that enjoy this type of fragrances, I’ll wait until fall - winter because it will be a great match to wear it when the weather gets down.  The bottle and the mist I’ll say is just ok nothing impressive, the cap is a bit loose not sure if my bottle came defective or that’s the way they are. In conclusion is a good fragrance? Yes, not a good sillage, is a bit pricey for what you get and it’s definitely more masculine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello my name is enas im a mom of three children i love trying new fragrance . The classic luxurious bottle looks great on my Dressers. absolutely adore No.04 Bois de Balincourt by Maison Louis Marie. From the moment I first applied it, I was captivated by its perfectly balanced woody aroma. The sandalwood and cedarwood notes create a beautiful foundation that's both rugged and cozy. As the fragrance develops, the spicy cinnamon and nutmeg complex emerges, adding depth and intrigue without overpowering the woods.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie’s No.04 Bois de Balincourt fragrance was an absolute favorite of mine. I immediately fell in love with the sandalwood & cedarwood notes. It’s beautiful on its own, but I personally layer it with other floral fragrances that I have. It adds a level of depth & sophistication. I would say that it is more of a fall/winter fragrance, I personally would not wear it during the warm summer. Nevertheless, it is a very unique fragrance that truly lasts all day and settles beautifully on the skin. I love the fact that it is genderless, so anyone will be able to enjoy it. Maison Louis Marie fragrances have easily become some of my all-time favorite ad they are truly luxurious & sophisticated. I am beyond excited to continue to wear No.04 & to continue to fall in love with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hi my name is Emily . I’m a 30 something who works in tech by day and loves beauty reviewing and playing by night . I love all things beauty , skincare for antiaging and acne and makeup  .  I wasn’t sure what to expect at first with notes like sandalwood and vetiver but I like both so I was excited .  It’s such a rich beautiful woody scent .  Just one spray on wrist lasted all day long . I really enjoy how it smells on me , the woody vibe makes me feel fierce .  It smells really good on its on . I did also try with a floral scent and they mixed together so well . It really brought out the woody notes even more . I am a lot of floral scents and scents that aren’t unique . I like that this is different from any other perfume I’ve used .  It’s fierce but not over baring. It can hold its on or be used to mixed and create a signature scent .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance enthusiast always on the lookout for unique scents, I'm absolutely in love with Maison Louis Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. This earthy and woody scent has quickly become my go-to for everyday wear!  The packaging is elegant and simple, perfectly reflecting the brand's clean luxury approach. The bottle feels luxurious in my hand and looks beautiful on my vanity. The spray nozzle distributes the perfect amount of fragrance with each press.  What really sets this perfume apart is its delicate yet captivating scent profile. I apply 1-2 sprays to my pulse points. I particularly love how it smells on my wrists and neck. The scent develops beautifully throughout the day, becoming a part of my personal signature.  One of the things I appreciate most about this fragrance is its versatility. It's perfect for any time of day and suits various occasions. Whether I'm heading to the office or going out for dinner, this scent always feels appropriate and enhances my overall presence.  The longevity of this perfume is impressive. I find that it lasts well throughout the day, with the earthy notes lingering pleasantly on my skin. It's not overpowering, but rather creates a subtle, inviting aura around me.  For anyone looking for a sophisticated, earthy scent that's both unique and wearable, I can't recommend No.04 Bois de Balincourt enough. It's more than just a perfume; it's a sensory experience that elevates my daily routine. Trust me, once you try this fragrance, you'll be captivated by its charm. This eau de parfum has become an essential part of my personal style, and I'm absolutely in love with how it makes me feel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a fragrance lover and enjoy many different notes, sometimes loud and robust, bright and floral, or sultry and dark. Whether it is masculine, feminine, or neutral I will willingly try it as long as it has notes that appeal to me. This one No.04 - Bois de Balincourt from Maison Louis Marie had the appeal of many notes I enjoy such as - sandalwood, cedar wood, vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon, and Amber wood.  In my opinion this fragrance is neutral. It has a bright, light scent. The sandalwood and amber wood stand out to me the most. I do wish it had a bit more staying power, but overall it’s a nice perfume. Fragrance is subjective, and everyone experiences it in their own way, but if you’re looking to try something different I definitely recommend giving this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A sexy woody scent that is perfect for layering. This scent can be worn causally or dressed up. Incredible when layering with other smoky scents. Incredibly unisex and will have others complimenting ypu!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this perfume because I really like all the scent notes and I expected it to be very elegant. Unfortunately, I was very wrong. It’s way more earthy than I was expecting and it seems very one-note. There’s not a lot of complexity to the fragrance when I spray it on my skin. I also should mention that this perfume does not last very long at all. It is gone within like 10 minutes after spraying. I was very disappointed with this because I know Maison Louis Marie usually makes amazing perfumes, but this one absolutely misses the mark. When I put this on, my boyfriend absolutely hated the smell and asked me not to put this on again, which I found funny because I had the same negative reaction. Overall, I definitely would not recommend this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got my hands on Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt, and let me tell you, it’s like a walk through an enchanted forest.   Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: Sandalwood, Cedarwood Mid Notes: Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon Base Notes: Amber Wood  The first spritz hits me with a warm, woody embrace of sandalwood and cedarwood. It’s like stepping into a cozy cabin surrounded by towering trees. As it settles, the spicy hints of nutmeg and cinnamon start to dance around, adding a touch of warmth and intrigue. Finally, the earthy vetiver and rich amber wood linger, creating a scent that’s both grounding and luxurious.   What It Reminds Me Of: This fragrance takes me back to a magical trail called “Lover’s Lane” near my childhood home. Imagine walking hand-in-hand with someone special, the air filled with the scent of the forest, leaves crunching underfoot, and the sun casting a golden glow through the trees. It’s nostalgic and romantic, like a cherished memory bottled up.  The last time I wore Bois de Balincourt was on a crisp evening. I was out for a dinner date, and as soon as I walked into the restaurant, I got compliments on how amazing I smelled. It made me feel confident and a bit mysterious, like I had a secret woodland escape that only I knew about. Plus, the scent lasted all night, subtly evolving and keeping me enchanted with every whiff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so glad I got to finally get my hands on this fragrance! I’ve heard a lot in the fragrance community about this scent! Maison louis Marie boasts this fragrance as one of their top sellers and I can see why. Number 4 is known for its similar DNA as le labo Santal 33 with notes of sandalwood cedarwood and veviter. I love that anyone can wear this scent and smell great! I personally thought it leaned a little more masculine than I prefer, so I sweeten it up with some vanilla perfume oil or my top favorite from the brand, number 14, Ilica. Those two combined make a sexy woodsy spicy scent that makes me want to hug myself!! I love this fragrance now in July, but would prefer to let it shine the most in the cooler months. The cinnamon note would definitely be amazing to smell around thanksgiving. The scent trail is pretty big and the longevity is eternal!  *this is my HONEST incentivized review.

reviews.review_title: A must have for the collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t so sure I would like this fragrance because of all of the notes combined. I thought it would be a heavily woody  fragrance, but the total opposite.   Top notes are Sandalwood and Cedar; middle notes are Vetiver, Nutmeg and Cinnamon; base notes are Woody Notes and Amber.  This fragrance can honestly be great on anyone. It’s truly unisex even down to its DNA. I think that’s what I love most about it! Most unisex scents either lean more masculine or more feminine. This one is a great balance.       I also think it provides excellent projection & sillage. I didn’t care to layer this, instead I used an unscented moisturizer and sprayed it on top of my freshly moisturized skin.    I would 100% purchase this fragrance again and would highly recommend this brand.

reviews.review_title: The Fragrance I Didn't know I Needed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum was such a surprise in the best of ways. It'is truly the fragrance I did not know I absolutely needed! This scent is definitely one of my favorites ever. It's next level in every way: the juice is so rich and alluring, I really love it. The sandalwood and cedarwood blend is not overpowering in any way. Instead, it's perfectly balanced with cinnamon, nutmeg and vetiver. I also love how much of a statement the scent makes with just one spray. It has great staying power and the dry down is lovely, grounded with some hints of musk somehow. I especially love the modernity of the overall presentation, the elegance of the glass bottle, and the luxuriousness of the outer packaging. I also love the sophistication of the brand name!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking to elevate your fragrance collection look no further because the NO. 04 Maision is just what you need. I have been using the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum these last couple of days and I have really been enjoying this scent!  This scent is a mix of fabulous and luxury. It has a sandalwood aroma, although there is a subtle hint of cinnamon and nutmeg which adds a lovely twist to the smell. I wore this perfume all day Friday including my engagement party in the evening and I was pleasantly surprised with how long it lasts throughout the day without needing to reapply.  I also received a ton of compliments on how good I smelled! If you are looking for something feminine but not overly girly or if you need something for a special occasion I would highly suggest this perfume!

reviews.review_title: A Perfect Blend of Elegance and Warmth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, and I’m in love! The scent is a perfect blend of fresh and warm notes that feel both elegant and unique.  When I first put it on, I noticed a burst which was refreshing and a little spicy. As it settled, I could smell the lovely floral notes, which added a nice, delicate touch.  The best part is the base notes. The sandalwood and cedarwood give it a warm, woody feel, and it lasts beautifully on the skin. It’s a scent that works great for any occasion, whether it’s a day at work or a night out.  I’ve gotten so many compliments while wearing this perfume, and I love how it’s noticeable without being too strong. The bottle is also really pretty and looks great on my vanity.  Overall, Maison Louis Marie No.4 is a fantastic fragrance that feels both classic and modern. I highly recommend it if you’re looking for something special and different!  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have recently been on a hunt for new fragrances for my and Maison Louis Marie’s no. 4 Bois de Balincourt eau de parfum is a new lovely discovery. The packaging is simple and yet so elegant. The perfume came in a flatter box that easy to open, the perfume came out and the cap was easy to take off. When I first spritzed I thought it was strong but the next day it’s almost as if it changed! The scent was so light and lovely. I got hit with the cinnamon and the cedarwood in the best of ways, then I got its warmth and I was sold.  It is a great day fragrance in my opinion, I loved layering it with my Maison Louis Marie’s no. 14 Icila perfume, it makes it a brand new scent! Lovely and long lasting. I got many compliments on this combination. As I mentioned no. 4 is still great on its own and I would recommend playing and layering to give it even more depth. It is definitely a great scent and I continue to be amazed by this brand and their fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Now I love perfumes I have at least over 20 bottles in my collections. From sweet to clean to fresh but nothing really earthy like. I have never tried anything really containing a type of wood scent to it. The packaging is pretty plain which i love for this collection it gives dainty! I love the bottle shape and the size is also nice. The notes are giving Woodsy, clean and slightly mysterious. It is Definitely more unisex/masculine-leaning but I love that in this fragrance, and the scent of the perfume develops nicely on the skin and lasts for hours. People always ask me what do I have on and usually pick it up for themselves! I also love that it’s not just straight sandalwood but rather a thoughtful bouquet designed to be evocative of a specific, dreamy time and place. My mom has already tried to steal it from me I would give it a solid 9/10.

reviews.review_title: A MUST-have fragrance for every season!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first glance of the perfume you are greeted by elegance and I was ecstatic to give this perfume a try. The packaging has a minimalistic style which I thought it was gorgeous. The bottle has a beautiful shape and comfortable carrying size. The perfume is very easy to open and apply. Once you spray the fragrance, you are surrounded by a delicious smell of earthy, cedarwood, sandalwood and amber wood that linger dedicatedly in the air. I used it alone and also layered with another fresh scent, which sparked compliments from my spouse and other friends. I showed my spouse the perfume and he liked it as well. I thought was clever how I can be easily see him wear that too, opening the possibility of a gift for him in the future. The perfume lasted me several hours and it was very enjoyable. I will definitely be wearing this fragrance all year round. I am very pleased with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a perfume lover and this is the second perfume I have owned from Maison Louis Marie. This perfume No.04 has a pleasant smell. It smells fresh and woody. I like that it is not overpowering. It smells so great all day and I get compliments from people on what I wear. It has a woody and earthy scent which is great for Summer. This is my favorite scent of this brand. I spray 2 pumps and it lasts so long. It can be worn day and night. The packaging is simple, yet elegant and luxurious. I love the design of this perfume. I highly recommend this perfume to anyone who loves the natural scent. I love that it is a vegan perfume which is great for my sensitive skin. My skin sometimes gets sensitive because of harsh ingredients, but this perfume has no issue.

reviews.review_title: I really like it! I’ll wear it a lot during autumn
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time to try Maison Louis Marie and I was not disappointed at all. To start with the packaging, the bottle is very sturdy and feels luxurious. I also love how much the brand cares about the environment and has initiatives to give back. The top was a little loose, but that might have been due to transport. As for the scent, it’s a very woodsy and romantic scent. I feel like this is unisex and can be worn by anyone! I enjoy scents like that a lot because I feel like it requires a more complex scent profile. The Cedarwood, sandalwood, and nutmeg really come through! There’s also cinnamon and Amber as well which really just adds so much to it. I’ve been applying this to my pulse points and enjoy the perfume very much. The only downside is that it doesn’t last as long as I thought it would. However, if you layer it with the perfume oil or another perfume oil, then the scent lasts longer.

reviews.review_title: Maison Louis Marie is Cruelty Free
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am fifty-one and enjoy wearing parfum.   I was excited to try Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum because the brand is both cruelty free and environmentally friendly.   I love the long-lasting fragrance.  The sandalwood, cedarwood, spicy cinnamon, spicy nutmeg, and earthy vetiver fragrance calms my mind and soothes my spirit. The fragrance makes me feel beautiful, sophisticated, confident, and adventurous. The warm fragrance profile reminds me of snuggling with my pups while sipping on a glass of wine and reading a mystery novel.  I love that the fragrance is unisex so my husband and I both can enjoy wearing it. I love that the fragrance is for both day and night and all four seasons.  I feel good about wearing Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum because Maison Louis Marie is both cruelty free and environmentally friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Over the past week and a half, I have had the opportunity to use Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum extensively. Initially, I was intrigued by its description as a unisex scent, promising a blend of light yet potent notes. However, my experience turned out to be quite different. The fragrance, while undeniably light, carried an overpowering presence of cedar and sandalwood. These woodsy notes dominated the scent profile, making it lean heavily towards a more traditionally masculine aroma rather than a balanced unisex one.  I made several attempts to integrate this perfume into my routine, experimenting with spraying it on different parts of my body to see if the scent would mellow out or blend differently with my skin. Despite these efforts, the persistent woodsy aroma was too overwhelming for my liking. In fact, it was so potent that it led to headaches on more than one occasion, which made wearing it an uncomfortable experience.  Reflecting on this, I would rate my experience with Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum as a 1 out of 5. This rating is primarily due to the overpowering nature of the cedar and sandalwood notes, which overshadowed any other potential nuances in the fragrance. However, I recognize that scent preferences are highly subjective. If you are someone who enjoys the robust, earthy combination of sandalwood and cedar, this perfume might be exactly what you're looking for. Unfortunately, it just wasn't the right fit for me.

reviews.review_title: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a cosmetics critic who enjoys opulent scents, I recently took Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum on a week-long adventure. I was excited to try this sandalwood fragrance because I have experience appreciating the subtleties of high-end perfumes as a beauty lover and product critic. I'm happy to have added Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt to my collection of fragrances. The refined scent of its sandalwood foundation, enhanced by cedarwood, cinnamon, nutmeg, and vetiver, ages gracefully throughout the day. I found that the aroma stayed present for several hours after using it as directed, which was 1-2 sprays on pulse points. My favorite scent for both daytime and evening wear is now this one. This scent is a really captivating sensory experience. I was welcomed by a warm, woodsy scent—dominated by cedarwood and sandalwood—that made me feel sophisticated and at ease upon first spritz. While earthy vetiver grounded the scent, spicy overtones of cinnamon and nutmeg offered a delicate richness. The perfume took me on a pleasant journey as it developed on my skin, beginning with strong woods and spices and ending with a harmonic blend that remained for a very long time.  It would appeal to both men and women who like unisex perfumes because of its well-balanced composition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so good. It is so simple yet so complex and sophisticated.  Now, if you don't like woody or earthy fragrances, this is not for you. It really smells like spending time outside amongst the tree and nature.  For my nose, the cedarwood is super dominant at first. As that goes away, vetiver, cinnamon, and nutmeg really come through along with a woody amber. I can sometimes smell a sweetness from the cinnamon mixed with the amber come through.  This is a really lovely genderless fragrance that I think will work on almost anyone. It's also a fragrance you can layer with other ones!  My only feedback is that the cap is very loose. There is no snap when I go to put the cap on and comes off way too easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion - As a fan of Maison Louis Marie's commitment to clean, luxurious fragrances, my expectations for the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum were high. Known for their environmentally friendly practices and ethical standards, Maison Louis Marie has consistently delivered products that not only smell wonderful but also respect our planet.  The No.04 Bois de Balincourt stands out with its strong sandalwood base, enhanced by a robust cedarwood presence. This woody foundation is intricately laced with a spicy blend of cinnamon and nutmeg, adding a warmth that is both comforting and sophisticated. An undercurrent of earthy vetiver adds depth, making the fragrance rich and enveloping.  Despite the high quality and complexity of the scent, it turns out that sandalwood is not quite my cup of tea. There is a particular quality to this fragrance that does not resonate well with my olfactory senses. This personal preference means I won’t be keeping this perfume for myself.  Although the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum from Maison Louis Marie is not a match for me, its craftsmanship and the brand's ethical approach to fragrance production are beyond reproach. I appreciate the brand's dedication to not using ingredients that are harmful to the environment or the body, their stance against animal testing, and their avoidance of animal-derived components. This perfume will surely delight someone who favors woody, spicy scents, and I am pleased to pass it on to a friend who adores this fragrance profile. Maison Louis Marie continues to uphold the standards of luxury and responsibility, making them a commendable choice for fragrance enthusiasts.

reviews.review_title: Love the brand, not this scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 34 year old beauty enthusiast and I especially love the world of fragrance! Having tried and loved another Maison Louis Marie perfume, I was excited to try Bois de Balincourt. Upon first spray however, I discovered this scent was not for me personally. Scent is a very subjective and personal thing and body chemistries vary from person to person and can drastically alter scent profiles, so take this review with a grain of salt.  I have several perfumes I love that contain similar woody notes to No.4, but this one smells completely different. To me, this perfume exudes a spicy and peppery note that is reminiscent of that “old man cologne” smell. While it’s touted as a unisex scent, I feel like it’s very masculine and has no femininity to it whatsoever. Also, this feels like it would be more appropriate to wear in the fall and winter than in the warmer months.  A positive to note is that if you do enjoy this scent, the longevity is next level, it lasts all day long and projects extremely well. While I don’t love this scent, the brand behind the scent is incredible and I encourage you to do some research on them.  If you want to try out this brand or want a more feminine scent, I highly recommend testing out No.14 Icila. It’s a dark vanilla plum that is delicious and garners so many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Mason Louis Marie No. o4-Bois de Balincourt is such an delectable product. When I received the perfume, I opened the box and couldn’t believe how beautiful it was. It definitely comes in a high end box and bottle for an elegant look.  It is an Eau de Parfum in a bottle which contains 1.7 ounces. It looks completely gorgeous displayed on my bathroom shelf. As far as the scent, it smells heavenly. It has a floral scent, which my husband went crazy for. Right after I sprayed it on, I immediately was complimented by my family. I found this perfume was my immediate go-to every day, after I received it. I am in love with the Mason Louis Marie No. 04-I will continue to use this. I feel like 1 million bucks when I put this on and constantly get compliments. Five stars from me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Usually, I reserve any spicy woody scents for the fall/winter season. I love this scent family to be layered with gourmand or other spicy scents. This is the first time I've experienced a perfect wood scent for summer. The initial whiff you are met with pure greenery as it evolves the fresher it becomes; citrus transforms into a warm amber scentsation. Even though citrus notes are not listed, I can swear I recognize a lemon note in there, providing this scent with great balance. The cinnamon note is also another great addition; providing that summer zing. This fragrance can be adapted to anyone, perfectly genderless.  I don't usually gravitate to vetiver but this is a great introduction to ease my fellow gourmand enthusiasts. I recommend layering it with NEST's Golden Nectar and Madagascar Vanilla if you want to skew warmer. If you wish to bloom brighter I recommend layering it with Malin + Goetz's Bergamot or Maison Louis Marie No.14 Icila Perfume Oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt EDP. This is truly unique and different from anything I’ve smelled before. Yet, it’s somehow familiar with its warm and inviting allure. For me, the draw is both the top notes and its lingering heart. No. 4 opens with a crisp, bright freshness that is light, but grounded in a weightless woodiness. It reminds me of the cleanness after a fresh rain in an open forest. As the fragrance settles, it draws you in even closer with a lasting cinnamon rapture. From heart to base notes, No. 4 has a warmth that deepens from nutmeg, vetiver, and amber wood. This is a lovely fragrance that is a mix of everything— bright, fresh, warm, spicy, a little earthy, a little musky. And surprisingly, it all comes together in a perfect balance. It’s a versatile scent that could easily be worn by any gender as it has hints of both a perfume and cologne— let your skin chemistry work its magic! No. 4 hugs close to the skin, making it workplace friendly while imprinting a lasting scent profile on your skin. Do note that spraying less is more with this one— to keep the balance of being grounded and light, without ever being too heavy. In addition to the fragrance, I also love its overall presentation. The clean, simple, elegant aesthetic mirrors the clean profile of its ingredients. MLM No. 4 Bois de Balincourt EDP is an excellent choice for those who appreciate a unique, versatile, alluring scent. (This review was collected as part of a promotion).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfume is a woody fragrance that's sure to delight. With top notes of cinnamon and nutmeg, the scent is warm and inviting, setting the stage for the cedarwood and sandalwood accord that follows. The heart of the fragrance is where things get really interesting, with the earthy vetiver note adding depth and complexity to the scent. The result is a fragrance that's both familiar and unique, with a blend of notes that work together in perfect harmony. The longevity is impressive, with the fragrance lingering on my skin for around 6-8 hours. The sillage is moderate, making it perfect for everyday wear. I'm really enjoying the MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfume. It's a great choice for anyone looking for a woody fragrance that's both masculine and sophisticated.  ** This review was collected as part of a promotion**

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Woody & earthy fragrances can often times be off putting but the blend of sandalwood and velvetier results in a truly intoxicating scent. You can truly where this anytime, anywhere. It also layers very well with other lergumez. I cannot wait to get the other variations!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie's No. 4 Bois de Balincourt is a captivating woody fragrance that beautifully blends warm sandalwood and cedarwood with hints of spice and earthiness. Earthy vetiver rounds out the scent, making it both sophisticated and intriguing. Some may find this scent subtle, but I find that it lingers for hours and perfect for on the go application. This is a truly unisex fragrance. Bois de Balincourt transcends traditional gender norms, making it perfect for anyone who appreciates a touch of sophistication. It is a versatile scent that can be dressed up for a night out or worn casually for everyday use. If you are looking for a fragrance that is both intriguing and sophisticated, then look no further than Maison Louis Marie's No. 4 Bois de Balincourt!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt smells absolutely amazing! I am a huge fan of the sandalwood scent and they have mastered it! This perfume is very gender neutral and I think anyone can rock this perfume. The sandalwood and cedarwood being the top note makes those specifically very apparent but that is as expected! I can confirm it is very woody and has a musky scent to it so if this is something you are into, I think you’ll love this perfume! I think it can be layered as well. For a more feminine smell I suggest going floral and for a more masculine smell I suggest going with something citrus or tobacco. If you don’t want to layer with another perfume, I suggest layering with a lotion or soap. I love getting a whiff of this throughout the day, as this perfume does tend to last long! I definitely recommend giving this perfume a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy to try this scent as the notes really got my attention! I am a huge fan of sandalwood so it is no surprise that this scent is a win for me. The scent reminds me slightly of some of the Jo Malone fragrances, but slightly more sophisticated. I would say that this scent has a hint of sultriness that works well when going for a night out like a dinner. Overall, the fragrance is a great blend of warm and woody notes with some sweetness. My husband didn’t like the scent when I sprayed it on him, but on me he said it smelled pretty nice and not overbearing. I have also received a few compliments when I wore this out and people were wondering what it was.  When wearing this fragrance, I feel sophisticated, mysterious yet also casual and ready to take on the day. The only downfall for me is that it does not have the longest lasting power. I feel like by the time I get home, I don’t smell it. I may need to try the oil to see if the scent lasts longer because I do really like it. Since the scent is unique, I would definitely recommend this for anyone that is in market for a new perfume especially one that works perfectly for the summer time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sometimes you have to give a perfume a real try before you just decide you dont like it.  I would normally not be in love with the idea of a perfume that boasts to have notes of Sandalwood but Im so happy I had the opportunity to fall in love with this their best selling scent no. 4.  They make candles and room fresheners and even deodorant and I can just imagine how lovely it would be to be always smelling this super fresh summery fragrance all over my house and my body.  The story of the company is just as lovely and fresh as their fragrances.  It’s hard to want to purchase a scent online and the packaging is very minimal but No. 4 to me will be my number one favorite.  Im a hairdresser and I think it’s really inappropriate to have an obnoxious perfume all over you but I really love this one and my clients noticed as well that I had something new and fresh.  Im so pleased. It will leave you smiling for a week and the price point is so affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is stunning, versatile, and effortless to wear. The primary accord of cedarwood and sandalwood creates a rich, enveloping, comforting, and sophisticated warmth. Adding a spicy cinnamon and nutmeg complex adds a delightful layer of complexity, evoking a sense of nostalgia and refined elegance. The earthy vetiver note grounds the fragrance, providing a balanced depth that lingers beautifully on the skin. This sandalwood fragrance is an olfactory journey through a timeless forest, where each note is meticulously composed to enchant the senses. Perfect for those who appreciate a sophisticated, woody scent, this fragrance is also ideal for summer and pairs beautifully with less sweet fragrances for colder months. I wholeheartedly recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.  I recently tried out the Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt and love the packaging! I was so impressed with the whole package, from the cute box to the minimalistic yet elegant bottle. I love how it looks with the rest of my perfume collection.   This eau de parfum has an earthy and woody scent with its keynotes being sandalwood, vetiver, and amber wood. There was also a slight hit of cinnamon and nutmeg. With just a few sprays, the parfum gives off a sophisticated and delicate fragrance smell and is perfect for everyday use. I tried on the parfum and noticed the scent lasted all day without being overbearing which is a big win to me as many other parfumes fade within just an hour or two.  This is also perfect for traveling as it’s under the 3.4oz travel bottle TSA requirement. I’ll definitely be adding this to my vacation travel bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No. 4 perfume is such an elegant fragrance. There is something so familiar and comforting in this scent. The woodsy opening brings back some fond memories of camping in the woods. I'm especially reminded of the morning after a night of heavy rainfall; the mixture of the wet ground and earthy trees fill the air. The sandalwood really shines in the opening of this perfume. There is a warmth that is just so endearing. I enjoy the subtle spiciness of the cinnamon and nutmeg; I find it adds character and sparks joy to my senses. Once the dry down comes along, I find it to be such a gentle and powdery skin scent. This fragrance is a great option for unisex perfume. I don't find that it leans too feminine or masculine. The perfume bottle itself is beautiful and minimalistic and the sleek bottle looks wonderful on my vanity. The spray nozzle is also quite nice; it gives a fine mist that helps me cover a better portion of my neck. As for longevity, this perfume lasts on my skin for 5 to 6 hours. I can even get whiffs of it lingering on my skin into the next morning as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this perfume exceeded my expectations and is a fantastic choice for anyone looking to add a touch of elegance to their fragrance collection. The fragrance is sophisticated and has a calming, yet classy, effect. The blend of cedarwood, sandalwood, and the spicy notes creates a truly enchanting aroma.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While I love floral scents, I am also a huge fan of earthy and woody scents too!   The Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is such a nice addition to my fragrance collection. Since the day I got this, I have been reaching out to this one everyday while getting ready. The sandalwood fragrance reminds me of the temple at my home town that had sandalwood burning and the calmness it brought.   The fragrance is not too overpowering although it may be a bit intense when sprayed at first, but once it settles it softens the scent.   Another nice feature is this is a gender neutral perfume and the bottle and packaging is sleek and elegant!  I also really appreciate the brand’s sustainability initiatives and the fact that it is a clean brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a perfume and colognes collector and love finding new scents that I just love. I usually go into stores and try them first so I was excited to get this one as a surprise smell. I wasn’t disappointed at with it. The top notes are sandalwood and cedar wood which I love. It’s not too overwhelming and lasts all day. I love the fact that it’s unisex as well. I would honestly say that it leans more towards women personally but you never know what individuals like so I would just try it yourself and see.   I love the fact that the scents have a story behind them. It makes it all more intriguing to me. Just as that Maison Louis Marie loves to do good for our planet and is part of the 1% for the Planet. You can’t find a better fragrance and company who cares about our environment. I would recommend for anyone to get a sample and fall in love with it like I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m constantly adding fragrances to my perfume collection and couldn’t wait to get my hands on Maison Louis Marie’s Eau de Parfum in the scent No. 4 Bois de Balincourt. I love the quality of their brand and this warm wood, botanical inspired scent. The packaging looks sleek and feels luxurious, while maintaining a modern, simplistic design.  No. 4 is in the earthy/woody family and utilizes sandalwood, vetiver and cinnamon to create a warm, inviting fragrance. I cannot get enough of this scent and appreciate the way it warms up to my skin throughout the day. I love to layer this scent with their No. 14 EDP so that the warm and sweet fragrances blend together. In addition to spraying my wrists and neck, I like to spray my hair/clothes 1-2 times for longer lasting results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt EDP by Maison Louie Marie is a fantastic, uni-sex fragrance in a gorgeous bottle. This woody Santal scent is delicious - easily wearable throughout the seasons - and is a unique edition to my perfume collection. Some have compared this to Santal 33, which I can understand slightly, however, I don’t find Bois de Balincourt to have the same pickley note that I find with Santal 33.
