I certainly prefer No.04 over the later.   🪵😌☁️ Notes include the following:  •Top note: Sandalwood, Cedarwood •Mid note: Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon •Base note: Amber Wood  Beyond the scent itself, Bois de Balincourt has great longevity and sillage. My partner could smell this across my house when I sprayed it and I still got whiffs of it days later in the laundry. Would love to try this in candle form as well, I know it would be INCREDIBLE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Where do I even start with this perfume? I love the fact that that it’s clean beauty. I really love the earthy and Woody notes that you get from this perfume. I really wasn’t expecting such a strong scent. I did two little spritz and it last me all day. I wore it on the Fourth of July to my families house and I got so many compliments. Everyone was like what are you wearing? Oh my God you smell so good. I hugged a couple people they were like your perfume is stuck on me & i absolutely love the smell. Where did you get it and what is the name of it. It made me think OK. I’m not the only one that thinks this perfume smells amazing. One of my new go tos. I love the bottle. I love the cute box it came in. It is a little pricey, but you get what you pay for & with this perfume, the price that you pay is definitely well worth it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a perfume lover with a very large collection, I love finding fragrances that fit into a niche that I don’t currently own, and this is one of them! I don’t currently own a nice woody, earthy scent like this, and I am really happy to finally have one that I like in my collection.  This has strong notes of sandalwood and vetiver to me. I used to have a strong vetiver perfume that was very grassy, but this one is on the more floral side in my opinion. I think this would layer really well with floral scents, or even more gourmand scents like vanilla.   This is also a very pleasant fragrance all on its own, and it’s got the perfect amount of projection for me (not too much, not too little). This is my first perfume from Maison Louis Marie, and I’m definitely impressed!  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt by Maison Louis Marie pleasantly surprised me.  I have been into niche, designer, and clean fragrances for over 4 years now and I must say that No.04 Bois de Balincourt is my favorite woody fragrance so far.  Key Notes include Sandalwood, Cedar, Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon, Woody Notes, and Amber. I enjoy the scent throughout the entire projection. The opening is sweet and the woody notes are very delicate and not pungent. I love how it slowly uncovers this powdery, clean, and close-to-the-skin scent. I greatly appreciate the notes being balanced with each other. The soapy/powdery sweetness is my favorite part of this fragrance. The longevity is moderate. It lasts approximately 4 hours on my skin and longer on my clothes. I would wear this fragrance all year round, especially in the evenings.  And I love the minimalist, modern bottle design that comes in a paper box. It’s perfect for gifting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second scent I have tried from MAISON LOUIS MARIE. The No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is my favorite now. This French perfume seems so luxurious and I very much enjoy wearing it on a day-to-day basis. I feel like I am finally getting to enjoy perfumes again because when I was pregnant or nursing perfumes seemed way too strong for me and would give me a headache. The scent from this MAISON LOUIS MARIENo.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum seems very neutral to me as far as not being too feminine or too masculine. It is not overpowering or too strong and last long enough for me. I love the simple packaging from this company because I think it gives it a more of a upscale look and they really care about the environment. Would definitely recommend this scent and this company.   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice perfume overall but it’s very, very subtle and doesn’t last or maybe I’m just nose blind since I’m a fragrance girlie. Upon first application it’s very subtle and I get a little bit of the woody notes but it fades away after a little bit and personally I don’t smell it much at that point but overall it’s nice and if you like subtle smells you will like this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Gabby and I'm a licensed Cosmetologist. I received the Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. I loved the scent of the fragrance as its right up my ally. The classic luxurious bottle looks great on my shelf. I even contemplating keeping the box because it just looks so simplistic and elegant in the white box. I find that this is one of those scents on me that lasts that I can smell on my wrist hours later. There's one thing I don't like is a fragrance that just disappears into skin or clothes. I usually am not much of a fan of a straight woodsy scent, but the blend of the Amber is the perfect complement and goes well with my body chemistry. I also like that this is described as a layerable fragrance. Overall, I would recommend this fragrance and give it five out of five stars.   *For External Review Submission please indicate on your review that This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: An amazing unisex fragrance for all!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore No.04 Bois de Balincourt by Maison Louis Marie. From the moment I first applied it, I was captivated by its perfectly balanced woody aroma. The sandalwood and cedarwood notes create a beautiful foundation that's both rugged and cozy. As the fragrance develops, the spicy cinnamon and nutmeg complex emerges, adding depth and intrigue without overpowering the woods.  What I love most about this scent is its versatility. It's truly unisex, appealing to anyone who appreciates a sophisticated woody fragrance. The amber in the base adds a subtle warmth that complements the fresh, crisp elements beautifully. It's like wrapping yourself in a soft, luxurious blanket while walking through a sun-dappled forest.  The longevity is impressive, lasting 7-8 hours on my skin with moderate sillage. I've received numerous compliments, which speaks volumes about its allure. Whether I'm heading to the office or out for a casual evening, Bois de Balincourt always feels appropriate and elevates my mood.  If you're looking for a unique, high-quality woody fragrance that stands out from the crowd, I can't recommend No.04 Bois de Balincourt enough.

reviews.review_title: Awesome balance of feminine and musky
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This combines my love of vanilla and cedarwood/sandalwood perfectly. This scent has the ideal balance of feminine and musky notes, and I adore it.   I'm one of those folks who detects the scent of dill in the first note—not pickles, but the real herb. It doesn't stay long and isn't unsettling. As it dries down, the perfume transforms into one that is more feminine and powdery. It's definitely one of those smells that trick you at first. I would feel at ease wearing it to work because the perfume isn't overbearing or powerful.  It smells a little powerful and manly at first, but as it settles and melds with the chemistry of the skin, it becomes a really clean, delicate, woodsy, and even slightly floral scent. The lasting was a little short, in my opinion.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. I am an avid perfume lover and was so excited to try out this perfume. The brand story is extremely intriguing between the family owned business and the heavy focus on having clean products. You can tell how much every person within this brand cares about and believes in their products. The perfume bottle itself is gorgeous, along with the packaging. It reflects the clean ingredients by being very minimalistic while still providing enough information on the perfume. The perfume smells great from the initial spray. The entire wear time it is heavily woodsy with the cedar being the main note I can smell. It wore really well throughout the day, probably about 5-7 hours of wear. The scent definitely tones down a bit after an hour or so, but I actually prefer it toned down a bit so you can get the spice scents coming through as well. The protection is moderate and the sillage seemed pretty low to me. I think this perfume would work extremely well for layering, especially with a vanilla scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I genuinely cannot recommend this scent enough, especially for those who tend to want to build on smells or who are into more woodsy scents. I will admit that the price is on the higher end, but the quality is worth it.This perfume is the embodiment of comfort. It smells warm and inviting. Really it has become one of my favorites. I took the advice from others and layered it with another perfume that was more sweet scented; the combination was phenomenal. It is such a good base perfume that would work amazingly with many of their others scents! I definitely cannot wait to try this one with more of their line of scents.

reviews.review_title: making it a staple in my collection.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a beautifully crafted fragrance that perfectly captures the essence of a serene woodland. The blend of sandalwood, cedarwood, vetiver, and amber creates a warm and earthy scent that I find both comforting and sophisticated. It’s long-lasting and has just the right amount of presence without being overpowering. Whether I’m heading out for a casual day or a special evening, this fragrance fits every occasion effortlessly. The elegant packaging adds to its charm, making it a staple in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m definitely a fragrance girly and love trying new scents so I can find a new signature! I love anything fruity, floral, musky but usually very open to a broad spectrum of fragrances as well! I’ve had the pleasure of trying the No. 14 from the  MLM brand and loved it so much so I was excited to be able to get my hands on the No. 4 because I’ve read so many positive reviews. The Bois De Balincourt EDP is definitely on the earthy, woodsy side. It’s very heavy on the sandalwood aspect and similar to Santal 33 if you like that scent! It’s a great dupe for that so I’ve heard. For me, it’s a bit too strong - but it could be that it didn’t mix well with my body chemistry. I’m also sensitive to certain fragrances and this made me feel kind of nauseous unfortunately. The good thing about it is that it lasts forever on the skin! Same with the No. 14, so the longevity is great for those who end up loving this scent! I can see this being really nice in the colder months on a night out. I wish I loved it more than I do but it didn’t mesh too well with me personally and slightly too strong for my nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just start off by saying I adore Maison Louis Marie. I love the brand, their scents and what they stand for. Trying a scent then previously and falling in love with it. I needed to try another, Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt. This is a beautiful scent. All the notes come together amazingly. It is very woodsy and musky yet, with a touch of spicy sweetness. It really does remind me of being out roaming and having adventures in the woods. It is masculine yet feminine making it perfect for everyone. With that all being said I unfortunately can’t seem to wear it too long without my allergies acting up. As much as I adore the scent it pains me to say that because I truly love it! It seems to be the Cedar wood that is a little too over powering for me. I have used many products with cedar wood but I’ve never seemed to have a reaction to it. Again the scents tie together beautifully. If you love woodsy/ musky scents then Bois de Balincourt is something to look into!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: literally love everything about Maison Louis Marie No. 4! This is the second fragrance I have tried from the brand and I just purchased a discovery set from Sephora! I absolutely love what the company stands for as far as sustainability and giving back to the environment! I love to support a brand that thinks about the environment and their customers! The No. 4 made feel absolutely exquisite whenever I wear it! I absolutely love the notes of sandalwood and cedar wood that I get right off the top. Throughout the day I get notes of the cinnamon and vetiver. This fragrance absolutely turns heads when I wear it and I always get compliments on my scent whenever I wear the No.4! I also like to layer the No. 4 with the No. 14 which smells absolutely stunning as well! Whenever I wear Maison Louis Marie it always makes me feel elevated and luxurious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the packaging is simple but beautiful. Love the minimalist look and when you open the package you get a lovely glass bottle that is filled with this beautiful scent. When I first applied to my wrists it took me back to a forest - I smell sandalwood and pine. It’s very refreshing but light. I love the way it smells on my body. I also love that this can be used by a man. It’s a very attractive scent so I can see why both genders can use it. I wore it out one night and I could smell it in the warm air as I sipped on my wine. I really like that it is not overpowering like other scents - it’s very fresh and perfect for every day or special occasions. I honestly love this as an everyday scent & going to look at layering it with no 14 down the line. I highly recommend this scent if you love sandalwood.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smelling sweet and marvelous is something I strive to do daily but with the Maison Louis Marie perfume, they make it easy to do. The luxurious bottle in a beautiful tailored box is everything. When opening the box, it was an experience and worthy of videoing it. The perfume has a dominating smell and sprays on with full coverage. I love that it is light but delivers long lasting smell all day. I wore the perfume for many days and it doesn't get boring nor does it fade. The perfume is a wonderful product to wear for a special occasion. I wore it to work and felt too sexy and beautiful. I wore it out on a nice evening and got many compliments on the fragrance and how it accents my body odor. This fragrance can be top of the shelf and #1 product of 2024. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, and I must say, it has quickly become one of my favorite fragrances. From the first spritz, I was captivated by its unique and sophisticated blend of notes. The top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood create a woody base that is both grounding and comforting. As the scent develops, subtle hints of vetiver and amber emerge, adding a layer of complexity and depth. One of the standout features of No.04 Bois de Balincourt is its longevity. A few sprays in the morning are enough to carry me through the entire day, with the scent lingering beautifully on my skin without being overpowering. The packaging is equally impressive, with a minimalist design that reflects the elegance of the fragrance inside. The bottle feels luxurious and looks stunning on any vanity or dresser. I highly recommend this perfume to anyone looking for a timeless, elegant scent that stands out from the crowd. this review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a bit obsessed with fragrance. I have way too many, I can’t help myself. I was so excited to get the Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum as it is their best seller! At first, I wasn’t sure if I’d like the earthy & woody fragrance but because I love men’s fragrance I really wanted in on this best seller. Turns out its super light, very delicate! To me it’s just lovely for every day. I’ve been wearing it every day since I got it. I think it’s very soft, fresh with a tiny bit of sweet. I LOVE the packaging - just simple and beautiful. I’d recommend this for all as its just wonderfully versatile for all genders. A paraben, phthalate, sulfate, and cruelty free fragrance – that’s a win-win in my book!  I’ve been in the beauty industry for 30+ years. Within that time, I’ve worked for a handful of cosmetic/skincare brands. In addition, I worked as a cosmetologist for 7+ years, makeup, and lash artist as well. I have matured, oily/combination skin tone. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume I must say is very clean and refreshing at the same time! Their commitment to make clean eco friendly products is really good!! With all clean ingredients. This is an ideal perfume to wear everyday even layer it with scents!! It’s long lasting which is really great!! It’s unisex which makes it even better!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is smells really good. It has a mix of sandalwood, cedarwood, and spices that make you feel cozy and fancy at the same time.  When I first sprayed it, I can mostly smell the sandalwood, which is creamy and nice. As time goes on, the cedarwood starts to come out, adding more depth to the scent. There are also hints of vetiver and nutmeg that give it a cool twist.  The best part of this fragrance is that this perfume lasts a long time. I only need a little in the morning, and it will still smell great by the end of the day. Plus, the bottle looks really nice and modern, adding a touch of elegance to my perfume collection.  I can say I am a big fan of Maison Louis Marie 💖✨ since this is my third bottle in my collections !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Being a beauty enthusiast I love all things beauty related, including fragrances, but I hadn’t yet taken the opportunity to step outside of my comfort zone and try something completely new to me until now. The Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois De Balincourt Eau De Parfum is a woody and Earthy fragrance with notes of sandalwood, cedarwood, and amber wood. With the addition of nutmeg and cinnamon adding a bit of a spice to the fragrance. I think it’s the perfect type of fragrance to wear any time of the year and can be worn by both males and females. I love that it’s not an overpowering scent and it works very well when layered with other fragrances. My favorite type of scents to layer it with were more sweet and gourmand vanilla fragrances. I also really love the clean, sleek, and minimal packaging aesthetic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 30 year old stay at home mama with many years of being a beauty enthusiast. I especially have a passion for fragrances and Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt did not disappoint! No.04 is such a wonderful scent that has quickly become one of my favorites. It’s like capturing the warmth and relaxation of a perfect day at the beach in a bottle. The fragrance starts with a beautiful blend of sandalwood and cedarwood, which gives it a warm and inviting vibe. There's also a touch of vetiver and amber that adds a bit of depth and sophistication.  One thing I love about this scent is how long it lasts. I can put it on in the morning, and it stays with me all day, which is pretty rare for most perfumes I’ve tried. It doesn’t smell overly beachy but has this amazing way of making me feel like I’m walking along a sun-soaked boardwalk.  Overall, Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is a fantastic fragrance that feels both cozy and elegant. It’s definitely earned a solid four-star rating from me!

reviews.review_title: You Have To Try It Mixed With Kayali Vanilla 28
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum from Maison Louis Marie is not like most of my other perfumes that I own. It's definitely more unisex when I typically prefer feminine fragrances. It has a nice woody type of smell but I was hoping for a more cinnamon nutmeg scent that are the mid notes. It takes about an hour for the top notes to start to fade away and then the perfume becomes a little less in your face. It smells better after an hour in my opinion but it smells even better mixed. I desperately wanted to love this perfume on it's own, but mixed with Kayali Vanilla 28 just brings it to a whole other level. I already love Vanilla 28 but adding No.04 just brings out another side to it and they pair so we'll together. I really love wearing them both together. Alone and together the perfume lasts all day and I love how minimalistic but still luxurious the glass bottle packaging is. Even though I'm not head over heels in love with it on it's own, I really love how it pairs with other scents, and it still has so many great aspects to it that I had to give it 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wish I could like this scent cause I love everything about this brand it just wasn't for me. I thought I liked woodsy scents but this one just wasn't for me. To me it was more manly than unisex so I'm going to give it to my friend and see if he likes it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a  fragrance enthusiast and a busy college student, Maison Louis Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt has become my signature scent. From the first spray, I was captivated by the beautiful design of the bottle and the captivatingly rich, woody fragrance. This perfume is perfect for anyone who loves warm, earthy scents. The dominant cedarwood and sandalwood notes create a deep, luxurious aroma that lasts throughout the day. Hints of spice from cinnamon and nutmeg add a touch of complexity, while vetiver grounds the scent with a hint of earthiness. A Fragrance That Makes a Statement. It's important to note that Bois de Balincourt is a bold, woody fragrance. If you're not a fan of woodsy scents, this perfume might not be the best choice for you. However, if you appreciate deep, sophisticated aromas, then Bois de Balincourt is a must-try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Forest woods are at the epicenter of Maison Louis Marie’s No. 04 Bois de Balincourt parfum, with classic cedar and sandalwood toplining the fragrance notes for a deep and entrenched woodsy scent, enhanced by a nutmeg and cinnamon ‘complex’ adding warmth and a comforting vibe. Vetiver is the only verdant element in the parfum, contributing a fresh, earthy, balancing note to the overall formulation. While it may read as masculine dominant parfum, No. 04 truly is universal in that it evokes a setting and scent experience that is real, enjoyed by most human beings at some point. It is a sensorial recreation of a place with its natural elements, rather than a curated mixology with a human profile at its center. When I wear this scent, I feel transported to the intended setting – a forest in France – which is itself neither feminine nor masculine but simply a rich, natural landscape perfuming the earth. As such, its naturalistic and calming beauty wears well on all. The intensity and sillage of this parfum is not overtaking – I would describe it as intentional and deep but tranquil, enveloping and soothing like its fragrance source: forest trees. I experimented layering Icila perfume oil over Bois de Balincourt, anticipating either a clash or cancelation of scents given Icila is as profoundly floral as Bois is woodsy, and was surprised at how well they played with each other. I may not wear the combination every day, however it’s nice to have the option of layering with MLM. Really loving the standout fragrance formulations of this brand overall and Bois de Balincourt is no exception.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: No. 4 is an enchanting fragrance: it’s fresh, earthy and clean. With hints of cinnamon that mix with sandalwood, vetiver and amber wood, beautiful on its own or layered - I love this with the No 14 perfume oil by  Maison Louie Marie. A wonderful everyday scent suitable for work and play. Wear it daily, seasonal or save it for special occasions.   For me, this fragrance evokes nostalgic memories of endless summers I spent by the lake in New Hampshire, camping in the mountains, bonfires and sunsets, birds chirping in the forest and long walks in the woods with my father - I love how a scent can transport me to a time and place, it captures a moment in time allowing me to keep it, like a little hidden treasure that belongs only to me.    I constantly receive compliments when wearing and I always recommend this timeless fine fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this fragrance! It is so different not like any other scent I’ve ever experienced. It was a super refreshing change from the floral and fruity scents I usually gravitate towards. I had a great experience trying out this scent. I would describe it as the most gentle creamy musk scent. I think it’s the sandalwood and cedarwood that truly separates it from any other fragrance I have ever tried. It is so mild and perfect to wear everyday without being overwhelming at all! It smells almost like freshly cracked nuts or a woodsy scent. This usually not a scent variation I think of too much when I’m shopping for a new fragrance so I’m really glad I was able to try it. They say you can layer the scent too for endless combinations!

reviews.review_title: This smell will take you back to nature
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly, I love the packaging, it is minimal, clean and beautiful as the product is. I was impressed with the fact that this is a clean product with no chemicals, they are natural and last longer. And it smells exactly how I was expecting it to, earthy, woody with smell of spices. I applied it on my wrist and one smell made me feel like I was in the forest, this takes me back to nature. I love the fact that this is unisex as me and my partner can wear the same perfume. Even the bottle is so beautiful, classy and clean. There is nothing that I do not love about this product, from the ingredients to the packaging and the bottle. Everything is a vibe. I have used it couple of times and I am in love. I can also use this as a base note to add other fragrances on it, which makes it much better than it already is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Starting with the beautiful bottle, it's elegant, minimal, sophisticated. If you have a love for aesthetics, this bottle looks beautifully on your vanity or bathroom counter. The No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum has a very strong earthy/ wood scent. It's very unique, it can come off a bit too overwhelming but once it settles on your skin/clothes it dies down to a warm sandalwood aroma. I personally enjoyed the aroma, but l can see this scent not being for everyone. At first sniff, I did get a little worried, but after using it on a daily basis, I have been enjoying it very much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum offers a very pleasant, cool aroma of transparent cedar wood with subtle notes of dill. As it develops, vetiver and amber join the mix, creating a more complex and earthy profile. The cinnamon is barely noticeable, if at all. This fragrance shines in both hot and cool weather and maintains a balanced presence that won't overwhelm. Clearly unisex, it was released after the well-known Sandal33 and matches it in quality, durability, and intensity. An impressive scent, it earns a solid 5/5. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello, I’m Chelsea. I work as a health educator. I am someone who spends a lot of time outside. I love summer activities outside, including swimming, gardening, and sports. I love finding a perfume scent that reminds me of nature. Maison Louis Marie No. 04 is perfect for nature lovers. I am so excited to finally find a perfume that has a strong natural scent that lingers for a while. I love powerful scents and ones that are unique. This scent reminds me of running along the mountain trails in the fall, which is one of my favorite activities during that time of year. The amber wood and sandalwood oils stick out to me the most. At first, it is very strong, and it stays strong throughout the day. My nose smells the sandalwood and amber wood the most. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: A unisex long lasting woody fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When reading the notes of this fragrance, I really thought I would absolutely love it, but it just really didn’t hit the mark for me. Unfortunately, it was too “realistic” woody for my taste, even though I generally like sandalwood and cedar notes. It is very strong and the sillage is out of this world. I think this fragrance would be perfect for people who love woody scents that really project, because it truly does last all day. It lasted even after showering and it stayed on my clothes even after washing them. I thought this fragrance would have a little bit of sweetness in the base because of the amber note, but I didn’t personally smell that on my skin. The packaging is beautiful and luxe, and you can tell there was a lot of effort put into the design which I love. I have been a fragrance lover for years so I was really looking forward to getting my nose on this fragrance, but it just personally was not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start this review by commenting on how much I love this company. They are so much more than fragrance creators. They are dedicated to sustaining the environment and making scents that make you feel good while wearing them but are better for you with no animal testing, no animal-derived ingredients, and no toxic ingredients. They use recyclable packaging, glass bottles, and no cyclo wrap. They are also members of One Percent for the Planet which is an organization that holds the brands partnered with them accountable for giving back to the planet.   The founders Marie and Matthew are lovely as well. I love that they are willing to share so much of themselves and they really make you feel like you are part of the process not just an end result.   Now, all of that said it is time to talk about the scent in question. No.04 Bois de Balincourt. I didn't like it, on me. But, how could that be when I just gave such glowing testimony to this company? Chemistry happens. I have loved scents all of my life and at forty-five years old that is a long time. Scents create and hold our memories safe. They capture precious moments and remind us of them years later. They are all encapsulating of our daily lives and sometimes a scent simply does not work for us.  This is so true for this scent. I love how it smells in the bottle. In a room. On my husband. It is deep, woodsy, and a little spicy like taking a walk in the woods in the fall. Things are a little damp the leaves underfoot create a subtle musk of their own. It's beautiful. On my husband it is intoxicating. On me, not so much. I couldn't smell anything on me besides a strange powdery scent that was unappealing and that is simply because my body chemistry does not work with the scent. I will continue to support the company, love other scents they have, and remind myself and the reader that not all scents work for us and that is okay because scent was never a one-sniff-fits-all category.   Collected as part  of a promo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a beauty guru who loves trying out all of the latest beauty products from hair, skincare, and makeup! The packaging looks so clean and simple but the glass bottle shows how chic the fragrance truly is. The scent is warm, rich, powerful and definitely smells woodsy. The scent seems a bit strong at first but it does settle down after a few minutes of wearing it. I kept getting whiffs of the fragrance throughout the whole day, I love how it sticks with you! I appreciate the fact it’s a gender less fragrance, not a lot of brands sell gender less products. Although to me it does seem more of something I’d purchase for my fiancé rather than myself..BUT the more I use it the more I like it for myself! This will definitely be a fall staple scent for me, try layering it with a vanilla scent..trust me you’ll be happy you did. Obsessed!

reviews.review_title: Bois de Balincourt is a must have
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Marie Louis No 4 Bois de Balincourt Eau de parfum is truly a unique fragrance. It’s a woodsy and warm fragrance with a sandalwood and cedar wood forward scent. It’s very light and in fact the lightest warm blend I’ve ever experienced.  What I love the most is that as the day goes on it wears down to a bit of cinnamon on the back note and my absolute favorite vetiver, makes its presence known.  No 4 just keeps changing and morphing into a beautiful mystery that you can’t help but keep smelling throughout the day and into the night. It’s easily layered with other fragrances without getting lost or fighting them. It’s easy worn during the day and I’ve found it to be light enough to become my daily go to for work, without worrying about disturbing those who may be sensitive to certain smells. The bottle is simple, understated and elegant. It’s a beautiful addition to any shelf or collection. I can’t ignore the fact that it’s also Paraben free and vegan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a lover of Maison Louis Marie fragrance for quite some time, but I have tended to stay away from anything described as “woody & earthy” because I typically find those fragrances too masculine for me. If that is you, please let me assure you this one is not too masculine! This is the most light woody fragrance I have ever smelled. The sandalwood, vetiver, and nutmeg stick out most to me and remind me of a light breeze in the countryside, reading a book under big old trees. I absolutely LOVE this scent! A little tip for you if you have any of the Maison Louis Marie perfume oils, is to first apply your perfume oil and then layer with this Eau de Parfum of no. 04 Bois de Balincourt to create a combination with even more depth and longevity! I do think this Eau de Parfum has a nice longevity, and a medium amount of sillage. It isn’t completely personal, but it doesn’t throw to the whole room either. You will have a trail behind you for a little mystery and romance. My favorite perfume oil to mix this with is no. 13, Nouvelle  Vague. It gives the perfect balance of floral & woody! Sheer perfection! You have to try this at least once!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a Licensed Esthetician for over four years and loved hearing about this new product. I am in my early 60s and I am always looking for products and cosmetics to improve my personal appearance as well as my skin health. I take pride in skin as it is my clients first impression before their facial.    Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt Parfum comes beautifully packaged in a clear glass spray bottle.  I love how this company donates 1% of revenue to the National Forest Foundation.  I was excited to try this one as I love the No. 14.   This parfum is a very unique, gender neutral earthy scent that can be layered.  For me, it is a much stronger scent and a little goes a long way, I can definitely smell the herbal fragrance and it smells a lot like the woods and Thyme.  I made sure my skin was well moisturized before spaying a very small amount and it lasted all day.   I did not get any compliments while wearing, not one of my favorites of Maison Louis Marie.  I would definitely recommend trying in store before buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No. 4 is a captivating fragrance that immediately envelops your senses with its extraordinary scent. Imagine yourself in a lush forest, the air thick with the intoxicating aroma of ancient woods. This perfume, rich with woody notes, opens with a powerful blend of sandalwood and cedarwood that command attention without overwhelming.  When first applied, the top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood are unmistakably robust, yet they gracefully avoid being too intense. This fragrance is best experienced when sprayed directly onto the skin, allowing its full complexity to unfold. If you're not fond of woody scents, the initial intensity might feel a bit bold. However, as the perfume settles, the top notes seamlessly merge with the mid notes of nutmeg and cinnamon, adding a warm, spicy layer that enhances the overall aroma.  The base note of amberwood slowly emerges as the fragrance mellows over time. After a few hours, what lingers is a divine, warm amber scent that feels both comforting and luxurious. This scent is decidedly warm and woody, creating an enveloping aura that is incredibly inviting.  Maison Louis Marie No. 4 is a special fragrance, distinct from the typical fruity or floral perfumes. Its subtlety lies in its perfect blend of spicy and woody notes, offering a unique olfactory experience. When first sprayed, you are greeted with a burst of spicy warmth, which gradually softens into a warm amber embrace that is nothing short of divine.   This fragrance isn't your everyday scent; it's designed for those who appreciate the depth and richness of woody notes. Its gender-neutral appeal makes it perfect for both men and women. The blend is harmonious, never too strong, always subtle, and infinitely inviting.   Maison Louis Marie No. 4 is ideal for evening wear or special occasions. It demands a mood that matches its elegance and warmth, making it perfect for date nights or sophisticated gatherings.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a captivating fragrance that blends woody and floral notes seamlessly. It opens with a warm and inviting sandalwood base, which is enriched by cedarwood and vetiver, creating a deep, earthy essence. The heart notes of amber and iris add a subtle sweetness and complexity, while undertones of violet and cinnamon provide a delicate spice that lingers pleasantly. About the packaging, I love the overall design and find it very elegant. It was easy to spray out, and it sprays out nicely and evenly. I love the fragrance. Overall, this fragrance is sophisticated yet approachable, making it perfect for both daytime wear and evening outings. Its longevity and sillage are commendable, ensuring that you'll enjoy its elegant aroma throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a beauty enthusiast and love trying new products and brands and being able to share my honest thoughts about them. I was very excited to get to try this because I love fragrances with sandalwood but this one just was not for me. This has top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, middle notes of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon, and base notes of amber wood. I honestly did not care for this fragrance because it is said to be unisex but I thought it was more on the masculine side, it has a very strong woody scent that was a bit overwhelming, it reminded me of an old man cologne. This did have a lot of lasting power but I didn't smell any sandalwood, or amber I actually couldn't tell it had cinnamon or nutmeg either. If you like super strong masculine fragrances than this is for you. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is another great scent from MAISON LOUIS MARIE. As a lover of all sandalwood scents, the delicate woodsy scent of the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum really checked all my boxes. Every time I lightly spray this crisp, clean scent, I’m met with the overwhelming aroma of a forest clearing. It conjures images of pine trees blowing in cool breeze making soft, soothing swishing sounds. The powerful notes play along the line of feminine and masculine while evolving into a warm, sweet smell. I found as this scent wears on throughout my day, these sweet, warm flavors relax and comfort me. Even my boyfriend used this scent and asked if he could have it (I politely declined his request). I’m so impressed by this scent and can’t wait to try more from my new fave house of fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been so eager to try at least 1 of Maison Louis Marie scents and i really believe this was a great introduction to this perfume powerhouse. This really was a luxurious experience, from the unboxing down to the actual scent itself. The perfume comes in a wonderfully plain white box, which gives a very classic, elegant vibe. The bottle itself is absolutely gorgeous, adding to the timeless feel. The SCENT, though? The best way i can describe this scent is warm. It features cedarwood and that scent really shines through. The other notes are all warm scents, making this experience absolutely luxurious. This scent is absolutely layerable with almost any other perfume notes. The longevity is also a definite bonus, as i still smelled it on my skin at night, which is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion Maison Louis No.4  Style: The appearance of Maison Louis is on the simple side, which I like. I don’t have to worry about it matching with items around my room or in the bathroom, because the box is white and the bottle itself is clear.   Theme: When spraying Bois De Balincourt, I am instantly transported to the woods. It gives me cozy vibes like I am by a campfire. In my opinion, I do like the fragrance but it gives me more fall-time wear. I am mentioning this because of the middle notes of nutmeg and cinnamon. With the two notes, I am instantly transported to autumn time.   Scent: The Bois De Balincourt is perfect for a person who doesn't like sweet scents. The notes in the perfume are all wood, which means they're more on the warm, earthy side. I noticed there is one floral note, but it goes perfectly with the wood notes because it is on the dry grass mixed with the citrus side.  Wear time: I always spray my perfume on my wrists, since it stays the longest on me. I am a person who doesn't spray a lot only two to three times. When timing myself, the longest number 4 last on me is about Five to six hours without respraying. Bios De Balincourt, I noticed is a little bit stronger than their No.14, making it last longer, if you're a person that doesn't like to keep respraying.

reviews.review_title: Pretty good but not the best value
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: *this review was collected as part of a promotion* I recently picked up Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt, and it's quickly become a staple in my fragrance collection. First off, the packaging is totally Instagram-worthy – sleek, minimalist, and elegant. It looks great on my vanity and fits right in with a modern, clean aesthetic.  Now, onto the scent itself. The first spritz hits you with a warm, woody aroma, thanks to the sandalwood and cedarwood notes. There's a subtle hint of spice from the vetiver and nutmeg that adds a bit of complexity without being overpowering. It’s earthy and grounding, making it perfect for both everyday wear and more special occasions.  One thing to note, though, is the price. It’s definitely a splurge, but I think it's worth it for the quality and the unique scent profile. The fragrance lasts a decent amount of time, around 6-7 hours on my skin, which is pretty solid.  Overall, if you’re into woody, sophisticated scents and don’t mind spending a bit more for a high-quality fragrance, Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is definitely worth checking out. It’s a chic, modern scent that’s both comforting and elegant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is gorgeous and calming with a touch of elegance and works well with any occasion. This beautiful earthy scent is brought out with it’s soft woody notes that linger with a slight creaminess as it balances with my skin. For me, it’s the notes of sandalwood, nutmeg, and amber wood which are the stars as the fragrance warms to my skin and fills the air. Although it is a softer scent on me, the projection is amazing as well as it’s longevity which lasts all day which I love since the scent is so beautiful. It’s great not only to wear but one spitz on my pillow at night helps set a relaxing mood for a serene slumber. I really enjoy this one and am glad to have it in my collection. It’s simple packaging also makes it a great center piece for my vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 33 year old beauty enthusiast who loves to try a variety of scents I am so obsessed with the Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Eau de Parfum! I have tried a variety of scents and this Eau de Parfum is a scent I can see myself wearing for a variety of occasions. The top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood blend seamlessly with the base of amberwood and mid notes of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon. The bottle is so simplistic yet modern which I love. Each spritz of Eau de Parfum comes out effortlessly and this is easy to spray all over my body. The scent lasted the entire day for me which is amazing. I am so impressed with the quality of this product and love that it can be layered with others. I recommend trying this scent even if you prefer gourmand scents because this scent is shockingly impressive. This scent would go well on any gender!   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried the discovery set from Maison Louis Marie and fell in love with No.4. Now that was I sable to get the full-size bottle , I’m more in love. It smells woody and fresh , unisex and it’s not overpowering . It’s light yet sexy and can be worn for any occasion . I love smelling fresh and this screams fresh and sophisticated at the same time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No. 04 Bois de Balicourt is a masterful blend of natural ingredients that has captured my heart. This exquisite perfume is a journey for the senses, transporting me to a place of serenity and wonder. The initial notes of bergamot and lavender are fresh and uplifting, like a breath of crisp forest air. As the scent evolves, the warmth of cedarwood and sandalwood emerges, enveloping me in a sense of comfort and tranquility.  The base notes of musk and vanilla add a sensual depth, like the soft glow of a campfire on a summer evening. What I adore most about No. 04 is its ability to evoke a strong sense of nostalgia, transporting me back to memories of camping in the woods, swimming in the lake, and basking in the warmth of the sun.  This perfume is more than just a scent - it's an experience. It's a reminder to slow down, appreciate the beauty of nature, and connect with the world around us. The packaging is equally impressive, with a sleek and modern design that exudes luxury and sophistication.  Overall, No. 04 Bois de Balicourt is a true masterpiece, a testament to the art of perfumery. If you're looking for a fragrance that's unique, memorable, and deeply personal, look no further. This perfume is a must-have for anyone who appreciates the beauty of nature and the joy of memories.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast and expert, I have to share my excitement about my latest fragrance discovery: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt. Having tried countless scents, I can confidently say this one is truly exceptional.  The fragrance itself is a delightful blend of freshness and elegance. It evokes the serene experience of walking through a lush forest, capturing the essence of clean, crisp air. No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a versatile scent that works beautifully all year round, making it my new go-to choice for any occasion.  I’ve received numerous compliments while wearing this fragrance. Its unique and captivating aroma consistently turns heads and sparks conversations, which is always a pleasant bonus.  What makes this scent even more special is knowing that my favorite artist, Bad Bunny, also wears it. This little detail adds an extra layer of charm and connection to the fragrance for me.  For those looking to elevate their fragrance game, I highly recommend pairing No.04 Bois de Balincourt with No.14. The combination creates a sophisticated and harmonious blend that is simply irresistible.  In summary, Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a standout fragrance that offers a perfect balance of freshness and elegance. It’s a must-have for anyone seeking a signature scent that leaves a lasting impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an absolutely beautiful scent. I love how versatile and easy to wear it is. It is not super sweet and has a gorgeous woody scent to it that is light but distinct. It smells very clean, like you just got out of a shower but in an earthy way. I have been having so much fun layering it with different scents and my favorite so far has been with sweeter more gourmand vanilla scents. It is super great for layering! Anyone that likes woody amber scents will definitely enjoy this scent. It's not too strong either but has a lasting impression. This is definitely my new go to summer scent and also will be great in the colder months paired with something a little less sweet. I highly recommend trying it out. I would rate it a 7/10 with a few points off because I like my scents super sweet and this is only a little sweet.

reviews.review_title: Maison Louis Marie No. 04 - Bois de Balincourt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me summertime means citrus and floral type of fragrances but I’m always open to trying new things so after reading a little history behind the Maison Louis Marie brand I decided to give this fragrance a try. I love sandalwood and amber and the blend of these two scents in this fragrance does not disappoint. This fragrance is light yet wears throughout the day like a gentle kiss. As the scents wears on the skin you can pick the spicy notes of cinnamon and nutmeg. Wear this fragrance on the days you’re feeling confident and sexy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a  nice woody and earthy scent with a very dominant sandalwood note at the beginning which smells like pickles. It’s very strong at first but dries down very nicely and I can feel it’s crispiness, warmth and sweetness. I don’t feel any cinnamon note in it.  The scent does not last on my skin long, maybe a n hour..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bois de Balincourt from Maison Louis Marie is that everyday perfume every person should have! As someone who does not gravitate towards woody scents, this was perfect! I would describe this as the woody perfume for those who don't like woody fragrances. It is beautiful and unoffensive, making it a great everyday and gender neutral scent. I have already gotten many compliments wearing it and it is a smell I just cannot get enough of. It has great projection and lasts sooooo long. I wore this on a day spent by traveling, and it lasted the whole time. I think this is a beautiful perfume that I will be able to wear throughout the year, no matter was season or occasion. I have yet to layer it with my other perfumes, but I know it will not disappoint!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the packaging is simple but beautiful. Love the minimalist look and when you open the package you get a lovely glass bottle that is filled with this beautiful scent. When I first applied to my wrists it took me back to a forest - I smell sandalwood and pine. It’s very refreshing but light. I love the way it smells on my body. I also love that this can be used by a man.  It’s a very attractive scent so I can see why both genders can use it.  I wore it out one night and I could smell it in the warm air as I sipped on my wine. I really like that it is not overpowering like other scents - it’s very fresh and perfect for every day or special occasions. I honestly love this as an everyday scent & going to look at layering it with no 14 down the line. I highly recommend this scent if you love sandalwood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance exudes a subtle yet powerful aroma that captivates me. I am particularly drawn to the woodsy notes, and I am well-versed in the art of blending different fragrances. However, MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum houses chemistry that is truly exceptional and CLEAN as it strikes a delicate balance between femininity and intensity. A scent that can be enjoyed by all genders, the longevity of this fragrance is impressive, as it lasts throughout the day.         What I find most admirable is the way it surprises you with its bursts of notes, drawn out and expressed with the most subtle bodily movement; like a tilt of the head.   It may sound unusual to describe it in this manner, but as a cosmetologist with nearly two decades of experience in the field, I can attest that these are the qualities that individuals seek in high-performing fragrances, even if they struggle to articulate them. The combination of notes creates a harmonious blend that is both woodsy and sweet. This is such a lovely scent!   *This review was collected as part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the No.04 Bois de Balincourt perfume by Maison Louis Marie. From the first spray, I knew I had found a gem. The scent is a perfect blend of woody and earthy notes, with a balance of sandalwood, vetiver and amber that creates a feeling of being in an enchanted forest. The fragrance is incredibly long-lasting, staying present throughout the day without being overwhelming. The quality of the ingredients shows and I have received many compliments on how it smells. This perfume is sophisticated and unique, ideal for those looking for a distinctive and elegant fragrance. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who appreciates refined and long-lasting scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I admit that when I first sprayed No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum by Louis Marie House, I was extremely apprehensive. The cedarwood not was quite strong and is not a scent I usually wear. However, a little time is definitely this fragrances friend. As it melted into my skin, the scent mellowed and deepened in the most amazing way. Definitely a fragrance I will wear in the fall season more as it’s warm and woodsy and it layers very well with vanilla based fragrances.   I love that the bottle is simple and can be recycled. The company’s commitment to sustainable practices is a huge selling point for me so while the packaging is not as flashy as some other lines of fragrance, I can feel good about wearing it and purchasing more of their fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really impressed with this scent! I can definitely smell the key notes of sandalwood and amber wood! It also has hints of cinnamon which layers great with soo many perfumes! I love to layer this scent with vanilla fragrance. I love how this scent mixes with my skin. I love how cozy and warm this scent is and how well it warms up on my skin. The packaging for this fragrance is very luxurious and classy and so far has held up very nice even when bringing it for traveling.   Learning about the history of this brand and how they gather the scents is very interesting and very cool! I love how the ingredients are paraben, sulfate and cruelty free! If you are into earthy and woodsy scents, this fragrance is definitely for you!   This would be a greta gift as well since the packaging is very luxurious! I would love to receive this as a gift during the holiday season as it is a very fall / winter scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a sophisticated unisex fragrance inspired by the serene Balincourt family estate. The packaging is sleek and minimalist, enhancing its luxurious appeal. The scent opens with sandalwood and cedarwood, followed by vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon, creating a warm, earthy, and spicy profile. Its longevity and moderate sillage make it suitable for both formal and casual occasions throughout the year. This fragrance stands out for its balanced composition, avoiding excessive sweetness or muskiness. Additionally, Maison Louis Marie’s commitment to ethical and sustainable practices, using high-quality, natural ingredients, and being cruelty-free and vegan, adds to its allure.  Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a versatile and refined perfume that is perfect for any fragrance enthusiast looking for a high-quality, ethical choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great perfume. If you’re looking for a soft scent, I expected it to be a little bit more stronger. However, if you would like a stronger scent, I suggest layering it with tones of vanilla or lavender. This is a perfect for the fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum and here’s my experience and opinion.    I love the simple and minimalist packaging.  It’s in a beautiful glass bottle and displays beautifully on my vanity.    This no 4 eau de parfum is a beautiful woodsy scent.  I find that it has the perfect musk balance and it also isn’t too heavy.    It’s a perfect wear for fall and winter and also year round.  I like that it can be layered with my other scents and also wear well by itself.    I also like that it’s a clean perfume and that the ingredients doesn’t contain parabens.    I like to wear it during the day time and to the office.  It’s a great subtle scent that also lasts all day.  I recommend giving this a try if you like woody scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find this fragrance to be absolutely captivating: it’s fresh, earthy, and clean. The delightful blend of cinnamon, sandalwood, vetiver, and amber wood creates a scent that is perfect on its own. This versatile fragrance is ideal for both work and leisure, making it suitable for everyday wear, seasonal use, or special occasions.  I am 34 years old, living in Michigan for the past year and originally from Australia. I’m a beauty and fragrance enthusiast! For me, this fragrance evokes cherished memories of working back home in Australia, nestled in the mountains at a resort. The woodland and rainforest scents would waft through the mountains from the different forest biomes, creating an enchanting atmosphere that I still hold dear. It’s incredible how a scent can transport me back to those times, capturing moments that feel like personal treasures.  I appreciate fragrances that not only smell wonderful but also evoke a sense of nostalgia and connection to the past. This scent does just that, making it a staple in my collection. Whether I’m wearing it for a busy day at work or a relaxing evening at home, it consistently brings a sense of calm and joy. For any fellow fragrance enthusiasts, I highly recommend giving this one a try.  This review was collected as part of a promotion, but the sentiments expressed are genuinely my own. This fragrance has truly made a lasting impression on me, and I believe it will do the same for others who give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What I love about this fragrance is the woodsy smell that encompasses the senses. It is bold it is beautiful. It is decadent. This fragrance is not like any other fragrance can be blended with sweeter fragrances to make it dynamic is the all purpose sense for layering many different fragrances This fragrances dual purpose. It can be used on men or women this fragrance will last all day to pump and it will send the room. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt is a very beautiful parfum for its unique and captivating blend of woody and floral notes to create a warm and sophisticated aroma. The top notes of Bois de Balincourt include sandalwood, cedarwood, and vetiver, which provide a rich and earthy foundation. These notes are complemented by mid notes of amber and cinnamon, adding a touch of warmth and spice to the fragrance. Finally, the base notes of vanilla and musk add a subtle sweetness and sensuality to the overall composition. Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt has a pretty good longevity, the parfum tends to last for long hours on my skin without being overpowering. The parfum is quite elegant, comforting, and versatile, making it suitable for both casual and formal occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for the past week I can honestly say that it’s my new fav! I really can’t stop grabbing it! Don’t get me wrong when I spray it it literally lasts all day! It’s very nice and warm! Leaves me feeling extra  warm and cozy! It could be worn in any season though! You really can’t go wrong with this!

reviews.review_title: Great masculine neutral to masculine scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a sophisticated and concentrated fragrance that masterfully blends botanical tradition with modern sensibilities. With a dominant accord of cedarwood and sandalwood, complemented by a spicy cinnamon nutmeg complex and earthy vetiver notes, this scent is reminiscent of a deeper, more intense version of Le Labo's Santal 33. The richness of its composition means that just a small amount goes a long way, enveloping you in its aroma for hours.  One of the intriguing aspects of No.04 Bois de Balincourt is its polarizing nature. While many appreciate its woodsy, earthy tones, others detect a unique, pickle-like scent that can be off-putting. This makes it a perfect choice for those who prefer fragrances that steer clear of sweet, floral, or gourmand notes.  Maison Louis Marie's commitment to clean, luxurious fragrances that are phthalate-, paraben-, sulfate-, and cruelty-free is commendable. Their dedication to sustainable and ethical practices, avoiding harmful ingredients and animal testing, aligns with the growing demand for eco-conscious beauty products.  In conclusion, while No.04 Bois de Balincourt may not be everyone's cup of tea, its intricate blend and the brand's admirable values make it a noteworthy addition to any fragrance collection. Although I remain indifferent to the scent itself, I wholeheartedly support what Maison Louis Marie represents in the world of perfumery.

reviews.review_title: Reminds me of a early morning walk through the woo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hello Beauties, my name is Andrea. I am a beauty enthusiast and fragrance junkie. I love experimenting with new fragrances, I sometimes wear them as it is or layer them with other favorite scents of mine, and Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is perfect for layering or wear as is.  This fragrance opens up with a romantic Sandalwood and cedarwood notes. Then, mid notes are a spicy vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon, and the base notes are woody, earthy amber wood.  This is such a reminiscing scent that takes be back to memory lane.  This earthy, woody fragrance is like walking through a forest  in the early morning where you can smell the freshness in the air, the trees,  the earth, and other scents that linger in the air.  This fragrance is long-lasting without being overpowering. And I love the dry down of this perfume. The scent lingers ever so slightly on my skin.  I absolutely love the elegance of the packaging of this perfume.  I love that this perfume is made from clean ingredients, and it's genderless and can be worn by anyone.  I absolutely recommend this perfume. Another amazing fragrance by Maison Louis Marie.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can I give this product more than 5 stars? I mean, I am beyond obsessed with this scent. I used to be a proud user of body splashes from (dare I do not say thy names) and thought that would be my life, till I started caring about what I was spraying on my body. I went as far as concocting my own scents and found a French lady that would also make her own. Those are till now the only scents I use on myself. I LOVE the scent of wood & leather, so having this product in my hand is dangerous! (hahaha) I am so in love with the scent, first of all Sandalwood is top for me, and vetiver! I mean, its LUX in one bottle!! And that's really what this brand promised to give you Luxury and they sure delivered. From the packaging to the high quality of the scent! I love that they put the structure of the scent on the box. I'm an alchemist so I understand the TOP MID BASE aspect of it. And it last!! oh my does it last, I've been misting myself once during the day, and hours later I can still smell the base of the product! It's become truly one of my favorites. My partner was saying its only for Woman, I sprayed a bit on him, and true to its notes, it had such a beautiful masculine scent on his skin!  I will definitely be purchasing more of this, thank you Maison Louis Marie, you've out done yourself with this magic in a bottle!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite fragrances range from fruity floral to bubble bath scents, and everything in between. I’m always looking for a scent that’s unique and exciting. On me personally, the clean soapy notes are most prominent, and then the natural, botanical notes. It’s warm in a sophisticated way, not a seasonal way. You can wear this year-round, not just in fall. This is also a gender-neutral scent and my husband likes it as well. The quality and lasting power is impressive. One spray and I can still smell it on my wrist hours later. It’s a great scent for day or night.  Also, the bottle is so pretty on my vanity. I love the modern shape and the minimalist design. It was hard to not keep the box because even that design was so well thought out! Big bonus points that it is also cruelty free, as it’s becoming harder and harder to find cruelty free brands within the fragrance world. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression of this perfume was that the design of the bottle is very beautiful, classic and with a touch of vintage that distinguishes Maison Louis Marie in its products, the box is beautiful and perfectly describes its notes, when I smelled it I could instantly perceive a subtle woody aroma but that you can smell even with a small amount that you apply, I like to use the fragrance after the shower, for me it is a moderate fragrance that can last several hours, when the aroma is lost a little it leaves small notes of vetiver and cedar that are very balanced,  I would use this perfume in times autumn and winter both day and night, plus the fact that it is unisex makes it even more attractive, if I could describe it in 3 words it would be: natural, elegant and comforting. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No 4 Bois de Balencourt is a truly unique and captivating perfume that has become my new obsession. The moment I apply it, I'm enveloped in a warm and cozy embrace that feels like a gentle hug on a cold winter's day. The scent is unmistakably woody, with notes of sandalwood and cedarwood that transport me to a forest glade at dawn. Yet, it's also surprisingly creamy, with a richness that's both soothing and indulgent. But what truly surprises me with it is a subtle coconut undertone, which emerges on my skin as a sweet and creamy whisper that adds depth and complexity to the overall fragrance. The result is a scent that's both earthy and ethereal, familiar and yet utterly distinctive. Whether I'm wearing it to brighten up a mundane day or to add a touch of magic to a special evening, Maison Louis Marie No 4 Bois de Balencourt never fails to delight and enchant me. I also love how well it layers with their other fragrances to create someone unique and beautiful to match any mood!

reviews.review_title: Maison Louis Marie fragrances always spark a memor
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been in the beauty industry as a professional makeup artist for nine years and recently entered my fragrance girl era. As someone who suffers from migraines, I can be quite sensitive to fragrance and finding the perfect scent is a battle. This delicate fragrance is the perfect balance of sweetness, warmth and spice. While the scent does linger, I find it to be bearable without wanting to wash off of my skin immediately. I’m no fragrance expert (yet) but I can really smell the cinnamon nutmeg and for some reason the scent feels comforting; almost like that “curl up by the tv/feels good to be home feeling.” I love that Maison Louis Marie fragrances always spark a memory for me or an experience beyond the feeling of hate or love for a scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who’s always been an earthy and woody fragrance lover, I am completely obsessed with Maison Louis Marie’s No.04 Bois de Balincourt eau de parfum. This scent is like stepping into a tranquil forest, capturing nature’s essence in the most beautiful way.  Maison Louis Marie has a long history of crafting delicate, nature-inspired scents since 1792, and No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a perfect example of their expertise. This fragrance has a rich sandalwood base, complemented by cedarwood and sandalwood notes. There’s also a spicy touch of cinnamon and nutmeg, and the earthy vetiver rounds it all out, making it warm and inviting.  What makes this scent even more special is its connection to French botanical history. Louis Marie Aubert du Petit Thouars was a pioneer in this field, and his legacy continues through Marie du Petit Thouars, who creates luxurious, nature-infused fragrances that are free from phthalates, parabens, sulfates, and cruelty.  And I can't forget to mention how beautiful and elegant the bottle is. It’s a stunning addition to any vanity, with a simple yet sophisticated design that perfectly reflects the refined nature of the fragrance inside.  Wearing No.04 Bois de Balincourt feels like wrapping myself in a cozy, woody embrace. It’s subtle but leaves a lasting impression—perfect for anyone who loves natural, sophisticated scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance blew me away! I am a true floral girl. On occasion I wear a sophisticated gourmand but, woody, clean, warm spice! Never. I have not stopped wearing this since it arrived and I have some thoughts I’d love to share: 1) The packaging clean, sophisticated, luxurious, but understated. 2) The bottle design is stunning and designed so well it could easily be made for men or women. It’s just pleasing to look at. 3) The mister on the bottle distributes the spray on super fine bursts of mist. It’s lovely. 4) They scent itself is an elevated earthy scent. So sophisticated and clean. It’s well put together and would work for literally any occasion. You could get married in this but also wear it to coffee with a friend. It’s extremely versatile. Layers really well with things as well. I’ve layered citrus, floral, vanilla, etc. it grounds any scent that needs a touch of sophistication added. My boyfriend followed me around the house asking what I was wearing the first time I wore it 😂 I get compliments from women and men alike. Lastly, it has a nice medium trail that is not offensive and it lasts all day for me!

reviews.review_title: Warm Woods and a Touch of Spice
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance collector, I was excited to try on Maison Louis Marie's perfume, I tried their No. 14 Icila perfume oil before and loved its warm floral notes. This fragrance is in the earthy and woody category and lives up to its name. It gives me a beautiful classic woody notes vibe and has warm and masculine scents. I love the clean ingredients and the packaging is simple and luxurious at the same time. At first, the smell is smooth, creamy woody, and a bit spicy, and then it has an earthy hint, almost like a damp ground smell all these scents create a unique and interesting scent and I enjoy it every time. At first, it is a bit strong then settles down to a light scent but I wish it were long-lasting, I would love to see how it plays with my other favorite fragrances. This is definitely a perfume worth adding to your collection. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First I would like to say the box is perfect. Very minimalist which is nice. Nothing fancy and also the material of the box is very sturdy. When I first sprayed this I smelled sandalwood right away, I also smelled the vetiver in the same moment. I love the fact that I can tell there is a small amount of alcohol denat. I feel like this is very strong smells of natural oil rather than It being a man made perfume. Very natural and this has lasted me all day. I would get hints of the smells throughout the day and it boosted my mood as well! What a beautiful parfum, I feel like there has been a great amount of thoughtfulness and care put into this sweet smelling woody perfume. This is definitely a number 1 in my book and I also noticed that it is not overpowering, it is just the right amount of ingredients that went into the parfum. I will be wearing this for days to come and the price point is amazing for such a wonderful smelling parfum. I will be recommending this to anyone that loves a sweet woody scent! Perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've become quite invested in finding beautiful new fragrances for each season and I was pleasantly surprised with the Maison Louis Marie Balincourt No. 04.  The scent has a woody aroma with a very light hint of cinnamon. This fragrance makes me feel like I'm having a summer day at the lake with family. There's just something about these notes of sandalwood that just brings it all together. This could be a unisex fragrance as it's not feminine nor masculine. I know that I've thoroughly enjoy wearing this and making a routine out of it. I love to put this on after I take a shower, before leaving the house, even when I'm just lounging around in my house. This fragrance can be layered and can be intoxicatingly amazing alone or with the right pairing. I love this fragment so much that I spray it on my throw blankets that way when I'm tired and wrap up in them That scent is right back with me and I feel so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
