reviews.review_text: As someone who values luxurious and sophisticated fragrances, I recently had the pleasure of discovering Maison Louis Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt perfume. This captivating scent has quickly become a new favorite in my fragrance collection.  What I find most impressive about Bois de Balincourt is its remarkable longevity and sillage. The fragrance has excellent staying power, allowing the scent to evolve and unfold throughout the day, with just a few sprays providing ample coverage. Additionally, the scent projects beautifully, creating a captivating trail that is sure to draw compliments from those around you.  In terms of versatility, Bois de Balincourt is a true chameleon. It works equally well as a signature daytime scent, as well as a sophisticated evening fragrance. The depth and complexity of the fragrance make it suitable for a wide range of occasions, from casual everyday wear to more formal events.  Overall, I highly recommend Maison Louis Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt to anyone seeking a luxurious, nature-inspired fragrance that delivers exceptional quality and performance. The attention to detail and the masterful blending of notes create a truly captivating scent that I believe will become a treasured addition to any fragrance collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hi everyone! From the moment I became a cosmetologist, I have been super intrigued with skincare and finding new product that works for me to be able to share with friends, family, and clients. I was beyond excited to be able to try out MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. The first thing I want to point out is that it’s a great scent and that’s its light on the nose. I tried out their No.04 Icila previously and although I truly loved the scent, it didn’t last long on me and I feared it would happen with this one as well. That was not the case with this scent, I did not need to re apply at all. I can definitely smell the cedar wood and I love it! One thing I did do was to spray it on the cracks on my knees and elbows which I’ve never done and I think that really helped with longevity for me.

reviews.review_title: Madison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I so love Maison Louis Marie and the fact that they’re not only so caring about their customers but also care so much about our planet. They don’t use toxic ingredients that will harm our bodies or planet. This brand makes luxury products that are mindful of the environment while still keeping that luxe feeling. They don’t test on animals and never use animal derived ingredients. Bois de Balincourt has top notes of Sandalwood and cedar wood to lend and earthy feel to the scent, mid notes of vetiver, nutmeg and cinnamon to give a spicy warm feeling of home, and bottom notes of amber wood just ties it all together leaving you with this scent you know you’ve smelled before but just can’t place it. It’s so fun figuring out where the scent takes you back to. For me it’s childhood in a small Ohio town at my Grandparents house.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon first spray I wasn’t really a fan of this scent, however as it dried down the scent started to grow on me. I do think this scent needs to be layered as it’s too strong on its own. I like to layer this with a strawberry body spray to add a little sweetness to balance out how woody and earthy this scent is. On its own it can smell kind of like wet wood. The vetiver note is really strong and definitely overpowers the cinnamon note. The scent reminds me of what a fairy in the woods would smell like. Very earthy scent so if you only like sweet scents you will probably not like this one. The wear power on this scent is also really good. I find myself catching whiffs of this all day whenever I wear it. This also layers nice with a clean musk scent for a woody fresh vibe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been enamored by Maison Louis Marie ever since working as a beauty advisor years ago. I no longer work as a beauty advisor but my love remains and I finally have a bottle in my hot little hands. No.4 has always beeen the epitome of unisex fragrance to me. With a woody sandalwood base it is sure to sit comfortably on anyone I find the amber notes last to ghostly perfection even after hours of wear. For me I like this as a nighttime layer and maybe I’ll sweeten it up depending on the occasion. I find it plays well with other fragrances and layers and adapts to you. Love the clean ethos of the brand and how intimate and familiar it feels. The wait was so worth it for me I will enjoy this bottle to the last drop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is absolutely exquisite! It is better than I expected, but I should not be surprised seeing how amazing the fragrances and products by Maison Louis Marie are. I have been using it for a week now, and received many compliments and inquiries about my perfume. I love the minimalistic packaging which builds up to the thrill of the fragrance. It has all of my favorite scent notes in it, such as sandalwood, vetiver, and amber wood, that combine into a beautiful fragrance that is the epitome of luxury in fall. I feel comfortable, confident, and beautiful when wearing it, and it lasts for hours when applied. Lastly, I love how it is cruelty-free and vegan. I give this perfume 5 stars for being an absolutely exquisite fragrance. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Loui No. 04 Bois de Balincourt Parfum  has a very light, spicy fragrance. I was not able to pick out one significant ingredient scent as they all blend so nicely together. I was very impressed with the long lasting scent as it did not seem to fade after wearing it for hours throughout my day. The scent, in my opinion, is a gender neutral scent and is light enough for everyday use or for office days. I would not consider this a date night fragrance however.  I love that it can be layered with scents like vanilla or other early scents. The fragrance blended nicely with some of my fragrant lotions and even the fragrance from my lavender laundry detergent. The fragrance would also make for a nice candle fragrance with its earthy, almost homey smell. I appreciate this is considered a clean product and is planet aware.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second eau de perfume I have tried from Maison Louis Marie, the first being the no. 14 Icila which is a floral scent I adored. The only drawback was the lack of staying power as it only lasted a few hours 4-5 on me.  For no. 4 Bois de Balincourt, the staying power is much better, lasting around 6-8 hours on me. I feel the scent is more controversial though than no. 14. Whereas I loved that one right off the bat, this one gave me a first impression of being a strange powdery scent. Another user described it as baby powder scent which I think it very accurate. There are stronger woody notes with some more subtle gourmand notes like cinnamon.  I feel this fragrance is more unisex than no. 14. Overall I am not as head over heels about this scent as I am about no. 14, but I think it may be personal preference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect blend of Earthy, Clean and leavyy idk if that makes sense but this scent is so beautiful it reminds me of a beautiful garden where everything smells beautiful. I had it on and got so many compliments. I love how it smells and the staying power is great. I applied it 2 days ago on my shirt and my closet still smells like perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is an absolute masterpiece in the world of fragrances. From the moment I first sprayed it on, I was instantly transported to a serene forest filled with the scent of cedarwood and sandalwood. The combination of these two notes creates a warm and inviting aroma that is both comforting and luxurious.  One of the things I love most about this perfume is how the scent evolves over time. As it sits on the skin, it gradually transforms into a richer and more complex fragrance. The longer it lingers, the more the different layers of woodsy notes come to life, creating a truly intoxicating scent that lasts for hours.  Not only does Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt smell incredible, but it also has excellent longevity and sillage. I receive compliments every time I wear it, and people are always asking me what perfume I am wearing. The quality of this fragrance is truly top-notch, and it is worth every penny.  In addition to its amazing scent, the packaging of Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is also stunning. The minimalist design of the bottle and packaging adds a touch of elegance to my vanity, making it a beautiful addition to my collection.  Overall, I cannot recommend Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt enough. It is a sophisticated and timeless fragrance that will make you feel like a million bucks every time you wear it. Trust me, once you try this perfume, you will never want to be without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is an exquisite perfume that effortlessly captures the essence of serene sophistication. From the moment the bottle is opened, the rich, woody aroma envelopes the senses, offering a unique blend of warmth and tranquility. The top notes introduce a delicate hint of citrus, adding a refreshing burst that immediately uplifts. As it settles, the heart of the perfume reveals the true star of the show: luxurious, creamy sandalwood. This core is complemented by subtle undertones of vanilla and musk, which enhance the depth and complexity without overpowering the primary scent. One of the standout features of Bois de Balincourt - A single application in the morning lingers well into the evening, with the fragrance evolving beautifully over time. It starts with a robust intensity and gradually mellows into a softer, more intimate scent, making it perfect for both day and night wear. The packaging is elegant and understated, reflecting the timeless quality of the perfume within. The sleek design and sturdy build of the bottle make it a lovely addition to any vanity. Bois de Balincourt is more than just a perfume; it's an experience. It’s perfect for those who appreciate classic, woody fragrances with a modern twist. Whether worn for a special occasion or as an everyday signature scent, it never fails to make a memorable impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this perfume for a while now and am really enjoying it. The smell is earthy and woody but isn’t too harsh. It’s very wearable and I feel it smells slightly different depending on who’s wearing it. Since it’s a unisex fragrance, my boyfriend tried it as well. He really enjoyed it also. The smell really reminds me of fall and I can’t wait to wear it more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the scent of Maison Louis Marie! The clean scent was woodsy and earthy but not overwhelming. I found the fragrance refreshing and calming to my senses. Maison Louis Marie is a light inviting scent that demands recognition but it doesn't shout it's arrival. I paired the scent with my favorite scented lotion and it complimented it perfectly! To my surprise the scent lasted all day. I was very pleased when I first opened the beautiful box, it looked like a framed piece of artwork. The overall experience of the Eau De Parfum was very delightful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: While I love warm woody scents in my house, it’s not always the type of notes I use in my perfume. However I was delighted at how warm and not overbearing this scent is, and absolutely perfect to add depth to some of the sweeter scents I always have in my collection. I am particularly inclined to pair it with the vanilla perfumes that I love, but it even pairs nicely with fruity scents and can elevate them into a more sophisticated and rich scent profile. The perfume is very well concentrated and lasts well throughout the day - I never really felt the inclination to reapply this scent throughout the day. I also very much appreciate the elegant and sophisticated design of the packaging that delivers a fine and even application consistently every time I’ve used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was impressed with this scent, it’s very similar to Santal and i love it, it is extremely concentrated so a little goes a long way and i messed up the first time i ever wore this perfume. The packaging is so elegant and beautiful. I’m excited to wear this scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.  I believe there's something for everyone in each category, whether it be a Woody scent, a citrus scent, a gourmad, or an aquatic scent, it's just a matter of finding a perfume house which masters the art of balancing notes well, in my opinion.   I am absolutely delighted that I was able to try the Maison Louis Marie no 4 Bois de Balincourt. Upon the first few minutes of spraying this perfume onto my skin, I get a lovely nutmeg note as well as some cinnamon which is absolutely comforting, and fills my senses with ease as it takes me to memories of my childhood during the holidays with baking happening in the home and scents of woods. Sandalwood and Cedarwood is listed as a top note, but I do not find that I really get those notes until the nutmeg starts to fade away a little bit after about 45 minutes. Then the Amber wood starts to shine and take hold of the scent. This fragrance is not only comforting and fills me with a sense of ease, but it is also refined and elegant, I find that this would be a perfect fragrance during the summer for presenting masculines and for feminine energy I find myself thinking that this would be the absolute perfect fall and winter scent. This is a perfectly fresh scent and it really captures beautifully the woods and spices together in a perfectly balanced way.  Maison Louis Marie has an amazing mission as a brand as they are sustainable as a company and they do things to make their brand making a difference environmentally by being part of 1% for the planet. For those who love sustainable brands, I highly suggest researching into Maison Louis Marie.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my second opportunity trying Maison Louis Marie's fragrances. The number 4 Balincourt was not what I expected at all, I really thought it would be more of a woodsy /earthy fragrance and it is but it has a sweetness underlying those notes. It reminds me of an expensive vintage luxury perfume, very unique in its scent. At first I wasn't sure if I liked it but I didn't dislike it right off the bat either, I have to say this is the toughest fragrance I've ever had to review because it's really difficult to describe honestly.. While wearing it I did receive a ton of compliments though which made me really think that fragrance really smells different on everyone and to everyone, this fragrance is unlike any other I've personally had, like I said it's very unique and the more I wore it the more I liked it. It's really something you have to experience for yourself in my honest opinion but it's absolutely genderless and can be worn by anyone and is really beautiful layered with the number 14 fragrance and I love the simplicity of Maison Louis Marie's bottles and packaging, they just look really beautiful on my perfume shelf as well..

reviews.review_title: A Walk Through a Parisian Fairytale
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been on the hunt for a new signature scent for a while, something unique and intriguing but still wearable every day.  Let me tell you, Maison Louis Marie's No. 04 Bois de Balincourt totally fits the bill!  The first spritz instantly transports me to a crisp autumn afternoon.  The warm sandalwood and cedarwood base is what hits you first, but then this beautiful spiciness from the cinnamon and nutmeg peeks through. It's not overpowering, but it adds a complexity that keeps things interesting. There's also a hint of vetiver, grounding the whole scent and making it feel sophisticated and mysterious.  Here's the thing that really surprised me: Bois de Balincourt lasts.  I don't need to constantly reapply throughout the day, and even by evening, I can still catch whiffs of it on my skin.  It's not a loud perfume, but it leaves a subtle trail that feels luxurious and lingers in the best way possible.  I also love that the perfume is vegan and cruelty-free, which is a big plus for me. Plus, the sleek glass bottle and rollerball applicator look super chic on my vanity.  Overall, I'm absolutely smitten with Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt. If you're searching for a unique, woodsy fragrance that's both intriguing and sophisticated, look no further!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is utterly unique, and it stands out from the typical viral scents that are popular nowadays. Rather, this fragrance is earthy and woody: it features a captivating blend of sandalwood, cedarwood, and cinnamon, It is the best choice for those who like spicy scents. It lasts long, and I am talking super long: I sprayed it on my wrist before going to bed, and the scent was still lingering around me the next day. I like layering it with other scents, but even on its own, it could be a perfect scent for a special evening or even everyday use. A little about the packaging: I am absolutely in love with the subtle but luxurious design! The box and the bottle are both plain, yet they are so elegant, making a statement piece on vanities. Overall, it is a great choice for those who like long-lasting, luxury fragrances.   This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried an array of scents, many that are more amber or have woody and rosy profiles. Maison Loui Marie's No.4 Bois de BalinCourt is a woody yet earthy scent it reminds me of an Oriental scent. It reminds me of Floraiku scents in the way that it is tea like, this scent is earthy, tea like, cinnamon and sandalwood. It's key notes are in fact Sandalwood, Vetiver and amber wood which are very rich woody botanicals. This brand is amazing at creating fresh, clean and sustainable products that are para en free, vegan, no phthalates, and is clean and planet aware. Overall this scent can be layered with any of Maison Loui Marie's perfumes or even any you desire to give them an omph. I find the versatility of MLM's fragrances to be quite unique. I believe that Bad Bunny actually wears this scent which is a fun fact to add in!   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to share my personal review of the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, a scent that has captured my heart and nose. This fragrance is a masterclass in harmony, blending the richness of sandalwood and cedar with the warmth of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon, all the warmth of fall but perfect a July day  From the moment I sprayed this perfume onto my skin, I was struck by its complexity and depth. The top notes of immediately introduced themselves with a soft, woody aroma that was both familiar and comforting. As the underlying scent unfolded it adding a warm, spicy quality that was addictive.  One of the things that sets No.04 apart from other woody fragrances is its ability to balance its various components with ease. As the fragrance dries down, the base notes of woody notes and amber begin to take over, leaving behind a smooth, creamy trail that is both soothing and seductive. The amber in particular is noteworthy, adding a rich, golden quality that is both luxurious and comforting.  Throughout the day, No.04 remains surprisingly long lasting, with each note working in harmony to create a scent that is both cohesive and engaging. I've found myself reaching for this fragrance again and again, whether I'm heading to work or running errands or simply want to add a touch of sophistication to my daily routine.  One of the things I love most about No.04 is its versatility. It's a scent that can be worn during any time of the year. It's equally sophisticated to wear for a special occasion or as part of a daily routine.  In terms of longevity, No.04 delivers impressive results. With regular application, I've found it lasts for at least eight hours on my skin, leaving behind a trail that's both pleasant and pleasant-smelling. And while it's not overpowering or overwhelming, I've found that it gets noticed by those around me in a good way!  I want to talk about the packaging. The bottle itself is simple yet elegant, with a sleek design that looks beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Maison Louis Marie for their beautiful and unique scents and No.04 Bois de Balincourt does not disappoint. If you like earthy/woodsy scents, then I think you’ll absolutely love this one, because I sure do! I cannot even think of a gravy that smells similar to this one because it is truly unique. The top note scents of sandalwood and cedarwood make me think of a cool fall night by a warm fire- it’s truly such an inviting scent. My favorite thing about this fragrance though, is that it layers so well with anything, thanks to the sandalwood. I have tried it with warm florals, fresh scents, and even citrus- and it just adds that extra warmth and uniqueness. I also really like that this scent isn’t masculine or feminine, anyone can wear it. I can’t wait for the fall because this is definitely an autumn essential.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum and really enjoyed it. The scent is beautifully earthy and woody, giving off a warm and natural vibe that feels sophisticated yet approachable. It's also great for layering with other fragrances to create a unique blend. I appreciate that it’s free from parabens, which is a big plus for those looking for cleaner beauty options. Overall, it's a lovely fragrance that adds a touch of elegance without being overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an earthy, woody-scented, unisex perfume and I am loving it despite usually preferring floral scents the most. While I found the woody notes the strongest, I could still smell the spicy hints of cinnamon and nutmeg. I feel this perfume is a great mix of both masculine and feminine notes, although it seems others around me had mixed opinions on whether it was more masculine or feminine. I had some people say they felt it was more masculine while others say more feminine.   While it could be worn year-round and I will wear it no matter the season, I do feel it does lean more towards a fall or winter scent. It is good alone or layered and I feel when layering it with a lotion, it helps the scent to last longer. When it comes to longevity, I would say it lasts about 8-10 hours. It is not super strong, but not weak either. I would still recommend going easy on spraying yourself so you don't overdo it and seeing what amount works best for your body.   As for the bottle itself, I love the overall design and find it very elegant. It was easy to spray out and it sprays out nicely and evenly. This was my first experience with perfume from this brand and I am highly impressed and looking forward to trying out their products.  *This review was collected as part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a captivating fragrance that truly stands out. The blend of sandalwood, cedarwood, and a hint of spicy cinnamon creates a warm, earthy aroma that is both sophisticated and inviting. I recently started a ritual of spraying this perfume just before I get off the plane, and I am pleased to report that even after five hours, the scent lingers beautifully. The longevity of this fragrance is genuinely impressive and speaks to its high-quality formulation. However, I do find the scent to be quite strong for my personal liking, which is why I am giving it four stars instead of five. For those who appreciate a bold, long-lasting scent, No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a fantastic choice. Its unique, well-balanced notes make it a versatile fragrance suitable for various occasions. From casual outings to formal events, this eau de parfum adapts seamlessly. Overall, this luxurious fragrance is a great addition to any collection, offering both durability and elegance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I must say that I’m impressed of how much I loved this perfume. It did not disappoint at all. I love this perfume from the bottle, packaging to the smell of it. As soon as you see the bottle, it literally looks elegant and sophisticated. I love the earthy undertones of the perfume that comes through after applying it. It makes me feel clean and refreshing after putting it on. Surprisingly, it didn’t made my head hurt either. I’m very sensitive with smells but this was great. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum has truly impressed me with its strong yet delicate aroma. This fragrance boasts an intensity that feels both sexy and sophisticated, making it an exquisite addition to any collection.  One of its standout qualities is its remarkable longevity; it lasts all day, ensuring you stay enveloped in its captivating scent from morning to night. The fragrance is also wonderfully buildable, allowing for a personalized experience that evolves throughout the day.  What sets this perfume apart is its unique, unisex appeal. It's completely different from anything I've ever experienced before. The blend is so harmonious that it feels perfect for anyone looking to make a bold, yet subtle statement.  I highly recommend Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum to anyone seeking a memorable and alluring fragrance. This scent is a game-changer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 is a blend of sophistication, elegance, and a touch of sexiness. Typically a fan of floral scents, this fragrance has transformed my preferences. It opens with rich sandalwood and cedarwood, followed by earthy vetiver and nutmeg. The dry down reveals warm amber wood, cardamom, and lingering spices, offering impressive longevity. Perfect for year-round wear and any occasion, its minimalist, elegant bottle design and eco-friendly ingredients add to its appeal. If you want a sophisticated, woodsy fragrance with a hint of spice, this is an excellent choice.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful earthy scent that smells like a dream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With a focus on natural ingredients, No. 4 is a unisex fragrance ideal for year-round wear. I was captivated with the story of how Marie was inspired by her childhood summer home in France. After hearing her story and trying out the fragrance for myself, I see myself picturing an outdoor escape every time I get a sniff of the earthy woody tones of this perfume! The notes of sandalwood, cedarwood, amber wood, infused with vetiver, cinnamon, and nutmeg remind me of a beautiful forest.   I just can’t stop smelling this again and again! The scent is both sensual and sophisticated, making it a versatile choice for all occasions. It makes me feel beautiful and powerful at the same time, knowing I smell like a dream! This scent lasts through out the day and I have had people complimenting me even hours after first applying it. I will be using this as an everyday scent because of its subtleness yet deliciousness!  Maison Louis Marie's dedication to sustainability and quality craftsmanship shines through in No. 4, offering a fragrance experience that not only pleases the senses but also supports a greener planet. I was especially impressed by the minimal yet aesthetically pleasing packaging. I cannot wait to try out more scents. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a woody and earthy scent for women and men. Top notes are Sandalwood and Cedar; middle notes are Vetiver, Nutmeg and Cinnamon; base notes are Woody Notes and Amber. I would describe this as a very fresh green scent. The cedarwood is so strong for me, and I don’t get cinnamon or any other spicy notes. The longevity is very good. It lasts 8-10 hours. The sillage is moderate. It can be worn all year round and on every occasion. The glass bottle is heavy, minimalistic, and beautiful. While this is a nice fragrance with beautiful notes, it’s not my cup of tea. I love Maison Louis fragrances overall, and I also love that their products are clean and cruelty-free, but unfortunately, I’m not a fan of this particular scent. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt by Maison Louis Marie has me on a sensory rollercoaster and I’m absolutely here for it. As someone who's obsessed with fragrance and constantly hunting for my next scent obsession, this one has me officially hooked!   Right off the bat, the initial spritz hits me with a surprising (yet delightful) note of cucumbers. Now I know cucumbers aren't listed in the official scent notes, but trust me! That's exactly what it's giving. It's fresh and green, an unexpected start that feels both invigorating and oddly comforting.  As the scent settles and dries down, it transforms into something that gives me serious nostalgia. Remember Abercrombie & Fitch back in the day? Think of that, but with a sophisticated twist. It smells spicy, warm, and toned down just enough to be wearable. It's like a sophisticated echo of my younger years, all grown up and polished.  But the true magic happens as the scent begins to fade (which happens sooner than I'd prefer.) This nearly disappearing act reveals my favorite version of this fragrance: sweet, soft, and woodsy. It's a subtle combination of notes that feels intimate and calming.  Bois de Balincourt is a chameleon, shifting and evolving with each wear. It’s not just a fragrance, it’s a journey through memories and moods. If you're like me and always on the lookout for a scent that keeps you guessing and leaves you enchanted, this one might just be your next obsession. (This review was collected as part of a promotion)

The good benefits of this Parfum is the long lasting outcome you get after putting it on it is also a vegan &cruelty free which would be a great and mindful of your body and the environment I’ve received many compliments when asked what kind of scent do I have on I mean this scent is truly everything and more especially if you are always on the go this right here will really do it for you I’ve been wearing it everyday since I’ve got it i highly recommend this if you are someone like me that loves to smell good everyday I’m so used to wearing the same perfumes but now I believe my mind is fully made up to what I am goin to stick to and this is it it’s also dominant cedar wood and sandal wood accord that’s supplemented by a spicy cinnamon!!

Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a romantic, woodsy scent. with top notes of  cedarwood and sandalwood, middle notes of cinnamon, vetiver, and base notes of amber wood.  The top notes of cedarwood and sandalwood are immediately noticeable upon the first spritz. As the fragrance develops, the middle notes of cinnamon and vetiver begin to emerge, which  adds a touch of spicy warmth that complements the woodsy top notes . It brings a sense of coziness.The base notes of amber wood are what truly anchor this scent. On my skin, there were moments when I could detect a subtle hint of sweet vanilla. This is such a beautifully balanced, great unisex scent that is perfect for layering, allowing you to create a personalized scent. Overall, Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is an excellent choice for anyone seeking a unique, long-lasting, and versatile fragrance. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who's an enthusiast, beauty lover &' a huge huge fragrance lover/fanatic . OMG ! - two things about me, is that I truly/absolutely love love finding different/new to me fragrances from all brands &' second, is that I'm absolutely picky on my fragrance scents/notes, I love fragrances that have a attractive/unique note(s) to it . I recently received yet another beautiful/meaningful/unique fragrance from Maison Louis Marie called Bois De Balincourt aka No.4 . I'm going to be completely honest, No.4 smells very devine/beautiful &' all the notes are very well balanced out perfectly but I'm honestly not a huge fan of cedarwood, it sorta turns me off a tad bit lol . I'll definitely layer it with another fragrance that has different notes in it, to give a variety of scent . I'm definitely looking forward to future fragrances from Maison Louis Marie

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt perfume smells like Christmas to me!! Like legit, straight out of a Hallmark Christmas Tree Farm Movie perfume haha! Which isn’t a bad thing, but it will definitely be a perfume some will love and some won’t love as much.   Once it’s on long enough, I do get a slight bit of a sweeter scent come through, which is really pleasant and I absolutely LOVE the sweetness to it (which might be the cinnamon coming through but truthfully, it smells fruity to me)!  Top notes: Sandalwood and Cedarwood  Mid notes: Vetiver Nutmeg Cinnamon   Base notes: Amber Wood  Definitely unisex! Not overpowering at all but lasts a good amount of time on me!  I really do enjoy it - but will be holding onto it until Fall/Winter!  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_text: My name is Kasarah and a insider enthusiast. Maison Louis Marie is a company that does not test on animals or used animal derived ingredients. They are into clean beauty and non toxic. Trees are planted with every purchase as well. It is nice to support a company that cares!  I enjoy that the no. 04 Bois de Balincourt scent is earthy. This contains Amber Wood, Sandalwood, and Vetiver. 1 or 2 sprays are good enough, but of course, use as much as you want! I use clean and natural products. Although I enjoy the earthy scent, this particular scent reminds me of a bug repellent I use. That is not a bad thing, but that is what it reminds me of. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I Can’t say enough good things about this brand and their perfumes. Everything about this from the packaging to the product embodies elegance and sophistication. I have been in the beauty industry for almost 10 years and tend to stay away from wearing perfumes as a courtesy to my clients, but this perfume in particular is a game changer for me. I get so many compliments wearing this! It is very light and subtle, especially as it settles on the skin. I really love those earthy undertones of the perfume that come through, it is the perfect scent for everyday wear.  My skin is easily irritated and I also have a sensitive sense of smell, I don’t love wearing perfumes because of this; but I am so impressed with their dedication to clean ingredients and quality of their product. The only thing I will say is that I wish it lasted a bit longer on my skin, but other than that I’m very impressed. If you like to layer your scents this is the perfect one to use as a base. I have loved wearing this both on its own and with their No. 14 Icila perfume. This is my go to daily scent, I haven’t left the house without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin

One spray is enough to envelope the senses without being overwhelming.  The initial top notes are absolutely divine.  It's mildly sweet while being earthy.  It feels very reminiscent of a something that I can't remember, but very delicious and homey.  I just can't help but keep sniffing my wrists during the first hour - it is absolutely magical.  As the day wears on, it totally transforms into a bit more masculine and musky fragrance - but gender neutral nonetheless.  The quality is extremely high from the simplicity of the packaging, to the spray, to the formula itself.  I can tell a lot of love was put into it.

reviews.review_title: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion I’m a licensed cosmetologist, my passion is hair. But sometimes I love trying new beauty items for myself and for my clients that ask for recommendations. I wanted to try Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt.       Skin type and age: combination and mid 30s   Scent:  not quiet sure how to describe it. I had my daughter help me describe it. It smells clean like laundry. Smells like it’s made for both male and female. It’s pretty mild not too strong and overbearing.      Application: easy to spray. Spray anywhere on your skin or on your clothes if you’re sensitive to fragrances on your skin. The spray didn’t ruin or stain my clothes.       The product: the scent lasted a fair amount of time without reapplying.  Overtime, my sense of smell kept thinking I was wearing freshly scented clothes but it was the fragrance.      Overall, I would recommend this fragrance. It’s ideal for anyone. It’s very pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie have done it again. The nose of Maison Louis Marie have crafted a beautiful and romantic fragrance that really indulges the senses. Balincourt No.4 is a romantic and warm scent that really hugs you. Upon first spraying you can decipher easily the warmth of the sandalwood and cinnamon. When it rests on the skin the amber wood comes through and all together you’re left with a luxe smell.  No.4 Balincourt really reminds me of the classics. It also reminds me of a great unisex scent, its warmth reminds me of cozy rich smell. It even reminds me a bit of stealing a spritz of your partners favorite cologne so you can smell him on you. The bottle is a classic Maison Louis Marie bottle. In all Balincourt is a warm romantic scent that exudes luxury, you will smell expensive! I like to spray it on my pulse points.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie always offers something unique, and No.4 Bois de Balincourt was a delightful experience. This unisex EDP is woody, earthy, spicy, and a bit citrusy, providing a warm, cozy feeling whether I wear it or my partner does. It has top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, middle notes of cinnamon, and settles into base notes of amber wood. I had never tried these notes in a perfume before, but my partner was excited, and it didn't disappoint. It's a pleasant experience and perfect for all seasons due to its earthy, cozy, and warm vibe. I love to layer it with any vanilla or sandalwood body cream, then apply it to my pulse points and clothes, and it lasts 5-6 hours. Overall, I absolutely love it, and it will definitely appeal to everyone.

reviews.review_text: As a person with over 10 years of experience working in the fragrance industry I have experienced hundreds of perfume scents and this is absolutely one of the best. This is a warm woodsy scent that is truly unlike any other scent that I have ever used and a fragrance that I never want to be without. Opening with notes of woodsy Sandalwood and Cedarwood that drift smoothly into notes of spicy Nutmeg, Cinnamon and earthy green Vetiver blending with beautiful warm Amber Wood makes this fragrance a soul inspiring journey for the senses.Unlike many earthy,woody fragrances Maison Louis Marie No.04 is warm,spicy and smokey,yet creamy and inviting with a touch of romance and sweetness to it that makes it an exquisite and alluring scent. This is a fragrance that is extremely versatile,as it is genderless,perfect for all occasions from casual to dressy and even though it's absolute perfection when worn alone, it can also be layered with other fragrances to create your own signature scent. I can honestly say that everything about that this brand is admirable as they not only create beautiful scents that are free of controversial ingredients,they are also planet friendly and donate a portion of every sale to planting new trees.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum smells like autumn. As someone who tends to avoid gourmand and favors woodsy scents, this scent combination hits all the right notes. This fragrance is genderless scent that's crisp and earthy, with a hint of musk and a warm spice blend. The cinnamon and nutmeg together smell strongly like cardamom to me. The addictive mix is sensual, perfect for day or night use. The throw is low to medium; it’s strong enough to smell if someone leans in, but it’s not a scent that will waft over to strangers. The glass bottle is heavy, minimalistic, and stands out in a “quiet luxury” manner. Not a complaint, just an observation is that I haven’t noticed the scent evolving over the wear time. My only real complaint is I wish the scent lasted longer than 4 hours because I want to keep smelling so good. It’s a strong 4 out of 5 stars for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie does it again!!!  Oh, I'm so happy with this fine fragrance! For me personally, this fragrance represents new love. It's exciting, daring and so very woodsy. I'm a huge fan of Sandalwood, pretty sure it was one of the first scents I fell in love with in my early 20's(also fell in love with a lot of men around that time as well lol)  The staying power is honestly my favorite take-away from this company. It lasts for HOURS on my skin. It stays put and I love laying over an additional Sandalwood oil for a little extra romantic sparkle. I don't really pick up on the Cinnamon Nutmeg though, to me it smells almost herbaceous in my opinion. I would definitely wear this on a outdoorsy type date because it's so alluring.  As always the attention to aesthetics is perfectly shown, the bottle is beautiful amongst my growing collection. Love, love, love, the only thing I would change is I wish it was a finer mist. Easy fix though is I plan on putting some in my travel atomizer so I can just pop it in my purse for easy on the go touch ups. Definitely recommend for outdoor enthusiasts. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Explore a scent that will take you back to those summer nights with those beachy and woodsy scents to make the moments last. Whether you're reading a book or you're at a bonfire, this scent will reminisce the memories and make you feel at ease. Hence Maison Louise Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt perfume is a nice parfum to try.  This perfume has notes of Sandalwood and Cedarwood for a nice woodsy scent which blend in with a slight sweetness yet spicy with Cinnamon and Nutmeg and that hint of nature from Vetiver. It also has a lasting scent of Amber Wood too.   The perfume is alright. I like the spice and woodsy scent that blends in together however I tried to layer it with the No. 14 and it smells weird to me in my opinion. It should be paired with a lotion with a warmth and a little sweet scent to balance it out. I think it can also be worn for the fall/ winter time if you like to feel the ambience. Personally this scent reminds of Late August during the last days of summer enjoying the moments with friends before summer ends. I would recommend this perfume to anyone who has a preference for woodsy scents.

reviews.review_title: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Experience the captivating allure of MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, where sophistication meets serenity. Although it is considered a unisex perfume I see if more of a cologne for men. From the first spritz, you can smell top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood which intertwine effortlessly, evoking a sense of masculinity. The fragrance unfolds with a mid notes of spicy nutmeg, cinnamon and vetiver adding a subtle warmth that lingers delicately on the skin. FInally, the base note is amberwood. Its long-lasting, natural essence makes it perfect for someone who enojy these top, middle and base notes. It can be worn on every occasion, whether a casual day out or a special evening affair. Discover a fragrance that embodies timeless elegance and natural beauty with MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie's fragrances evoke a sensory journey unlike any other, and No. 4, with its intriguing blend of cedarwood, sandalwood, and a complex of cinnamon and nutmeg, stands as a testament to their artistry. One of the most striking features of No. 4 is its genderless appeal. While traditionally categorized as a sandalwood fragrance, its allure transcends gender norms, effortlessly complementing both men and women who seek a scent that defies conventional boundaries. It's a scent that speaks of tradition and togetherness, resonating with the nostalgia of holidays past and the promise of gatherings yet to come. As the fragrance melds with the body's warmth, the woody base gains depth, underscored by a hint of amber that adds a nuanced sweetness without overpowering the composition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello! I've been using No. for about 6 days. 4 Bois de Balincourt and it has left me surprised, its background notes with that woody feeling that it leaves on my skin, it has been the most captivating surprise that a perfume has left me, in the first instance it is clean and fresh but as it evolves in my skin, it creates a mysterious and sensual atmosphere that leaves me at the end of the day wanting to continue feeling that feeling of mystery. A perfect perfume for a day of adventure and end it with a romantic sunset in front of a campfire and good company. It's one of my favorites from my collection. I recommend using it from the morning and if you want to touch it up it is in the heat spots to speed up the process of posing on the skin and feel the full range of the fragrance. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the scent although I will say it works better with my son's body chemistry than mine. It is very earthy-woodsy it reminds me of hiking in the forests in the pacific northwest. I love that it's layerable it works really well when combining with a perfume oil for long lasting wear. I love that it's gender neutral it smells nice on men and women but as I said before I feel like it blends better with men's body chemistry. It's long lasting on its own and I have gotten many compliments on it so far. I like to wear it when I'm doing something outdoors like an art walk or street fair. My son likes to wear it everywhere so that's a plus too. Overall I'd say this is another fantastic scent from this brand definitely recommend if you're into that earthy sandlewood/cedarwood scent.

It was a pleasure to learn about this company and try this perfume. I absolutely love how they have continued with a family tradition. At the first scent I wasn’t sure how i was going to feel about the Maison Louise Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt After a few minutes of it soften down to a very nice smell. The more I wear it, the more it’s growing on me. I feel this would make a great winter perfume but of course can be used all year round. The perfume didn’t last a long as I was hope, I’m going to apply it after an unscented moisturizer, and see how that works out. The Maison Louis Marie No. 4 -Bois de Balincourt definitely can be used as unisex fragrance with scents of top sandwood and cedar wood, mid vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon base note amber wood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt has quickly become one of my favorite scents, offering an escape to a serene woodland with every spritz. The initial burst of warm sandalwood and cedarwood immediately envelops me in a cozy, grounding embrace. As it develops, the subtle hints of nutmeg and cinnamon peek through, adding a spicy, intriguing layer that keeps me coming back for more. There's also a beautiful balance with vetiver that gives it a refined, sophisticated edge without being overpowering. It's a fragrance that feels both timeless and modern, making me feel elegant and effortlessly put-together whether I'm heading to a casual brunch or a special evening out. Bois de Balincourt is a wonderful perfume that is a must-have in your scent collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the brand Maison Louis Marie because they are a clean brand. They have no ingredients that are harmful to you or the earth. On top of that they give back to the earth by donating to help planting trees. As well as donating 1% of revenues towards the overall environment.    This scent is good for any season. Ig would be perfect for after the beach in the summer or sitting next to a fireplace in the winter. You can wear it for any occasion. Church, vacation, date night, grocery shopping. It suits anything!   When i heard it was unisex i was a bit skeptical on if i would like it or not. Usually it’s just a plain scent or smells more like a cologne to me and not something both genders can wear. I was pleasantly surprised with the scent and do fully believe both men and women can wear it with no problem.   Longevity lasts until the next day. I would put it on in the morning or even at night after i shower, long into the next day i could still smell it on me.   I can pick out the sandalwood and amber in the scent, which i love because those are some of my favorite notes in a fragrance.   The top notes in the fragrance are Sandalwood, Cedarwood  Mid notes are: Vertiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon  And base note: Amber wood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

The spritzer is good quality it hasn't jammed on me and provides an even spray of perfume. Definitely one for the people who like woodsy scents. The best way I can describe it is a soft sweet woodsy fragrance that makes you feel relaxed. All of the notes smell great together and the ones that stand out the most for me are the cinnamon, nutmeg and amber wood. I feel like this fragrance can be used during all seasons, but I will be saving it for fall and winter. It can easily be layered with other fragrances too, I tried layering with a floral vanilla and it smelled great. My husband complimented me when I was wearing it and asked for his own bottle that's how nice it is and absolutely works for any gender. unfortunately it doesn't last that long on its own, but I have my own methods to help boost the lasting power. Overall I love it and would buy another bottle. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: A woody, outdoorsy scent that I am here for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the moment o put this on, it reminded me of being camping with my family amongst the pine trees and it was instantly infatuated with this fragrance.   The notes are as follows:  Top: Sandlewood and cedarwood   Middle: Vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon  Base: Amber wood   I definitely feel with this scent the top notes are apparent immediately upon spray. I do get the warm spice scent as the day goes on. So definitely if you aren’t a woodsy/spice person this may not be for you.   The wear time for me is pretty decent. I definitely smells this ALL DAY LONG. Now it is longer lasting on my clothing than on my skin, but that is usually the case for most perfumes and let me tell you I smell this on the clothing until it is laundry time, and I am not mad at it.   And as always Maison Louis Marie has beautiful packaging, from the box to the bottle. I just love the simplicity and elegance of their aesthetic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t emphasize how wonderful this Maison Louis Marie No. 4 is. The scents are layerable, without paragons giving off a wonderfully earthy and woody aroma. I feel so beautiful using it and I feel so clean when I put it on after my shower. It encapsulates every outfit I wear and mesmerizes those around me. Not only does this smell good but it’s not too overpowering. A little goes a long way when you put this on and each time you wear it you know you’ll turn heads and have everyone in the room ask you what you are wearing. I love it and I think this is probably my favorite out of the entire Maison Louis Marie collection! The size is also great and will last a long way. Oh, and the packaging. Well let’s just say this will look cute anywhere and everywhere based off of the cute and minimalist packaging used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt smells like a smokey fireplace in a winter cabin in  upper peninsula Michigan. Marie talks about memories of her childhood home in Paris playing in the woods with her cousins which correlates with the notes of the perfume like sandalwood ,vetiver and amber wood. I also have memories of my childhood home in Michigan, nothing spectacular like a Balincourt in Paris but equally fascinated by the process of my Dad lighting the wood in the fireplace  and being intrigued by the fire burning the wood and hearing a popping noise. Also smelling the aroma of smoke from the firewood. This is what I get when I spray on No.4 Bois de Balincourt.On my skin I also smell a hint of cinnamon.  The perfume lasts pretty well on my skin. It lasted about 7 hours on my skin. The Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt perfume is not an overpowering smokey perfume. Which I feel is perfect for everyday wear in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a sophisticated earthy & woody fragrance suitable for all seasons and genders. Top: sandalwood, cedarwood | Mid: vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon | Base: amber wood I truly adore Bois de Balincourt; it’s light and airy enough to wear throughout the summer heat but also so cozy and creamy that I can see it being a favorite in winter too. On me, especially when spritzed onto fabrics in addition to pulse points, I can smell this all day. I even notice it lingering in the laundry basket at the end of the week which is impressive. This fragrance is particularly special because it was inspired by founder Marie Du Petit Thouars’ childhood at her family home of Balincourt and the forest that surrounds it. Maison Louis Marie is such an inspirational brand that focuses on cruelty free and clean formulas, climate neutrality, planting trees, and donating to environmental organizations with each sale. While doing all this good, they also honor a long line of family history dating back over 200 years to pioneer botanist Louis Marie Aubert du Petit Thouars, the namesake of the brand. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty and fragrance enthusiast, I love being able to help others with their purchasing decisions while also being able to discover unique products and No.04 Bois de Balincourt is definitely one of the most unique scent profiles I have ever had the pleasure of trying.   It comes in a gorgeous, breathtakingly luxurious glass bottle with simple yet elegant branding that will surely light up any vanity or dresser it is sitting on while the fragrance itself is the perfect balance of masculine and feminine notes that my husband and I both love and enjoy.   When I first apply it, I can instantly pick up on the cedarwood, amberwood, and sandlewood, which is very strong and dominant while also getting hints of nutmeg, cinnamon, and vetiver which really brings a mysterious and interesting complex to the scent. The warm, woody, spicy, and earthy combination of notes take me back to my childhood days that were spent at my family's secluded cabin surrounded by nothing but the forest and grassy fields.   What makes this fragrance stand out to me is how versatile it is, that it really is a genderless scent and that it layers so well with other scent notes especially fresh floral notes. It would be perfect for so many different occasions from spending a night by the fire to a datenight or even a casual evening out. It also has great longevity as my husband and I both could still smell it six hours after application, and the sleek design of the bottle makes it super travel-friendly.   Overall, this is a very beautiful fragrance that exudes sophistication, romance, elegance, mystery, and the outdoors. If you love and appreciate well crafted fragrances with amazing stories behind them, this brand and even scent is for you!

reviews.review_title: Perfect scent for the cooler weather !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so glad I have gotten the pleasure to learn more about this brand and try out their fragrances. The Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt is going to be my new favorite fall/winter scent. The top notes are sandalwood and cedarwood, giving it a perfect earthy,woodsy aroma. While the nutmeg and cinnamon give it a bit of spice, making it a wearable scent. This fragrance lingers beautifully on the skin but isn’t overbearing. It’s also a very long lasting fragrance! It brings me back memories of playing in my cousins backyard and running around in the woods. No.4 is rich in warmth and gives off cozy vibes like sitting fireside under your favorite blanket. It’s gender neutral so anyone can wear this beautiful scent! I adore this brand for their fragrances AND the fact that they stay true to their values. They are all about being clean and focus on sustanability. I’d highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance. It combines the earthiness of sandalwood along with the spice of nutmeg to create a scent that transports you to a cabin amongst the forest with a fire burning next to you. The scent transforms throughout your wear from warm to refreshing to spicy. I kept getting new hints of the smell the longer it stayed on my skin. I applied it on my pulses points ( neck, inner elbows, wrists) and had a full day of wear. Everywhere I went I receive compliments on how exquisite the scent is. It was different and caught everyone’s scent buds. I’d highly recommend this for men and women of all ages. It is complimentary for your day to day wear as well as evening wear. The oil is moisturizing and wears so well. This will definitely be a go to for all seasons. Gifted by Maison

reviews.review_title: Such a strong and rich scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second perfume from Maison Louis Marie and I’m obsessed. These are such unique scents in a good way! The notes are amazing and you can TELL what the notes are as soon as you smell it. Love the simple packaging, the clean ingredients, the amazing scent. The citrus notes, the woody notes, I was so surprised. Im originally not a fan of those notes but I know when it comes to Maison perfumes, you will ALWAYS love the notes no matter what. I can’t even begin with the layering! Omg. I need to try their oils and layer it with that! I also like how this is a “genderless” scent. It smells great on both women and men.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I consider myself to be a scent junkie! I love smelling good and I love having different scents to match my mood or to change with the seasons. I was given the opportunity to try Maison Louis Marie and they did not disappoint. To start, I really loved the packaging because it was just so sweet and simple and allowed the actual scent to do the talking. Although, I was a bit sad because my bottle did leak during shipping. With that aside, I have to say I really am enjoying this parfum. It has such a deep and homey, but very luxurious scent to it. In my experience, it gave me this very  ethereal feeling , like I'm in the French woods in a cabin on a beautiful rainy day. It had this way to transport you to a place I've never even been before. I have found myself giving myself a spritz for work, or on an errand day and even before bed because it smells that good. I love that even if you've had a full day this scent will still creep up and remind you that it's there. I enjoyed spraying it on my wrists and front and back of my neck. I had many compliments from this scent because it is just that good. I do feel like this scent can be genderless because of the different deeper notes to it.  *This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love collecting fragrances, and I recently tried Maison Louis Marie’s  No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. This scent starts with a lovely mix of sandalwood and cedarwood, and then you get these warm, spicy hints of cinnamon and nutmeg. Then comes the vetiver and the amber wood at the base which just ties everything together so beautifully.  Every time I wear it, people ask me what I’m wearing because it smells so unique and inviting. I would describe this scent  as unisex. I also can’t stop smelling myself. I smell really good! It’s one of those fragrances that makes you feel special and confident and cozy all at the same time. I also enjoy layering it with No. 14 Icila Eau de Parfum.  What I love most is that it feels perfect for any season. If I had to describe it in one word, the word would be comfort. I am not sure why, but that is the feeling that I get. It lasts all day, even with just a couple of sprays! I also love that the bottle looks gorgeous displayed on my fragrance tray.   Honestly, I can’t get enough of it, and I’m so excited to try more from Maison Louis Marie. I highly recommend this perfume if you’re into unique, special scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion As I first opened Maison Louis Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt EDP, I was first taken in by the beautiful packaging. The box and bottle is simplistic and sophisticated - something I aim for as a 31 year old new mom trying to find my style again. This scent struck me for personal reasons as the first impression brought me back to a memory of my husband taking me on a vacation to Laguna Beach, California two years ago. It was a magical vacation we took and we stayed in a luxurious hotel - it was a very special occasion I never want to forget. Every time I wear this perfume (which has been daily) it brings me back to that trip and I feel it smells rich and suitable for everyone. It's rare for my husband and I to want to wear the same scent.. but this one works for both of us, I just won't let him use anymore since i'm going to be selfish and use it all for me, ha! The scent lasts all day on me and i've never had a stranger ask me what I was wearing until wearing this! I will be exploring more from the brand as well since I love their mission. On my bottle, the cap does not click on or stay on very well so I do wish that was improved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a perfume lover with an extensive collection of fragrances, I have strong ideals for what I appreciate in a scent. I was fortunate enough to have the opportunity to try Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum and I found the scent to be exquisite and unique. The cedar note of Bois de Balincourt stood out on my skin, but it blended beautifully with the other notes, and it came across as mossy and rainy. Bois de Balincourt tells a story of first kisses near a mossy brook and then snuggling up with loved ones in the estate's library and burning cedar wood in the fireplace. It's direct, powerful, effortless, elevated, and luxurious, yet so woody and earthy. The woody and spicy notes blend into this beautiful base that's so nicely layered with Maison Louis Marie's No.14 Icila Eau de Parfum, as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a licensed cosmetologist/Barber for about 12 years now and have experience in various things including facial care and makeup and nails and hair care, since it plays a big part in my barbering work for my clients I also work with alot of people with sensitive skin issues, myself included. I have sensitive/combination skin with ezcema on top of that so hydration is a big thing for me, but I'm still a big experimenter with new products.  I am not a super huge perfume person because I have people with smell sensitivities especially with the cheaper perfume lines with harsher chemicals but when I say that these smell so fresh it is unreal. I was privileged to be able to try the no. 14 and I absolutely loved it then I find out you can layer this brand to suit your scent profiles I was hooked. I got to try the no.4 also and it is more woodsy and spicy but so fresh and light in a way that's hard to explain but the naturalness of this line has made this my absolute favorite by far and will probably be the only line I use for a good while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A must have  in my perfume collection gives a summer vibe for sure it smells like sandalwood and cedar wood complimented by cinnamon and nutmeg leaving a long lasting fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a beauty enthusiast, and I have been trying fragrances for almost 7 years. I have a collection of perfumes, and I am always excited to try a new scent. Maison Louis Marie always surprises me positively with clean, high-quality perfumes. This time I tried No. 4 Bois de Balincourt, a warm, woody, and earthy scent. It opens with top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood and mid notes of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon that are very striking and engaging. I noticed that the notes change over time when applied to the body. I could smell a very woody and warm scent, as if I were walking in the middle of a forest, but as time passed, the woody notes began to emerge as a pleasant mix of cedar and sandalwood. This fragrance is definitely for lovers of strong, woody scents. I was expecting this fragrance to be woody, but I didn't expect it to be that much. I can say that I liked it, but I didn't fall in love with the smell like the perfumes I've already tried from the same brand. I couldn't help but mention how wonderful the longevity of this fragrance is—that even after two showers, I could still smell it on my body the next day. Bois de Balincourt is definitely worth a try, but I recommend that you try a sample before deciding to buy as it is a unique fragrance with strong woody and warm notes, which may not suit everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found Maison Louis Marie's No. 4 Bois de Balincourt to be a beautiful, unisex fragrance with a deep scent of spices, sweat, and leather. When I first spray it on I get a whiff of creamy spices with an almost sickly sweet (vanilla) and dirty vibe (vetiver) with a very slightly harsh undertone, just enough to keep me coming back to it as it evolves into a leathery sort of scent that reminds me of saddles and horses.  The lingering note to me is sandalwood and it lasts for a very long time.  This is definitely a fall and winter scent that will remind you of walking in the woods and sitting by the fire (outside or inside!).  Fragrance fans of sandalwood and amber scents will love this one. Maison Louis Maries' dedication to our climate with sustainable packaging, climate neutral pledges, and donations to 1% for the planet and The National Forest Foundation only make the products more lovable.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty and fragrance enthusiast for decades, I was thrilled to have the opportunity to experience this sensual, sophisticated and invigorating fragrance!  This review was collected as part of a promotion. I’m always thrilled to find a clean, paraban and sulfate free fragrance that delivers.  Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is earthy, woodsy, and clean with notes of sandalwood, cinnamon, and nutmeg. It brings me back to summers at the cabin by the lake. I don’t limit it to only the summer season though, this is definitely a year round, genderless fragrance.  Something that really sets this beauty apart from other fragrances is that it can be worn alone and works perfectly as a base with layering! My favorite way I have been layering this is with Maison Louis Marie No.14. Chef’s kiss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a perfume enthusiast and collector, I've experienced many scents over the years, but this one truly stands out from my collection. This perfume gives a unique earthy charm when you smell it. Upon the first spray, its rich sandalwood aroma immediately captivates the senses, gradually unfolding into warm, spicy notes as it settles. The combination of nutmeg, cinnamon, and cedarwood creates an elegant, comforting aura that lingers effortlessly throughout the day, even in this hot and humid weather. Its versatility makes it perfect for any time of day. I layer this No.04 over the No.14 perfume oil and it totally enhances its allure, adding an extra depth to the scent. Whether you adore sandalwood or are exploring new fragrances, I wholeheartedly recommend experiencing this No.04 perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is a perfume like no other. It is made of many different plants from the earth. It has a rich, earthy, woodsy smell. It reminds me of my childhood playing in the woods. It is a  really strong fragrance and lingers for hours so if you are sensitive  to strong fragrances, I suggest you pass on this one. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Warm, Sophisticated, and Inviting: A Must-Try Frag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, and I absolutely loved it!  Scent: The fragrance is a beautiful blend of earthy and woody notes, creating a warm and inviting aroma. It has a subtle sweetness that balances perfectly with the woodsy base, making it sophisticated yet comforting.  Notes: The perfume features top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, mid notes of vetiver and nutmeg, and base notes of amber wood. This combination gives it a rich, layered scent that evolves beautifully throughout the day.  Experience: Wearing this perfume makes me feel confident and serene. The scent is long-lasting but not overpowering, creating a gentle yet noticeable presence.  Overall: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a stunning fragrance with a perfect balance of warmth and sophistication. It's a scent that feels both luxurious and grounding, and I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Oh, I really like this fragrance. It is very unique. I do not have anything like it in my collection. It does come across as unisex. It is not fruity or overly sweet or masculine. At first sniff, I smelled the nutmeg. It takes me back to holiday season which I like because of the quality time that I get to spend with family. I think the scent pairs well with my body chemistry. I received quite a few compliments while wearing it. I use five sprays: one behind my right ear, one behind my left ear, one behind my neck, one behind my right shoulder and one behind my left shoulder. I found that this enables the fragrance to linger and create a bubble just like an influencer recommended. It is great to have a whiff with any movements that I make every now and then. It’s a great surprise. I would suggest it to anyone who enjoys clean scents with a hint of spice.

reviews.review_title: the only woody scent I'd fall for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is a sandalwood fragrance with a dominant cedarwood & sandalwood accord supplemented by a spicy cinnamon nutmeg complex with an earthy vetiver note. I am very picky when it comes to woody or earthy scent being a fruity floral gal but my oh my this scent is just so captivating... More like dreamy. There is something about the way the notes blended and releases with my body's warmth. It's woody but there's a subtle sweetness to it (probably the amber) which blends beautifully on my body chemistry. I understand the comparison to Santal 33, but this isn't as severe. Santal 33 has noticeable violet and leather where no 14 is softer, warmer, and more feminine in my opinion because of the sweetness and powdery finish. I am just as inlove and cannot get over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is incredibly well-balanced, with earthy undertones that are perfectly complemented by a subtle hint of vetiver and amber wood. The moment I spritzed it on, I was enveloped in a captivating blend of sandalwood, cedarwood, and spicy cinnamon, creating an intoxicating woody aroma that feels both luxurious and comforting. It has a remarkable longevity, lingering on my skin for hours without being overpowering. I’ve received countless compliments whenever I wear it, and it has quickly become one of my signature scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: No.4 feels like a holiday of merry gatherings! The notes in this scent are very situational to me. This fragrance is always changing. Days when the weather is cooler, the amber and cedarwood really dominate. I'm transported to a winter day, I'm outside with my family chopping wood and preparing for a warm gathering by the fire, with stories and laughter. This scent is a blanket of comfort and solace. It feels very familiar and calming. I love how it triggers such beautiful memories and emotions in my mindseye. On the hotter days, it changes scent. It's so different and individual from before. Those days, it morphes into a distinctive and spicy scent. It feels like a family holiday with cookies baking in the oven and pies lined up around the table. The nutmeg and cinnamon really push through, creating such a unique scent and feel. This fragrance really adapts to the weather and environment. All of the notes have a separate feel, but also all give me that warm and comforting holiday spirit. I am very fond of this scent. I think it does a wonderful job provoking timely and comforting feelings. Cheerful and Jolly are never far when I wear this. It's utterly delightful and ageless! It's a classic scent and I'm very impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of Maison fragrances already as I have some of the other perfumes, but oh my gosh this one is absolute perfection! It has a delicious earthy scent, the first note that stands out to me is the cedarwood! I think of a lush green forest after it rains and the rain settles into the trees’ bark. It’s a very androgynous fragrance that can be layered with other Maison fragrances to create an elevated fragrance story. I love misting this on my body after a shower as it has a very relaxing and therapeutic effect on me. Peace in a bottle. Since I have a collection going, the beautiful bottles look so clean and fancy when they’re on display! I love how minimal and elegant the bottles and the boxes are.
