The box has the fragrance notes clearly listed so it’s easy to know whether you’d love the fragrance (I haven’t tried one I don’t love!!) highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am an avid collector of fragrances and definitely have specific notes that I gravitate towards. Maison Louis Marie No.04- Bois de Balincourt hits all of my favorite scents in 1 bottle! With top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, this scent immediately captivates with deep, warm, and spicy undertones. It feels like you're enveloped in the embrace of an ancient forest. The base note of rich amber wood adds a luxurious depth, making the fragrance irresistibly captivating. What truly sets this fragrance apart is the vetiver, which ties the combination together with a hint of citrus and spice. This unexpected twist adds a refreshing complexity that is both invigorating and sophisticated. It's like fall in a bottle, perfectly capturing the essence of the season. Wearing this fragrance, I feel a sense of comfort and allure. It's sexy in a subtle, refined way, making it ideal for any occasion. If you're looking for a scent that embodies the warmth and richness of autumn, this is the one.

reviews.review_title: The epitome of elegance and luxury!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louise Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt is an exquisite fragrance that embodies elegance and sophistication. The scent opens with a blend of earthy sandalwood and crisp cedarwood but then as it settles, subtle hints of spicy cinnamon and warm nutmeg emerge, adding depth and complexity to the fragrance. I’m especially attracted to this brand because of their quest for clean ingredients, sustainability and commitment to our environment. They donate 1% of their revenues to environmental causes.  I’ve been very impressed with its longevity. A few spritzes in the morning are enough to keep you enveloped in its delightful aroma throughout the day. The scent is versatile, making it suitable for both work during the day and a night out with friends.  The packaging is equally impressive, with a minimalist design that reflects the brand's commitment to quality and elegance. Maison Louise Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt is a must-have for anyone looking to add a touch of luxury to their fragrance collection. It looks so unique and luxurious on my vanity!

reviews.review_title: Must have scent for any season!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is the perfect mix of everything you could want! As an avid beach bum, I am always looking for the perfect scent to spray on after a long day at the beach. This scent is perfectly fresh, sweet, and spicy! My husband absolutely loves the way I smell after I put it on and so do I!   This scent is perfect for anyone who wants to smell good but doesn’t want to overpower the room and make other people’s noses hurt after walking in the building! I find that it layers over lotion really well also. The mister is very fine and puts out the perfect puff of perfume with every spray.  I highly recommend this scent (No.04) and I absolutely cannot wait to try some other scents from Maison Louis Marie

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Catch a whiff of elegance with the Maison Louis Marie  No 04 Bois de Balincourt .It's a soft woody/ foresty scent topped with sandalwood  and cedarwood with a blend of  a spicy cinnamon nutmeg complex with an earthy vetiver note. This fragrance evokes a sense of confidence, warmth, and richness. I have always wanted to try perfume from this brand, and this sure lives up to my expectations.  I get lots of compliments  when i wear it. It's such a unique layered scent that captivates your senses with its sweetness and unfolds beautifully.  I think it's a gender-nuetral scent and a great choice for summer & spring.  It accentuates its woody profile and takes my olfactory senses to a different level while leaving  behind a refreshing feeling all day. The striking bottle is definitely an extra touch of beauty everyone wants on their vanities. Scent lasted all day, but I  spray lightly on hair for extra sillage. It's a scent built to perfection! If you love to leave a lingering trail of beauty, this fragrance is definitely for you. I can't get enough of it, it's my new favorite!   Top note: Sandalwood, Cedarwood Mid note: Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon Base note: Amber wood  Available at Sephora.  This review was collection as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love Maison Louis Marie perfume because it's unisex, allowing me to share it with my partners who also enjoy it. The scent lasts a long time, which I really appreciate. It's free from parabens and phthalates, vegan, and environmentally friendly. The fragrance features a lovely woody and earthy smell with notes of sandalwood, vetiver and amber wood. Maison Louis Marie has been crafting botanical scents since 1792. This perfume combines cedarwood and sandalwood with hints of spicy cinnamon, nutmeg, and earthy vetiver. All their products are cruelty-free and free from harmful chemicals, making them a great choice for anyone. You can use it alone or layer it with perfume oil, I especially enjoy wearing it alone. It is a timeless and seasonless perfume that I highly recommend to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume's aroma evokes images of wandering through a tranquil, captivating forest teeming with lush foliage and majestically tall trees. While I found the scent to be captivating, it deviates from my usual preference for more feminine, delicate floral fragrances.  In terms of versatility, the perfume is indeed unisex, and interestingly, my husband appears to appreciate this fragrance more than I do. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is beautifully crafted and a unisex fragrance. It opens with sandalwood fragrance with cedar wood notes. It reminds me a lot of le labo scent that hotels use. Very sexy and rich. It’s got impressive longevity’s

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Am A 32-Year-Old Beauty Lover Who Has Been Exploring Perfumes Since I Was 13 Years Old - It's My Passion! I Have Experienced A Variety Of Scents, And Maison Louis Marie Never Fails To Impress Me!   No.4 Bois de Balincourt Has A Romantic Aroma Of Sandalwood, With A Strong Cedarwood And Sandalwood Blend, Enhanced By A Beautifully Spicy Mix Of Cinnamon & Nutmeg, Along With A Grounding Vetiver Undertone. This Purfume Has A Warm, Clean, And Fresh Scent That Is Truly Unparalleled! I Reside In New York City, And Whenever I Put On This Perfume, It Transports Me To A Serene And Picturesque Place, Surrounded By Nature While You Feel A Cool Breeze On A Sunny Day! Balincourt Complements My Natural Scent Perfectly, And I've Also Experimented With Combining It With The No.14 Icila, Resulting In A Stunning Blend! You Can Also Experiment With Layering A Sweeter, More Airy Fragrance That You Already Own. This Combination Also Smells Delightful!  My Partner Adores This Perfume On Me, Which Is Significant Because They Are Highly Sensitive To Scents & Very Selective! Balincourt Remains Noticeable On My Skin And Clothes For More Than 8 Hours! It's A Versatile Perfume That Can Be Worn All Year Round, And I'm Super Excited To Experience How Delightful It Will Be In The Colder Months! This Brand Has Shown Me That You Can Smell Fantastic In A Clean & Eco-friendly Manner!! I Am Absolutely Enamored With The Maison Louis Marie Brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has got to be one of my top favorites that I own now! The No.4 Bois de Balincourt from Maison Louis Marie is so unique in such a good way. I've always been a fan of perfumes with scents that are fruity, sweet, or flowery. Even fresh scented perfumes. I've never really tried the outdoorsy-woodsy scents before. This perfume has changed my mind! I now love the woodsy smells. I am able to easily distinguish between the different scents in the perfume. I can smell the Cedarwood, Sandalwood, and Amberwood for sure. The smells of Vetiver and Cinnamon are a nice addition as well. It's an all-around beautiful smelling perfume!  It brings back memories for me of my childhood spent at my aunts house on her acres of land. Playing amongst the variety of trees, picking fruits and veggies, feeding the roosters and chickens, and playing with the dogs. Just being a kid! It evokes such happy, peaceful memories for me. I really like that it can be worn all year round, in any season, and at any occasion. It's perfect for layering with other perfumes too. It's an experimental product most definitely. The scent lingers for hours-which I love-it doesn't need to be applied much throughout the day.  I'm addicted; I love it. I can't wait to try other perfumes from Maison Louis Marie. I bet they all smell so fabulous! I highly recommend this perfume; no doubt about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im currently a 2nd year medical student going to school out of state and wearing this scent makes me feel like im back home in Minnesota at my family cabin. The three types of wood notes (sandalwood, cedarwood, and amber wood) pair so nicely together its like a blended forest aroma. With that, the vetiver is what makes this scent so appealing to me, it adds a freshness that makes it light and airy for everyday use.   My boyfriend who is not too into colognes/perfumes even likes this scent and he feels good wearing it. So, if you appreciate the outdoors and want a unisex scent, this is perfect for you or to give as a gift for men and women.  The packaging is so nice that I think i will keep the perfume stored in the box because i love the way it looks.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with this perfume! The dominant cedarwood and sandalwood notes linger on my clothes for days and smell amazing on my skin. The perfume has impressive longevity that I don’t need to reapply it throughout the day. The bottle itself is elegant, and the spray delivers an even amount of perfume each time. Other than that I find this scent particularly suited for winter considering its warm additional notes of nutmeg and cinnamon. Lastly it is clean, layerable and would highly recommend it

reviews.review_title: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who loves to experiment with fragrances, this No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum from Maison Louis Marie is completely different from any other fragrance I own. Admittedly, I tend to grab sweet or floral fragrances more often than not, but I do appreciate more earthy and woody scents when done right and this one is executed magnificently! With dominant top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, mid-notes of vetiver, nutmeg and a hint of crisp cinnamon along with an amber wood base, this fragrance is a complex blend of sophisticated, romantic and mysterious scents all wrapped into one. I absolutely adore the chic, luxurious glass bottle and simplistic branding that evokes a special elegance of its own. No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum definitely seems like a genderless fragrance to me and definitely leans more autumn and winter season for me, but of course, you can wear whenever the mood strikes. Not at all overwhelming, but has a nice longevity to it and I think will layer nicely with some of my other fragrances as well. Definitely would recommend for anyone who loves a warm, woody scent.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a insider enthusiast and make up lover I have to mention that Maison Louis Marie No.04 - Bois de Balincourt fragrance is going to elevates your look, this parfum is so elegant, sophisticated and clean, all the person that smell this fragrance is going to turn to look at you, I love their notes on the top are sandalwood and cedarwood, on mid vestige, nutmeg, cinnamon and in the base have amber good, also I have to mention that it is unisex and due is eau the perfum is a really long lasting perfume, this perfume is going to become one of my favorite of my colection. The minimal packaging design win my heart ❤️.  This perfume is classic and you can use for all season and also for day and night   I absolutely lovely is a truly enchanting fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the smell of this parfum !   Earthy scent are one of my favorites scents, and that’s why  No.04 Bois de Balincourt was screaming my name ,                       I  am so happy this parfum is part of my collection, it’s  one of my favorite top 5 fragrances, I feel sexy and confidence every time I wear it ,  It’s warm , subtle, no to overpowering, I can wear it  all day , I  feel is not too strong for the day , but still strong enough to wear it for night events , and perfect for any time of the year , it just have a perfect balance and It lasts for hours.                                                                                                                                            I really like the packaging and bottle are classy and timeless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am Beauty and I am Divine. I don't have to do too much to be seen nor heard because my mere existence is evident. The Divine created me to exude natural beauty.  I am liken to the air we breath for I am light, clean, and flowing for I am Free....  MAISON LOUIS MARIE No.04 is a mysterious, eloquent, beautiful, airy, and sultry parfum yet it's earthy. I can identity with this parfum because it gives you this wanderlust feeling and you just want to flow aimlessly. On me it smells like a powdery vanilla sandalwood but it becomes sweeter as it settles. It's a gorgeous smell and so feminine. The Sandalwood is front and center but the amber wood is on its's trail. It's  woodsy but it's softened with the cinnamon nutmeg. It's just enough vetiver that it's not overpowering.  Overall, this parfum is pure mystery , but the sillage this leaves behind  is a beautiful scent that is indeed unforgettable.   Top note: Sandalwood, Cedarwood Mid note: Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon Base note: Amber Wood  ✔️ The longevity is about 8 hours  ✔️ It's a clean and fresh scent.    Thank you @ beautytap and @maisonlouismarie for gifting me this beautiful parfum.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what it is about this perfume but I cannot stop wearing it. I don't own anything like it and I'm so glad I was able to come accross and try it. As soon as I put it on I fell in love so much so that people cannot get it enough of it especially my husband. The sandalwood is so perfectly balanced, you really get the cinnamon and nutmeg with that hint of amber at the end. A light spray can last for hours. I spray it on my wrists, behind the ears and just a tad on my clothes. Not only do I smell like it all day, it lasts for days on clothing. I love that its made with clean ingredients and is good for the planet. The price point is reasonable especially since you don't need much to smell good all day. Overall this is a fragrance I highly recommend if you love woodsy and earthy scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No.04 — Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is very classy and elegant: everything from the shape of the bottle and the box to the fragrance itself is of such high-end quality. The scent is pretty strong at first, but it opens up beautifully, cheering me up. It is a warm and spicy, earthy and woody perfume. I live in a house in the forest, close to nature, and it brings harmony and calmness to my life. The same goes for this scent: the amber wood base with sandalwood and cedarwood top notes brings me to the forest near my home, even when I am far away from it. The spicy mid notes of nutmeg, vetiver, and cinnamon are deliciously warm and cozy. The notes are perfectly balanced and complement each other. This is the perfect unisex scent for all year round, but I think it’s especially fitting during the cold seasons: fall and winter. This fragrance is unique and intriguing, so rich and deep. I apply the perfume to my wrists and neck, and I can’t stop smelling my wrists during the day. It is so enjoyable! This scent is long-lasting and stays until I take a shower. I enjoy wearing this perfume alone, but I have also tried layering it with other fragrances. It is summer now, and I tried adding some floral and fruity notes on top. It also works great with citrus and vanilla scents, but I think it would be a perfect combination for the cold months.  I appreciate that the company is environmentally friendly and cruelty-free, using clean, sustainable ingredients for the perfumes and packaging, with no unnecessary plastic. I would definitely recommend this scent to everyone who loves chic, complex, warm, earthy, woody fragrances with spicy and even slightly peppery notes. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This beautiful, luxurious fragrance with a beautiful scent of  sandalwood and cedarwood, balanced by a heart of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon, with a base of amber wood. Create an amazing scent that is unisex With an amxing lasting powrr

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is a genderless and sophisticated perfume that opens up with a beautiful blend of sandalwood and cedarwood. It has middle notes of vetiver, nutmeg, and a hint of nutty cinnamon that adds a little spice, which I adore. It has a base note of amber wood that adds depth to the fragrance and gives it a luxurious overall feel. I found it to be very long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am typically a fruity with light floral notes kind of perfume lover and I have been looking for something a little different than my typical collection. The earthy and woody scent really surprised me and makes me feel really refreshed while wearing it! For me, perfumes are my collection and I display them at somewhere I can see everyday so I value the design of the bottles. The minimal packaging design of Maison Louis Marie really wins my heart. This scent as mentioned is not within my typical comfort zone but it feels approachable but not too overpowering. It does not have any strong scent that people hates. Sometimes I wear this with my boyfriend and he is a huge fan as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy all sort of fragrance and really dislike the distinction between men and women scents that the mainstream players seem to think we need. I’ve known to gravitate towards a lot of these so called men’s fragrance.  Maison Louis Marie No 4 is definitely a unisex one in the traditional sense. It is so complex and has many layers. On first spray, it reminds me of ombré leather from Tom Ford. Sharp, warm, leathery comes to mind.  I enjoy the mid notes the most on me. It becomes a sweet mellow almost honey like scent that is not candy sweet like some can be.  The packaging is simple and elegant. Lasting power on me is about 5-6 hours. It is not an overwhelming scent. I feel like I use this for myself for the feel rather than for others to get a rift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely loving this Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt fragrance! I recently started getting more into perfumes/fragrances this year and this is such a unique one to add to my collection. This has woodsy, earthy notes to it and it absolutely is a genderless fragrance! I personally smell a lot of the spices within the fragrance (such as the cinnamon and nutmeg) but my husband seems to get just the woodsy/earthy notes from it so I truly do think this is a scent that everyone smells & receives differently. The packaging is absolutely beautiful and feels so luxurious. I love that this is a layerable fragrance, though I haven’t given that a try yet. It allows for endless options! This is a scent I’m going to continue purchasing and having in my collection because of its uniqueness and versatility.

reviews.review_title: Nostalgic Serenity: Discovering Bois de Balincourt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt is truly an enchanting fragrance that has become one of my favorites to wear. The cedarwood and sandalwood give it a warm and woody base, while the cinnamon and nutmeg add a touch of spice and complexity. I have been using this perfume for a week and I find the longevity of this perfume to be amazing! It lingers on my skin for hours, evolving throughout the day without being too overpowering. I find that it’s good for everyday wear or special occasions. It strikes a balance between subtlety and presence. The packaging is also so nice and minimal, reflecting the heritage of the brand. Maison Louis Marie puts a lot of thought into every aspect of their products, from the ingredients to the design. This is a must-have for anyone who appreciates a sophisticated, well-rounded fragrance! *This review was collected as part of a promotion.*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No 4 is an  amazing  fragrance. It smells wonderful and it lasts very long. I love the woody scent notes. The key notes are a blend of sandalwood, vetiver. The scent is very romantic and unique.  The bottle is gorgeous and luxurious and it is recyclable which is perfect. The combination of ingredients is great. It is fresh, clean and rich and can be layered with other fragrances too or alone.            I receive many compliments when I wear this perfume. I like the fact that this is vegan fragrance made without any harsh chemicals and it is not overpowering.  Overall I’m very satisfied with this perfume and I highly recommend it to everyone . This perfume is a must have for anyone who loves earthy and woody fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This starts off with such a light burst of freshness, it pulls all your attention to it, and refuses to let it go from its grasp.   It matures quickly to give you a nice bite of the cedar wood rolling into the nutmeg & cinnamon which warm you as it told into its base.   It eventually settles into what I can only describe as a “fresh warmth” which seems impossible, like they shouldn’t be able to exist in the same space, yet somehow they are, and it’s pure intoxication  I expected I would enjoy this blend, yet never anticipated to what level it would grab hold. How can something be crisp while being soft, be warm while being fresh, be light while holding so much depth?  Perfect blend of these notes, a fragrance I look forward to wearing on its own year round, and seeing how it blends with some florals, & some more masculine fragrances I have as well. (This with a rose? Or a leather? Ohhh a tobacco?!!!). I will be getting so much joy here!    It lasts too! On the skin it’s all day, on the clothes? Even longer!  If you like earthy scents this is one you need to try  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Dreamy complex true woody unisex scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of scents inspired by nature, and gravitate towards Maison Louis Marie as a brand for their attention to this.   They also specialize is non-toxic perfumes and sustainable packaging, and are members of the fabulous 1% for the planet organization.  I'm definitely here to support that!!!   I love woody, earthy scents and was excited to try this one inspired by the perfumer's childhood home.  I love scents because of their connection with memories and I think that this is an intimate expression of that.   The top notes are sandalwood and cedarwood, mid notes are vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon, and the subtle base note is amber wood.  Sounds like a lot right?   The opening of sandalwood and cedarwood is somehow both true and light- it's not a heavy woody scent, despite being 100% woody.  It carries more of a powdery tone, which really comes out in the dry-down.  The vetiver, sandalwood, and amber wood start to shine after awhile, with a hint of spicy nutmeg and cinnamon.   The spray is alcohol based, and doesn't linger long on skin, but has great staying power on clothing.   This smells like a luxury perfume, but it very affordable for the quality it provides.   It's a true unisex fragrance as well (trees are for everyone hahaha).  It's become a staple in my household and I look forward to not only purchasing this one again, and discovering more from the house of Maison Louis Marie.  Well done.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying a fragrance from Maison Louis Marie and it did not disappoint. No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a genderless woody fragrance with notes of sandalwood, vetiver, and amber wood.  It also has notes of cedarwood, nutmeg, and cinnamon, which makes it a very cozy and warm fragrance. I like to enjoy any fragrance at any time of the year, but I can definitely see this being the perfect fall/winter fragrance. A little goes a long way for me, so I am very light with my sprays and I notice that it last quite awhile on my skin and clothes. Once it dries down, I enjoy it even more than the inital spray. It can also be layered, which would enlongate the scent even more.  Since this is described as a unisex fragrance, I also had my boyfriend try it out, and he also really enjoyed it. I am looking forward to trying more fragrances and products from Maison Louis Marie in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy the clean scent stories given from the innovative Maison Louis Marie and I was intrigued to try No. 4 Bois de Balincourt. I have to say this is much different than I was expecting. I was expecting fresh, herbal, woody and it's a more powdery, clean scent. Interesting enough I don't mind it(I'm usually not into powder at all), it smells like a luxury restroom instead of a forest excursion. It's not a scent I would choose over others but I don't mind it. If the notes came off more fresh and herbal I think I'd really love it. Personally I would enjoy this scent more as a home fragrance versus one worn on myself. I would recommend to someone who enjoys powdery, gentle, masculine leaning (meaning it smells similar to traditional male centered scent) fragrance. Definitely experience for yourself because it's different than you might expect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a big fan of woodsy and musky perfumes but Maison Louis Marie No.04 - Bois de Balincourt has changed my mind. It is a sublime fragrance that embodies sophistication and elegance, not overpowering like other woodsy, musky scents on the market. The blend of sandalwood and cedarwood is perfectly balanced with a hint of spicy cinnamon, creating a warm and inviting scent. It’s long-lasting without being overpowering, making it ideal for both everyday wear and special occasions. This perfume has quickly become a staple in my collection—highly recommended! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who loves trying new fragrances, I was really excited to try out the No. 04 Bois de Balincourt EDP by Maison Louis Marie. This is a woody and earthy scent with top notes of cedarwood and sandalwood. It also has notes of vetiver and cinnamon. Personally, I find the scent a little too strong when first applied (especially the sandalwood notes), but after a bit the strongness fades and I'm left with a really lovely scent. When the EDP sits on the skin for a bit I'm left with a scent that smells fresh and woody- a bit like clean, fresh air in the forest. Overall, I do like the scent, and I've been really impressed with the longevity of the EDP. If I apply it in the morning I find that it lasts most of the day on my skin. It's definitely a gender-neutral scent and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality earthy scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start with saying that I love a woodsy musky scent! This scent is very reminiscent of spending the day in woods in a log cabin smelling the natural scent of the woods surrounding you. This is what this scent emulates for me. Alone this scent is enough for me BUT layering it with a floral scent just adds this other layer of dimension that is truly astonishing. I love the intiial notes of sandalwood and cedarwood which really are reminiscent of a woody environment. The scent perfectly emulates an earthy undertone and I do get a subtle note of cinammon and nutmeg which just adds to the overall musky profile of this scent. I love the versatility of this scent since it can easily be worn on its own or layered with other fragrances. The component of this fragrance is very elegant. The glass bottle feels very luxe but my only issue is that the cap/cover of the fragrance is very loose fitting so I would be careful when lifting the bottle. Other than that I love this fragrance very much and can't wait to continue using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No.04 EDP is fabulous, in my opinion. I typically go for lighter, more floral or citrus scents but I really wanted to try this to get out of my comfort zone and I am SO glad I did.   The base of this EDP, amber wood, with notes of sandal wood, cedar wood, vetiver, nutmeg and cinnamon make this perfume so elegant. I imagine I will wear this primarily during the evening for events or date night. It will also be good for days when I have executive meetings. It is not overpowering yet pronounced and mature.   After wearing this EDP for four days, I found that the smell stayed rather well. I did pack it in my purse in case I needed to refresh and it was hardly needed. The scent stays with you even when it dissipates a bit.   I would recommend this product for anybody, like me, wanting to get out of their comfort zone. This bottle is also very elegant and will look lovely on your vanity. The one downfall is the top comes off very easy so traveling with it may not be ideal. Enjoy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is a creamy, woody daydream of a perfume from Maison Louis Marie. It is sandalwood-forward and one of the less complex compositions from the brand in my opinion. That’s not a bad thing, simply a personal observation. There’s something very beautiful about a perfume that sings a simpler song and this is one that, in its simplicity, manages to evoke memories of my youth- a handmade jewelry box, pencil shavings, hay bales, coconut toasting in the oven, a crisp, new book. It’s not childish-smelling in the slightest but it truly transports me back in time in such a way that I feel a little lighter when I’m wearing it. A little more carefree, a little less weighed down by my adult preoccupations. It smells like innocence and ease.  It also layers beautifully with other fragrances from the Maison Louis Marie line. For days when I want to pull a bit more complexity out of the composition, I will layer my No. 14 Icila perfume oil underneath. For days when I want to accentuate the femininity of the perfume, I layer my No. 13 Nouvelle Vague perfume oil underneath. As with most (if not all) of Maison Louis Marie’s fragrances, No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is extremely versatile and can be mixed and matched with other scents effortlessly for a custom fragrance experience.

reviews.review_title: An enchanted forest in a bottle.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What an interesting scent! I felt immediately transported to an enchanted mossy forest. It’s mysterious and sensual, even a bit masculine and strong, though also soft at the same time. It’s hard to describe it but I really enjoy wearing it. Either by itself or I also like to layer it with the No.14 Icila perfume oil, also by Maison Louise Marie. It adds a touch of femininity and floral notes. The only critique I have of No.04 Bois de Balincourt is that I wish it would longer.  I love the simplicity of this brand and their elegant packaging. But what I love even more is their strive towards sustainability and taking real action beyond just slapping a “clean” label. I also appreciate its affordability compared to other luxury brands of this quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance enthusiast, I was eager to try No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum by Maison Louis Marie,  I can confidently say it has exceeded my expectations. The packaging is elegant and minimalist, featuring a sturdy glass bottle that feels luxurious. The scent itself is a masterful blend of woody and earthy notes. It opens with sandalwood and cedarwood, which evolve into a warm heart of vetiver and amber wood, with a subtle hint of spice. This balanced profile makes it perfect for any occasion, whether it's a casual day out or a formal event. The longevity of the fragrance is impressive, lasting well into the evening with just a few sprays in the morning. Its moderate sillage makes it noticeable yet not overpowering, ideal for those who prefer a more intimate scent.  Overall, No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a sophisticated, enduring fragrance. If you appreciate fine, elegant fragrances, I highly recommend giving this one a try. It's a true masterpiece that elevates any fragrance collection.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a few products from Maison Louis Marie and they did not disappoint. I was excited to try No.04 Bois de Balincourt perfume because it’s said to be on the slightly woodsy side. Off the bat, this perfume is absolutely unisex. It smells amazing!! The fragrance that gets my nose the strongest is the sandalwood. The sandalwood is very dominant in this perfume but also has a creamy vibe to it. I also detect the vetiver and amber wood. I don’t really get hints of the cinnamon or nutmeg in this to be honest. I don’t mind because this is a great well rounded fragrance. The notes play beautifully together. I would say that this perfume could be worn dressed up or down. For a casual brunch to a night out on the town. Very versatile. It’s not that strong so this can be a perfume you wear to work as well or around people without worrying of being overbearing. This lasts a few hours on the skin. Overall, the scent is nice and isn’t overwhelming or overpowering but you must like sandalwood since it’s the key note that stands out the most in my opinion. *** This review was collected as part of a promotion***

This is a review for the Maison Louis Marie Eau de Parfum in scent No. 04 Bois de Balincourt. This is an earthy and woody type of scent. The top notes are sandalwood and cedarwood, followed by the mid notes which are vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon. Lastly the base note is amber wood. These scent notes balance each other beautifully. As the scent goes through the different notes over time, I felt very nostalgic and it was almost calming as well. It truly takes you on a journey! This is a wonderful genderless scent that would work well for anyone, in my opinion, but especially those who love woody scents. It also comes packaged in a gorgeous glass bottle that is simple, yet elegant. I look forward to trying more scents by Maison Louis Marie in the future! *This review was collected as part of a promotion.*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had no idea what to expect as this was my first scent from Maison Louis Marie, but I have fallen in love with this scent!  First of all, I absolutely love what the company itself is all about.  Focus on sustainability, and actually donating to organizations supporting sustainability efforts, quality ingredients without any animals derived products. No unnecessary plastic packing. And staying true to their origins and vision as a company.  The packaging is effortlessly chic: simple yet elegant and lets the scent speak for itself. The bottle is practical enough to bring along on the go in your purse, yet is also a gorgeous little addition to your vanity or bedside table.  The scent itself is divine. On my skin, it settles in as a very light scent, not heavy at all, yet at the same time woodsy and vetiver-y. The cinnamon and nutmeg in it makes it smell like freshly ground, slightly peppery cardamom to me, which instantly takes me back to my childhood in Scandinavia baking cardamom buns and drinking cardamom lattes. It is layerable and I love to layer this with a touch of a warm scent. It smells elegant and luxurious, mature yet still young enough for a 40 something like myself, and I've been wearing it every day since I received it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been in the beauty industry for over eight years now as a beauty content creator. This is my first time hearing of and trying this brand. I absolutely love fragrances. I feel like it’s a must have! I really loved the notes of this fragrance. I usually apply it on my wrist and neck about one or two sprays each. I really love that. It was not an overpowering scent. I received many compliments when I wore this out and people would give me a hug when I walked past them. I tried this fragrance out at work and my coworkers would stop asking me what I was wearing. I feel like if I got some of it on my clothes, the scent was still there the next day or at least I was still able to smell it, however, it was NOT overpowering to the point where it would give you a headache. I definitely recommend this! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: A Powdery Journey (Not Quite My Destination)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louise Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum promises a walk through a mysterious ancient forest. Intrigued, I embarked on this olfactory adventure, but the path wasn't quite what I expected. Upon first spritz, Bois de Balincourt hits you with a strong powdery scent. While not unpleasant, it wasn't quite the woodsy escape I was craving. As the fragrance settled, the woody notes began to emerge – a pleasant mix of cedar and sandalwood. This was more in line with what I was expecting. The powder softened a bit, becoming a subtle base for the woodsy elements. I have to admit, after a while, there was a certain comforting warmth to the scent. Overall, No. 04 Bois de Balincourt wasn't quite a love story for me. The initial powdery blast was a bit too much, and while the dry down was pleasant, it wasn't enough to win me over. However, I can appreciate the fragrance's complexity and could see it appealing to someone who enjoys woodier scents with a touch of powdery elegance. Would I Recommend? Maybe. If you're a fan of woodsy fragrances with a unique twist, Bois de Balincourt is worth a try. However, if you're not a fan of powdery scents, this one might be a miss. It's definitely a fragrance you'd want to test out before buying.

reviews.review_title: smells like so many high end earthy fragrances!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. This fragrance has quickly become a favorite of mine. Its woodsy and earthy scent is truly grounding and I’ve gotten so many compliments since wearing it. My husband has even taken such a liking to it he’s been wearing it as well so it’s giving unisex scent very well! It’s also comparable to quite a few fragrances I love like Le Labo Santal 33, Tom Ford, and few others and not too overbearing. It’s grounding and gentle but can be sharper the more you add. The cedarwood and vetiver give that wood tone and a hint of sweet with the sandalwood and spicy cinnamon nutmeg. This scent brings you down to earth and just one spray for me near my hair gave me this elevated expensive feel. It feels comfortable enough to wear almost anywhere as it smells fresh and clean with a nature vibe. I’ll be wearing this on the daily, love the grounding effect with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt is truly an enchanting fragrance that has become one of my favorites to wear. The cedarwood and sandalwood gives it a warm and woody base, while the cinnamon and nutmeg adds a touch of spice and complexity.   The longevity of this is amazing - it lingers on my skin for hours, evolving throughout the day without being too overpowering. I find that it’s good for everyday wear or special occasions. It strikes a balance between subtlety and presence.   The packaging is also so nice and minimal, reflecting on the heritage of the brand. It’s clear that Maison Louis Marie puts a lot of thought into every aspect of their products, from the ingredients to the design.   This is a must have for anyone who appreciates a sophisticated, well-rounded fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of Bois de Balincourt is exactly what I look for in a perfume, a perfect balance of feminine and masculine notes that both my husband and I enjoy. It’s versatile enough to be used as a base scent or worn on it’s own. The scent has sandalwood and cedarwood, with a bit of spicy cinnamon and nutmeg in the middle and some earthy vetiver and amber in the background. The only downside is that it lasts about three hours on me.  Despite this, I am definitely interested in exploring more products from Maison Louis Marie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best scents out there. Definitely can tell it is made with good ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bois de Balincourt by Maison Louis Marie is an elevated, polished woody and earthy scent. The aromatic fragrance opens with top notes of sandalwood and cedar. The hearty middle contains notes of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon. The warm base contains notes of cedarwood and amber. Like the majority of the Maison Louis Marie fragrance house, this scent is genderless and unisex. Elegant and ethereal, this fragrance wears close to the skin while still having excellent projection and wear time. Bois de Balincourt strikes the perfect balance between clean and musky, as well as fresh and arboreous. The touching personal history behind the brand, as well as the owners’ dedication to sustainability and clean ingredients, encourages me to continue to support the fragrance house and all of their endeavors. I absolutely adore Bois de Balincourt and Maison Louis Marie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a woman who absolutely loves using perfumes and smelling amazing. I have a hard time finding a good oil based perfume. I did some research on this perfume before receiving it. All the amazing information on this product is crazy. If you love environmental friend products/safe products on your skin this is definitely one of those. The packaging it came in was so simple yet the perfect amount of simple. The packaging is recyclable which is perfect. You rarely see brands go above and beyond for their customers and the environment. Now the smell of this perfume is very different then anything I’ve ever smelt coming from sandalwood it smells amazing. It smells so natural and clean. I usually spray it behind my ears, wrist, stomach and, behind my knees. The warmest spots on your body that’s best for perfume to really stick and kinda activate so you smell it all day. The notes you smell the most is definitely sandalwood and cedar wood. If you are into those scents I definitely recommend trying out this perfume.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No.04 Bois de Balincourt is capturing the essence of an a forest. The woody notes provide a sophisticated base, but it's the subtle spicy undertones that really make this fragrance shine, creating a cozy warmth that's perfect for crisp fall days. There's a gentle sweetness to it as well - not overpowering, but reminiscent of the soft, almost fluffy scent of fallen leaves. It's this balance of spice and subtle sweetness that makes it so comforting. I appreciate its adaptability - it works for both office days and weekend outings. For casual wear, I use it alone, but I've found it layers beautifully with a light vanilla scent for evening events, enhancing that cozy sweetness. Its staying power is impressive. It becomes more of a skin scent as the day progresses, but that intimate, spicy-sweet aroma lingers well into the evening. I love  this sophisticated yet approachable scent that embodies the essence of autumn while still being wearable year-round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance was a huge surprise to me. Don’t know what I was expecting but the scent is really amazing. It’s a woody fragrance with amber, vetiver, nutmeg and cinnamon accords. Since I tried it the first time, I can say that I love it. The scent itself brings back childhood memories about my farmer father and the beautiful golden wheat fields. The scent is very similar to the dry wheat, it’s bittersweet and harsh. On my skin last for a few hours, on the clothes forever. The dry down is very pleasant, not overwhelming, just enough loud to be noticeable. Beautiful and simple yet refreshing and relaxing. I have no preference on how to wear it, I like it as it is and I like it layered with other earthy scents. The packaging is simple, white box with a see through bottle in it. It can easily become my new signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie - No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a sophisticated fragrance that opens with top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, creating a warm, woody aroma. The mid notes of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon add a spicy, earthy depth, while the base note of amber wood provides a lasting, rich finish. The bottle design is sleek and minimalist, with clean lines and a modern aesthetic, reflecting the brand's elegant approach. Packaged in a simple yet chic box, it exudes understated luxury. The fragrance has impressive longevity, lasting throughout the day without being overpowering. This scent is perfect for those who appreciate a balanced blend of wood, spice, and warmth, making it an ideal choice for both day and evening wear. Maison Louis Marie has crafted a timeless, versatile fragrance that appeals to both men and women, embodying a refined yet approachable elegance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've experimented with Maison Louis Marie's No. 4 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, which features notes of sandalwood, vetiver, and amberwood. Initially, I had mixed feelings about its musky fragrance; it starts off quite strong but settles into a warm, inviting scent. While it's not my preferred summer fragrance, I find it becomes more appealing when layered with vanilla or Maison Louis Marie's No. 14 Icila, which has notes of jasmine, dark plum, and vanilla flower. The versatility of No. 4, especially for layering, makes it a standout. After wearing it for a few weeks, I've come to appreciate its romantic and sensual qualities, and I anticipate it will become a staple in my fall and winter fragrance collection. Plus, it leaves a lovely amberwood scent in my closet long after I've spritzed it.This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a true fragrance lover and my favorites tell a story. Maison Louis Marie fragrances do a very good job of telling a story, creating a mood. Bois de Balincourt EDP is broody, rich, almost academic. I call it dark academia because it smells like something a bookish, brooding character might wear. Sophisticated and gentle, but the cinnamon and amber create a dark richness at the bottom. Maison Louis Marie fragrances wear quite a while - I could still smell mine 5+ hours into a shift. They’re transparent enough to layer with other things, but not so much that they disappear. I’ve been delighted with my experience, and can’t wait to add more Maison Louis Marie fragrances to my collection. This one will be my second! I was gifted this fragrance by Beautytap in exchange for a review. Thank you very much for the opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No 4 is such a nice, modern fragrance!  The first thing I noticed that I want to point out is that this scent evolves as you wear it.  How it smells when you first spray it on is not how it smells hours later, which is a very neat aspect!  The woodsy scent notes in this fragrance are nicely balanced with hints of citrus.  I enjoy woodsy fragrances from time to time, but this one I enjoy enough that I could wear it daily, it really is that good.  The bottle is gorgeous and I proudly display it on my vanity among my favorite fragrance bottles.  This is a scent that is perfect for anyone young or old.  This fragrance is a vibe all on its own.  It's something for the modern warm spirit.  While this is great for summer, I feel like this is the fragrance I will appreciate even more as we head into fall.

I am a 21 year old fragrance enthusiast, so naturally I was interested in trying this fragrance. I have never used a fragrance from this brand before so I was excited to see what it was about. This fragrance is a very earthy and woody fragrance and slightly musky which would lay nice on just about everyone. The key notes are sandalwood (my favorite scent), vetiver, and amber wood. I love using this perfume layered with other fragrances and/or scented lotions since it's not too overpowering. I also took the time to learn about the brand since I feel like it's not talked about enough. I love that this is a clean brand and the story behind it is amazing. This brand also carries fragrance oils and candles which also interested me. I will definitely be purchasing those next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After 2 weeks of receiving this product I'm ready to give my honest opinion and I absolutely recommend the fragrance to buy it without any doubts.  I'm really happy that this beautiful fragrance has come into my life because it is a clean and fresh perfume, but not one of the classic ones with a soapy or citrus smell. It's special and enjoyable.  This perfume reminds me of a clean, fine and elegant place.  Its woody notes make the difference as they give it mysticism and class.  Every time I use it I feel confident, clean and with an indescribable freshness.  It has a powerful trail, which does not invade but on the contrary makes the people around it enjoy it and constantly praise it.   It's one of the most elegant fragrances I have ever tried.  I'm enjoying this edp so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a subtle and not very strong fragrance. Its notes contain sandalwood, cedarwood, vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon, and amberwood. However, the scent does not remind me of sandalwood, nutmeg, or cinnamon which I was hoping for. As a child growing up in India, I used to love the smell of sandalwood and I can distinctly identify it. The scent has an earthy tone, which is nice but not something I'd prefer to wear personally. I lean towards a sweeter, earthy perfume. The packaging is really simple and nice and the liquid does not irritate my skin which is a really good thing. The only reason I do not give this product five stars is because my taste does not match the fragrance and having used other variants from this brand before I had very high expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No,04 Bois De Balincourt , I love a fragrance that stays with me all day long it has notes of Sandalwood, CedarwoodVetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon,  Amber Wood , I have received so many compliments so far and a lot of people asking me what fragrance I am wearing , this is such a unique scent I fell in love with. This is a fragrance made for every woman I know they would fall in love with this fragrance as well it’s just the perfect notes I love the bottle it’s so exquisite and the packaging too.. I really think this is a very romantic scent , Tip put a dab of Vaseline on your pulse points the fragrance will last so much longer .All fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body:, I love the story behind this Brand , and thank you for making such amazing fragrances ,

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Parfum that I am adding to my collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louie Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a beautiful earthy, woodsy Parfum.  I personally love the woodsy scents. This Parfum has top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, middle notes of vetiver, nutmeg and cinnamon and base note is amber wood. I have been a Licensed Esthetician and Retail expert for 22+ years and have had much education in different scents and Parfum’s. The Maison Louis Marie #4 reminds me of walking along this beautiful creek surrounded by trees while hiking in Boulder Colorado. The light Woodsy scent of the trees and the beauty of nature This Parfum takes me back there to this amazing beauty of nature. The Maison Louis Marie #4 is not a strong overwhelming scent is is light and sensual scent that I found to last fairly well on my skin. Parfums do react differently on everyone because it mixes with our own individual chemistry. I love this Parfum and am definitely going to be adding it to my collection as something I will be wearing often. I highly recommend this Parfum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've recently fallen in love with Maison Louis Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt EDP. Maison Louis Maris has been creating botanical scents since 1792, and it definitely shows in this delicate, enchanting blend! The dominant cedarwood and sandalwood notes are perfectly balanced with a hint of spicy cinnamon and nutmeg, plus an earthy touch of vetiver. Just 1-2 sprays on my wrists and neck LAST ALL DAY, with the warmth of my skin intensifying the scent beautifully throughout the day. I also love that the ingredients are natural and simple, which make me feel good about what I'm wearing. So ladies and gents (I think the smell is quite gender neutral), if you're after a sophisticated yet timeless scent, give this one a try. It's my new GO-TO for both daily wear and special occasions!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As I opened another beautifully designed bottle by Maison Louis Marie’s fragrance collection, I noticed a simple yet stylish glass bottle with an elegant label that defines luxury. As the disperses an even fine mist, the intoxicating amora of rich sandalwood and cedarwood transforms my memories of walking through the mountains on a crisp, cloudy fall day or cozy in a cabin sipping apple cider. With each spritz, it is always a pleasurable application. This fragrance’s framework has a masterful cocktail of deep earth and woody notes with undertones of spicy cinnamon that subtly linger around.   Since it has a hint of rustic charm, it perfectly layers whimsically with the brand’s NO.14-Icila. This captivating mixture gives comfort and sophistication, giving me extra confidence day and night. This fragrance is versatile, as I can wear it all year round, layered and alone, and has incredible staying power. It can adapt well to different seasons, from warmer to cooler months. No matter when I wear it, a pleasant aura is around without being overpowering. Therefore, it is suitable for casual and formal events, a sweet balance between presence and subtlety in different environments as the scent settles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this scent it’s my new perfume I’ll be using for the time being.   From the first spritz, No. 4 EDP captivates with a harmonious balance of warm sandalwood and rich cedar-wood. The initial notes envelop you in a comforting embrace, reminiscent of a cozy fireside on a crisp autumn evening. As the fragrance settles, the earthy vetiver emerges, adding depth and complexity. Its smoky undertones intertwine with the woody base.   The longevity of the perfume is impressive, lingering delicately on the skin throughout the day without overpowering.   The bottle itself is a work of art, with minimalist design reflecting the understated elegance of the fragrance within.   I recommend the Maison Louise Marie No.4 perfume to those who love earthy scents.   this review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum by Maison Louis Marie, and I must say, it's a captivating scent experience. As someone drawn to earthy and woody fragrances, this perfume delivers beautifully with its warm blend of sandalwood, vetiver, and amber wood.  The scent opens with a rich, deep aroma of sandalwood that immediately evokes a sense of grounding and sophistication. As it settles, the vetiver adds a slightly smoky undertone, complemented by the amber wood which brings a subtle sweetness without being overly sugary.  One of the standout qualities of this fragrance is its longevity and sillage. A little goes a long way, and the scent lingers for hours after application. It's perfect for cooler weather or evening wear when you want a scent that leaves a lasting impression.  However, it's worth noting that the fragrance is on the stronger side. While this can be a positive for those who enjoy robust scents, it may be overpowering for some in more confined spaces or for those sensitive to strong perfumes. I found that it works best when layered with lighter, fruity, or sweet scents to balance out its intensity and create a more nuanced aroma profile.  Overall, Maison Louis Marie's No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a commendable addition to any fragrance collection, especially for those who appreciate warm, woody fragrances with depth and character. It's sophisticated, long-lasting, and with a touch of creativity in layering, it can be adapted to suit various occasions and preferences. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 30-year-old newly obsessed with finding my scent I was so excited to try this gorgeous perfume out. I've personally owned this scent but as a candle and was completely obsessed. This scent is truly universal for AA O male and female. I love this perfume because it just brings a nostalgic filling to my heart every time I smell it. I was very impressed with the way it lasted throughout the day and getting very many compliments on it. The scent has a powdery smell to it along with the warm tones that remind me of the woods. I love that the scent can be worn throughout any season. I personally can't wait to wear it throughout the fall and winter season just to add some warmth. Truly obsessed with making this perfume my personal scent and wearing it as much as I can. Also, I love the simplicity of the products packaging starting from the box that it comes in to the actual gorgeous glass bottle. It's just beautiful and unique on my counter, and I love looking at it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second Maison Louis Marie perfume I've tried and I can say this one is more unique on its own way. It has that depth earthy and woody smell to it. I only spray once on my neck as it stays longer than spraying it on my wrist. It's sexy, it's warm romantic, subtle and clean smell got me obsessed. You can layer with this perfume as well. I tried it with one of my perfume oil and it came out really good. They smell better as time goes on. It scent stayed meld on my skin all day at the same time it's not overpowering. Very distinct musky, warm floral scent. very beautiful and smells something different on me. I don't know if it's just me but I find it very comforting and captivating scent. It works really well with my body chemistry. The minimalist packaging is so elegant. Very classic and sleek design, beautiful. Highly recommend this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always like unique , exclusive long wasting, clean scents containing sandalwood , and Maison No4 has all of these and more !  I’ve received so many compliments after wearing this sensual fragrance, and I love how it smells on my husband as well .  I am planning to save it for special occasions.  Now I am very excited to try the entire line of Marie Louse No 4 . Specially their aluminum and baking free deodorant.  Thank you Maison Louis Marie , for creating this hypnotizing , clean fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As my husband's name is Wood, I am one of the Woods family and it is a coincidence that I also prefer the woody scent more than rosy or others. This perfume is just a perfect match to me. It has great notes of sandalwood, vetiver, amber wood, and a hint of cinnamon. It is absolutely beautiful standing by itself. It can also be layered well with a citrus or a floral fragrance.  It already becomes my daily fragrance ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a woodsy and warm fragrance lover i was so excited to add the fragrance N°4 from Maison Louie Marie to my perfume collection. The scent is not new to me since I already had the deodorant and the body cream which smells absolutely amazing and delicious. The N°4 Bois de Balincourt is a captivating and sophisticated scent. It’s a blend of woodsy and spicy notes with a creamy, dry sweetness, featuring vetiver, sandalwood, and amberwood. The scent is unisex and can be layered with other spicy or woodsy scents. I haven’t tried yet but I will definitely play around. The perfume comes in this elegant glass bottle, and the scent lasts for hours and lingers on the skin, making it perfect for those who want a long-lasting, memorable aroma.  It's definitely unique, chic and powerful blend that's truly irresistible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a 31 year old stay at home mom that is obsessed with perfume and I have a very large collection. This is the most pretty scent I own, from the top note to the dry down, It is perfection. I love a fragrance that tells a story, This scent is romantic and warm and feels like a hug when I wear it. I love to use it on its own or sometimes layer it. It’s so versatile and works extremely well with my body chemistry. The packaging is minimalistic and beautiful. I get so many compliments when I wear it. I love that the company is so eco friendly and donates to a great cause! This is a great company and they have so many good fragrances but this one is my favorite. Definitely give this a try if you're looking for a warm, romantic and versatile scent!   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume was something new for me, so I’ll tell you that the first impression really matters, starting with the packaging, what a gorgeous box, the simplicity of the design makes the perfume look more interesting. The scent was also spreading before I opened the box, so it is super potent, the notes of the scent are so natural, the wood smells is the one that predominates the most, I applied the perfume in the morning ready to go for work and when I back home 10 hours later the smell still was in my clothes. I would love to give a five stars review but my preference about scents is a little different, my inclination is more sweet. Nothing wrong with this perfume at all,I’m pretty sure people will keep it as their favorite. I received this product as a gift for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.  What can I say. Nice bottle, smells wonderful and long-lasting. If you like wood fragrances like I do, you will love this! It's not wood like by the fireplace. It's Sandalwood, cedarwood, and amberwood. It's more like OUD only better, more demensional with vetiver,  nutmeg, and cinnamon giving it great projection and silliage. This is perfect for fall and winter. This Maison Louis Marie No. 04-Bois de Balincourt resonates with luxury and elegance. I love the earthy wood scent, It has a great mysterious insense smell that is very well blended. The combination of ingredients is fantastic. I love it. It's rich, clean, and also can be layered with a citrus or a floral fragrance or just wear it alone. It lasts hours on the skin. It's very attractive and versatile. It's not at all offensive, just very well done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been obsessed (all caps) with fine fragrance since my early teens. First started experimenting with my momma's treasured French vials back in the 80's and this passion has only grown since. Spent my summers working at various beauty counters and amassed a pretty impressive collection of indie, designer, niche and prestige scents over the decades.  Bois de Balincourt is a gentle but straightforward woody-spicy scent that's pretty linear and remains true to the initial spray throughout the entire wear-time. It's mostly a sandalwood-cedar-vetiver fragrance on me with the tiniest hint of nutmeg in the background. The cinnamon note doesn't translate with my body chemistry. It is my 3rd bottle of Bois de Balincourt, it's so easy to wear, whenever I can't decide what to spray, I usually reach for N°04.  If you don't enjoy pickle juice in its entirety, you should not experiment with this - the dill gherkin scent associated with sandalwood is strong.   The bottle is clear glass and has an ultra fine mister - the finest of all Maison Louis Marie bottles I own.   Truly unisex experience, easy to wear for any and all occasions. No crazy projection, sits close to skin however sillage is outstanding - some 10 hours later I still find myself enjoying it, even after getting out of the pool and taking a shower.  Highly recommend this scent for those who wanna smell clean, sharp, put together, professional - whatever the time of day and occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great perfume that smells very clean, yet woodsy & a bit sweet. This is a great everyday fragrance that can be worn during any season. It is relatively long lasting & I find myself having to reapply mid-day. It is like a natural skin scent, but better. I love the simplistic packaging, glass bottle design. I look forward to wearing this fragrance all year round during the day time. It is also a great fragrance that can be layered with lots of other scents. I like to layer it with vanilla based fragrances to give it a bit of sweetness/gourmand scent. Layering also makes the fragrance a bit more long lasting. I look forward to trying other perfumes & home fragrance from the brand. I have bought the candle in No 4 before & absolutely loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a male who appreciates sophisticated and unique fragrances, No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum by Maison Louis Marie has truly impressed me. This scent is a masterful blend of sandalwood, cedarwood, and a hint of spicy cinnamon and nutmeg, creating a warm and inviting aroma that is both earthy and refined.  The fragrance opens with a fresh, green note that quickly evolves into a rich, woody heart. The sandalwood and cedarwood are perfectly balanced, providing a smooth and comforting base. The subtle spice from the cinnamon and nutmeg adds an intriguing complexity that keeps the scent interesting throughout the day.  What I love most about this perfume is its versatility. It’s perfect for any occasion, whether I’m heading to a business meeting or enjoying a casual evening out. The longevity is impressive, and I often receive compliments on how great I smell, even hours after application.  Overall, No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a standout fragrance that exudes elegance and sophistication. It’s a must-have for anyone who appreciates high-quality, well-crafted scents. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a very unique, enchanting, warm, spicy, unisex fragrance! This was my first time trying this perfume! I honestly wasn’t sure what to think. This perfume had such a unique intriguing fragrance that instantly reminded me of walking through a fresh enchanting magical forest with lots of trees. Although it smelled great, it just isn’t the typical perfume I go for as a personal preference because I like more feminine, soft floral, and elegant perfumes. The Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum has a more woody & earthy scent with main notes of Sandalwood, Vetiver, Amber Wood with tiny hints of cinnamon/nutmeg. It still smelled really fresh, woodsy, enchanting definitely very earthy vibes with tiny notes of smokiness/musk. I appreciated the beautiful presentation of this perfume with it coming in a beautiful, sleek, sophisticated packaging and came in a beautiful bottle! I especially love this fragrance was actually inspired truly by nature!  I felt good using this perfume because it is a clean nontoxic beauty brand made without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, and also cruelty-free. The Maison Louis Marie brand makes meaningful environmental commitments, uses sustainable ingredients and sourcing. I heard a few reviewers say that this fragrance doesn’t last very long or have good staying power but I think some people forget that with nontoxic healthier clean perfumes that don’t harm your physical health/endocrine system with powerful chemicals and additives, it naturally may not last as long as traditional perfumes that have a-lot of different additives/chemicals that help with the lasting power. I personally thought the Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum lasted along time and I didn’t mind spraying more if needed. Overall, this is a great super fresh unisex fragrance that is great for you if you love very warm woodsy, earthy perfumes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The No. 4 Bois de Balincourt is a lovely fragrance reminiscent of the woodsy outdoors. First of all, I love the story behind this perfume and that it was developed with Maison Louis Marie’s childhood in mind growing up in her family home in the forest. The top notes are sandalwood and cedar wood, which is prominent when you initially spray it, but once it dries down on the skin, the scent isn’t as overwhelming and feels balanced. Other notes are vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon, and amber wood which adds a spicy and cozy element. The notes combined together smell earthy, woody, and slightly herbal. At first, I thought I wouldn’t like this scent profile but it has grown on me. I find that the fragrance also lasts throughout the day which is impressive with just 1-2 sprays. The packaging is simplistic but very sleek and elegant. I recommend this perfume only if you like nature, woodsy scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am someone who has reviewed over 750 beauty products on social media and owns over 100 fragrances. My collection consists of affordable $20-$30 scents and my most expensive scent is over $300. I love trying new scents and enjoy smelling good. This Bois de Balincourt scent has beautiful notes of sandalwood, vetiver, amber wood. It is a woody scent. I got this to last over 8 hours on me. I sprayed it on and it lasted all evening, I went to sleep and woke up, and I could still smell it. It has a BEAUTIFUL soft woody scent. It is amazing for layering. This smells so unique for me and will help you stand out. It is not a in your face kind of fragrance yet it lasts so well. I really love this fragrance. It is a great unisex fragrance that can be shared with your partner. My husband and I have been bonding over fragrances. Expensive hobby but we are left smelling and feeling great. This is amazing all year round. I love wearing it early mornings and will be a go to during the fall for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing! It features top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, complemented by earthy vetiver, spicy nutmeg, and a hint of cinnamon. I had recently wore this to one of my occasions, everybody praised about it. Apply it to your pulse points for maximum effect. This sophisticated and well-balanced scent is appreciated for its longevity and versatility, making it suitable for both day and night wear. I absolutely love this brand and it is great that they stand with their sustainable packaging, environmental friendly ingredients. I love the fact that it is cruelty free and vegan and I love the simple and sophisticated packaging. One more great thing is this fragrance is gender less and both me and husband loves wearing it. I highly recommend this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is perfect for winter! It lasts all day long, so you only need to apply it once in the morning. The scent is like a cozy hug, with notes of sandalwood, cedarwood, and a hint of spice that feel like a warm embrace. It's perfect for colder months when you want to feel snug and comforted.  But, if you're like me and prefer lighter scents for summer, this might not be your go-to. I find that warm, woody scents can feel overwhelming in the heat, and this one is no exception. However, as soon as the weather cools down, I will reach for this perfume.   Overall, if you love woody scents and want a perfume that will keep you cozy all winter long, this is a great choice. Just be aware that it might be too intense for summer wear.

reviews.review_title: A scent that feels like a story unfolding ￼
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a scent that feels like a story unfolding with every breath. It strikes a perfect balance between plot twists and fantasy, suspense and serenity, grounding you to the forest floor.  As a beauty enthusiast and industry professional, I can attest that this scent embodies the essence of the wild woman archetype meeting modern-day refined sophistication. It’s like walking through a mysterious forest, where every turn reveals a new secret, a new layer of intrigue.  The fragrance opens with a fresh, invigorating burst of sandalwood and cedarwood, much like the beginning of a thrilling journey that captivates you from the first moment. As it settles, the earthy and woody notes evoke the feeling of being deep in an enchanted forest, grounding and comforting. It’s a journey through nature’s wonders, where fantasy meets reality, and the wild meets the refined.  Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is more than a scent; it’s an experience, a narrative, a journey. It’s perfect for those who love to lose themselves in a great fragrance, finding solace and adventure in both. If you’re ready to embark on a sensory adventure that intertwines with your wildest dreams, this perfume is your perfect companion.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
