reviews.review_text: A trip into the woods, with an earth tone of bare feet on the ground. In touch with nature at its core. This is what I feel when I first put on this signsture fragrance of Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. Sandlewood and cedarwood definetly have a strong tone when you first spritz the perfume on. The spicy cinnamon nutmeg mixture I get once the notes die down. The amazing part is I do not smell it on myself after a fee hours, but others do. Which means it perfectly works with my body chemistry. I am personally a flower girl bullet me tell you, once you put the No.14 on top of No.4 you have another thing coming your way. It's truly undescribable, as it's nature vs nurture, femininity vs masculinity. It's something I am very looking forward to wearing during the summer and then alone during the winter, when it comes to No.4. I love the companies outlook on creating products that are clean and luxurious. Their packaging is simple but very elegant. I love the glass bottle and amazing box packaging with just the right amount of information that everyone should read. I received a complimentary sample of  Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt Eau De Parfum in exchange for my honest use and review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has been in the beauty world for 10 years I’ve gotten the opportunity to try a variety of different products. One of my favorites is fragrances. They can truly help you feel confident, beautiful and bring you joy. I typically tend to lean to more floral fragrances but I still do enjoy a good earthy scent as well. Maison Louis Marie does fragrances exceptionally well and I was so excited to try this one, however for me it was much too earthy. The sandalwood is definitely one of the strong notes that is present in this fragrance. For me it was too overpowering and too earthy for what I normally go for. However if you are someone that typically enjoys earthy/woodsy scents and/or sandalwood I can see this being the perfect fragrance for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the privilege of being in the beauty industry for 30+ years and the opportunity to experience hundreds of cosmetic products. Maison Louis Marie is the result of a long storied family history with scent, beginning with Louis Marie Aubert du Petit Thouars: A pioneer in French botanical history. Taking her Grandfathers sensorial lead and legacy Marie du Petit Thouars has created a climate neutral certified non toxic beauty brand with a timeless whilst contemporary aesthetic. Upon first application, an edible citrus punch. As the fragrance settles it welcomes me into an enchanted grove bursting with lush, ripe figs. An inviting flair of fresh and fruity with a milky sophisticated smokiness transporting to a sun-drenched Mediterranean garden. Top Notes: Sandalwood adds depth and a luxurious, velvety smoothness, perfectly complementing the fig's sweetness. The vetiver brings an earthy, grounding character to the perfume balancing the sweet and creamy notes and slightly woodsy aroma. Amber Wood imparts a warm, resinous depth, adding a sensual, slightly sweet warmth that lingers on the skin, creating a long-lasting and captivating trail. Overall Impression: 10/10 with an anomalous adventure. A gender neutral woody oriental scent that feels both fresh and grounded, making it perfect for those who appreciate a balance of fruity sweetness and arboraceous warmth. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: A woodsy scent with lots of layering potential
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first got to experience Maison Louis Marie when I tried their No. 14 Icila. I must say that I love this brand! I love everything they stand for when it comes to all the incredible work they do for the environment. They are a part of so many incredible programs that directly benefit our planet that it so very desperately needs. They are climate-neutral certified, and they give 1% back to the planet on every sale they make as well as plant 1000s of trees through the National Forrest Foundation. They have simple packaging that is adorable (the seed on the side is an actual family drawn picture from the 1800s). The No. 4 Bois de Balincourt is one of Maison's big scents. It is a unisex scent, I've never seen my husband share an EDP with me until yesterday, so men I think this is also definitely a scent you will enjoy both for you or on your SO! It's a very earthy and woody scent that is so many things like sophisticated, sensual, invigorating, and fresh. One of my favorite things about wearing this perfume is layering it. I especially love combining it with the No. 14. It's The perfect mix of fruity/floral and earthy. The top notes for Bois de Balincourt are cedarwood and sandalwood, with a base of Amberwood and mid notes of cinnamon, nutmeg, and Vetiver. I must say I've never actually worn a Vetiver scent until now, and the Vetiver is a strong element in the mid-notes. It's a very woodsy, creamy and warm perfume. I have also learned it layers well with water-scented perfumes, it mixes well with most scents I've tried so it's a very universal layering tool.  I think if you like the woody/earthy vibe this is a perfume for you I also believe once you get a whiff of this amazing company scents, and look more into the brand, you will grow to love how they cherish the true art of perfumery and just how much they respect our natural world.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The MAISON LOUIS MARIENo.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum smells literally out of this world. I love the subtle smell of it, it is not over powering and since wearing it the past week i have recieved so many compliments about it. There is something that gives you so much confidence when someone says wow you smell good. This product is it. It is not fruity or anything, it has a very sophisticated smell that will leaving you showing confidence in yourself. Also the bottle is very very cute which i love alot.  It also comes out very good which i love. For the price point it is worth every single cent. I think it would be hard to find something that is this wonderful in the same price point. If you are looking for something earthy and woody this is it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I love the packaging of this perfume in this gorgeous white box. The packaging adds to the perfume bottle as the shape reminds me of a feminine old school design. The scent itself is very light and exciting. There is a sweet floral nose upfront with an earthy spicy tone towards the end. I use a couple sprits of this perfume and it lasts all day. For reference I have an office job so I am not doing a lot of manual labor.  I think with the packaging, this perfume would be a great gift to give since it already comes in a lovely white box. I have got two compliments on this perfume since I started wearing it.  I think others must enjoy the scent as well.  The size of the bottle is a pretty decent size yet small enough you could throw it in your purse just in case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie has crafted an olfactory masterpiece with their No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, a captivating scent that evokes the allure of a Parisian night. Upon first spray, the fragrance opens with a tantalizing blend of bergamot and black pepper. The citrusy freshness is balanced by the spicy warmth of the pepper, creating a vibrant and invigorating introduction. The base notes of this fragrance are where the magic truly unfolds. Sandalwood and amber create a warm and sensual foundation. The creamy smoothness of the sandalwood perfectly complements the resinous sweetness of the amber, leaving a lingering trail of allure. Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt boasts excellent longevity, lasting for a full 8-10 hours on the skin. The projection is moderate, creating an intimate scent bubble that gently envelops the wearer. This fragrance is perfect for special occasions and evenings out. It exudes a sophisticated and alluring aura that is sure to captivate attention. Whether you're attending a formal event or simply enjoying a romantic dinner, Bois de Balincourt will leave a lasting impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is worth every buck! I have not been able to put this down since the day I have received it. Each time I wear this to office or any event I receive so many compliments on it. This perfume doesn’t go unnoticed. The scent makes the vibe so elegant and sophisticated that not only others love the feel of it but also personally I feel more confident and more attractive when I wear this. I truly believe that odour makes your personality either stand out in a good way or a bad way and hence I am a strong believer of owning good scented oils and perfumes. This one has been now added as a staple in my closet collection. I am turning into Maison Louis Marie fan. I own no 4 and no 14 and plan to buy some more scents of theirs. Definitely a must have in closet for the people who don’t want to go unnoticed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying any fragrances from Maison Louis Marie and to say I’m impressed is an understatement! I absolutely love the initial scent of this perfume as it comes off earthy, woody, a little musky, with a hint of cinnamon. after wearing it all day, the scent transforms into something totally different on my skin! The cinnamon and earthy notes shine through more, and has a very strong lasting power to wear all day! This is definitely what I’m going to be teaching for the most in my perfume collection, it’s absolutely perfection!   *This review was collected as part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely enamored with Maison Louis Marie's No. 04 fragrance! The crystal clear bottle is elegant and sophisticated, showcasing the brand's exceptional packaging design. The scent itself is a spicy, woody blend with a loud projection that lasts for hours, making it perfect for those who want to make a statement. While it may be too potent for crowded spaces, it's ideal for outdoor or open areas where its strength can be fully appreciated. I believe both men and women will appreciate this long-lasting fragrance, which is sure to garner attention and admiration. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: have found my new favorite perfume! No. 4 Bois de Balincourt by Maison Louis Marie is such a beautiful scent. It has very similar scent notes to Le Labo Santal 33 and R’ddle Santal. This fragrance offers top notes of Sandalwood and Cedarwood, Mid notes of Vetiver, Nutmeg, and Cinnamon, and Base note of Amber Wood. The price point is much more affordable than its similarly scented fragrances at under $100 for a 50ml bottle. I have not had the opportunity to experience the other scents offered by MLM, but I fully intend to purchase the discovery set they offer so I can try layering with other scents. No. 4 is a wonderful stand alone scent, but can easily layer with your other favorite scents. No. 4 will be a staple in my regular fragrance rotation - it’s perfect for every day but also can transition to date night seamlessly. I can’t stop smelling it!   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a long time fan of Maison Louis Marie parfumes and this one is no exception! This parfum smells so delightful. It is woodsy and fresh all at the same time. Think Santal 33, but much less intense. It isn’t as overpowering as Santal 33. I am prone to headaches from scents and I haven’t had one since using this. I immediately knew this was going to be a love of mine! This definitely could be unisex and worn all year long! This is a safe blind buy in my opinion. If you love Santal, but don’t love the price tag or the overpowering scent of it…you will absolutely love this! I will be wearing this non stop for the next forever! Also, this is a clean fragrance which makes this 1000x better! You will love it! Be prepared for this to last all day and to receive lots of compliments on it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a perfume enthusiast and I am always seeking out new perfume brands and scents to try. Upon spraying the no.4 perfume I immediately fell in love. This is the first “earthy” perfume scent I have tried and I must say that it has exceeded my expectations. The scent reminds me of a crisp morning walk in the middle of Autumn. It is not sweet smelling nor overpowering yet it is still nice and strong. I am a now a new fan of woody scents due to trying this scent. I feel it could be perfect for anyone to use since it is kind of a neutral/meet in the middle scent. The other thing that I adore is that this company uses clean and environmentally friendly ingredients. This includes being BHT and cruelty free. I layered this with a couple of different perfumes and honestly, the options are endless with this since it pairs really well with most perfumes. I definitely recommend this scent for anyone looking to add a unique scent that can be layered to their perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Maison Louis Marie #04 is such a unique scent. It has an evolving scent that leaves you wanting to keep sniffing to identify each and every note and as time goes by you notice another note shining through. The initial spritz put a a very warm woody vibe out with the cedar wood and sandalwood but then the sweetness of the nutmeg and cinnamon settle stimulate your senses. Blended all together so perfectly with the subtle hint of amber wood, this is why I say it is a unique scent. The bottle is a simple but classy design and easily sprays a nice even fine mist. The projection is great on this perfume as well. If you like an earthy woodsy scent with a side of sweetness you will love the #04. This brand keeps impressing me with every perfume I’ve had the pleasure to experience of theirs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am thoroughly impressed by Bois de Balincourt. The quality of the ingredients is evident, and the scent itself is beautifully balanced and unique. I would highly recommend it to anyone who appreciates woody fragrances with a touch of spice, I believe the quality justifies the cost, making it a worthwhile investment for fragrance enthusiasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my new favorite perfumes, it's so lovely and beautiful. The classy crystal bottle is elegant. I also love it because it's unisex, a very warm sexy scent for male and female. Top note is Sandalwood and Cedarwood; Mid note: Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon; Base note: Amber Wood. I have got lots of compliments when wearing it. It lasts very long on me, I don't need to reapply it. Before, I didn't feel impressed with warm scent and couldn't use any in my area where is very humid and hot. But this scent brings me a different view, it's suitable not only in the summer but also the fall/winter. I really highly recommend this beautiful fragrance for people who want something different but very special. Plus, there are perfume oil and eau de perfume version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Oh, let me tell you about my latest obsession: Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum.  Every spritz of this perfume takes you on a woodsy adventure, but with a spice that gives it a little extra something-something. It's like the forest got a chic, sophisticated upgrade! Now, if you're a fan of Le Labo scents like me, you're in for a treat. This perfume gives off serious Le Labo vibes but with its own unique twist. The spicy cinnamon and nutmeg  add a warm, inviting layer that's just perfect for cozying up on a crisp autumn day. And let's not forget the earthy vetiver note that grounds the fragrance, making it feel both timeless and fresh. It's like wearing a comforting, yet utterly luxurious blanket. No.04 Bois de Balincourt is a scent that effortlessly blends tradition with modern elegance. Trust me, one whiff and you'll be hooked, just like I am. This is not just a fragrance; it's an experience, a mood, a statement. So go ahead, indulge yourself—you won't regret it!

As a beauty and fragrance enthusiast, I was excited to try this new perfume. At its base, the fragrance is infused with amber wood. Mid notes range from vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon. Top notes include sandalwood and cedar wood. Upon receiving the package, which is beautifully boxed, I was eager to open it and try it out. Upon spritzing, I immediately felt that it was a very feminine fragrance. I assumed it would be more woodsy from the scent range, but it smells very light and soft. I have gotten many compliments since wearing this fragrance. One downside is that the scent does not last very long. I’ve found myself spraying throughout the day to freshen the scent up. All in all, I absolutely love this fragrance, though. When I wear it, I feel fresh and pretty. Definitely worth the purchase if you were curious about it! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed cosmetologist, working in the world of all things beauty for 28 years, I have been surrounded by fragrance most of my life!  Whether it’s a parfum, a hair product skincare brand or home fragrance, I do perfer to surround myself with fragrance, as they evoke a mood, based of a memory the scent reminds us of.  The MAISON LOUIS MARIENo.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum is a beautiful unisex fragrance that is woody, but not spicy.  It’s just enough to draw you in and want to figure out the woody notes and that little extra hint of cinnamon and nutmeg.  And no, you will not smell like a pumpkin pie!  Think more cinnamon and nutmeg, freshly harvested, not baked into something.  I love the top notes of cedarwood and sandalwood!  The evoke memories of my childhood in Missouri, near the wood mills where almost everything was made from cedar!  Very fun times!!!  I will definitely enjoy wearing this scent!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an iconic scent! It’s earthy, sensual, sophisticated and comforting. The packaging is so minimal yet beautiful. This is great for layering too although I prefer the scent on its own. I absolutely love this brand and all that they stand for with their sustainable packaging, environmental friendly ingredients. This fragrance is gender-less and both my fiancé and I wear this! I highly recommend this fragrance along with the entire French brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie  No-4 Bois de Balincourt.  I love this unique and woody  fragrance as beauty enthusiast I always love to trying new scents.  Maison Louis Marie one of the best with the perfect notes , sandalwood, cedarwood on top it’s so earthy and natural. Cinnamon , nutmeg and vetiver on mid make this delicious ,spicy, mysterious and addictive remember me to Christmas season. Amber wood on base making this so cozy ,warmly and elegant. This fragrance has beautiful scents ,notes all together make the right one for everyday wear for everyone. I’m big fan of Maison Louis Marie has beautiful elegant and unique fragrances unforgettable and luxurious scents definitely my favorites ones. This perfume has people coming out to me complimenting me they loved too. The packaging is so cute  I love clear bottles on perfumes.  This fragrance get five stars from me  it’s really amazing.   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent inspired by Balincour is enchanting, capturing the essence of the ancient forest and the romantic trail of Lover's Lane. The combination of sandalwood, cedarwood, vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon, and amber wood must create a truly magical and memorable fragrance.I love this scent as my signature scent for myself and for my husband-it works great as a unisex fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balicourt is truly unique. The fragrance is made of natural ingredients that stay true to its essence. Upon the first sniff, I noticed a warm, woodsy, and earthy aroma. It's a scent that stands on its own and doesn't need to be layered, although it can be. No. 04 is a scent that evokes a specific memory for me—happy memories of camping in the warm summer, connecting with nature. It takes me back to a time of tranquility, soaking up the sun, swimming in the lake, and appreciating the world's true beauty, away from the chaos of everyday life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume. The sandalwood is amazing! I thought I really didn't like woodsy scents but since I got this I love it! I got this on promotion for a review. I layer mine woth the spray and the oils. I love that this scent lasts longer than 18 months, it lasts a crazy 35 months and that awesome. I love the price and very affordable for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Maison Marie Louis and No.4 Fragrance here is why . Every Fragrance I have tried by this brand is simply unique . Their fragrances always take me back to some point in my life and this fragrance wasn’t any exception for me growing up in Maine this took me back to the countless days I used to go on hikes or play in the many woods that Maine has to offer as a girl , teenager and woman . Also the sandalwood and cedar wood really stick out in this fragrance. With the cinnamon and nutmeg giving me memories of a couple things that I love to make , those two things being French toast and pumpkin pie blended with the woody scents this is such a great fragrance. This is genderless and has a great staying power . I have had people ask me what I am wearing and tell me I smell good . This can be worn in different seasons and on many different occasions. It’s not overpowering or to light . The sprayer sprays just the right amount and the bottle it’s self is simple but yet sleek .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is simply amazing! It’s hard to describe but it smells so fresh and crisp with hints of floral notes. It smells like standing in a meadow of fresh flowers that just bloomed in the early spring. It is not too overpowering or overwhelming at all. It’s the perfect amount of scent to make people notice when standing next to you, but not overpowering them. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No.4 Bois de Balincourt is beautiful warm woody scent that you want to smell again and again. In my view, the stars of the show are the sandalwood and amber wood, which help the scent to create an image of a trail in the middle of an ancient mystical forest in summer-fall weather. It’s definitely unisex and beautiful seductive woody scent I must say. It’s warm, without the spiciness, with a hint of nutmeg sweetness. The longevity is quite good for this EDP version (stays strong for 2-3 hours then stays as skin scent throughout the day on me). I’m totally in love with this scent. It can be a comforting and lovely scent on its own. Or, it can be a great layering scent that adding a great earthy depth to its combination. I think It works great to layer with any fresh or fruity scent. Personally, I love to pair it with No.14 Icila. This combination is my new favorite daily scent: A warm, fresh woody scent with a hint of sweetness. If you like woody/earthy scent, I definitely recommend this scent for sure.

reviews.review_title: One perfume that must to have
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love perfume and each time i love to try new smells. I love Maison louis Marie brand as they have so amazing collection. I already had tried there few perfume and this time i got Maison Louis Marie No.04 perfume and oh my god it smells so amazing. It has a top note of sandalwood and cedarwood ( i love sandalwood smell) . It’s an amazing perfume with mixture of warm, woody notes with little sweetness that makes this smell to run for whole year. Its perfect for everyday use. The best part is its genderless so can be used my men and women at same time. When you spray it initially it feels little strong but it settles down in few min and give you refreshening smell whole day. For me it last long enough and can be easy mixed with any other smell on top of it . If you are thinking to try this brand and you love the smell of sandalwood  , amberwood must try it’s NO.04

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 24-year-old working a corporate 9-to-5 job in finance, I’m always on the lookout for sophisticated, versatile fragrances, and Maison Louis Marie EDP No.4 Bois de Balincourt has truly impressed me. The fragrance opens with refreshing sandalwood and cedarwood, creating a warm, inviting aura. Heart notes of vetiver and spicy cinnamon add depth, while base notes of amber wood and musk leave a lasting, elegant impression. Its longevity is impressive, lasting through long workdays into the evening without needing a touch-up. This woody, earthy scent is perfect for professionals with refined taste. It’s neither overpowering nor too subtle, ideal for a corporate environment. The high-quality ingredients didn't cause any irritation on my sensitive skin. Apply to pulse points for maximum effect. Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt has become a staple in my collection—sophisticated and versatile, it’s worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good fragrance, and this one  is truly gorgeous! I was super excited to try this out, since I'd heard good things about the brand, and how amazing their fragrances are.  Upon arrival, I ripped open the box to see a simple, but lovely white box, with a clear glass fragrance.  the fragrance itself is crystal clear too! I love this, since so many products have artificial everything.  Let me get to that moment..the first spritz!  It gave me the feeling of being wrapped in soft cashmere. Very slight hint of spice and woods, yet cool and powdery at the same time. It isn't too sweet, perfect for any gender, and gives a feeling of comfort! It's very light as air, but seems to stay with me throughout the day.  As an Esthetician, I feel I can wear it around clients as well, it's that light and totally inoffensive!  I use a light lavender oil under it, and it works great to enhance that comfortable feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried Maison Louis Marie’s previous release to and I really like that one too. But this one OMG! The top note of sandalwood. I immediately fell in love with it. It’s a beautiful fragrance it’s Warm and woody. I see myself wearing this thru out the year. As I applied on my wrist when it arrived I couldn’t stop myself sniffing it. It smells like Fall Tbh that cinnamon and nutmeg takes me back to Autumn season. It’s just heavenly also it’s genderless so anyone can wear it. Clean ingredients is another plus. And longevity one you spray it you can smell it all day long. My husband also loved it. The price point is also great for and not forget clean ingredients which is a huge plus for me when I’m purchasing anything nowadays. If you have to get one fragrance from this brand I would suggest this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a good earthy/woody musk scent this scent is perfect for you I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this because I had such a good experience with Icila no 14, but this is underwhelming by comparison. The last power and projection are very weak. I was also expecting the scent to have more of a spice, but there is no spice at all that I can detect. On its own it’s very subtle, which is good for people who are sensitive to smell, but I want my fragrance to be noticeable! The good thing about this is it layers soooo well with Icila 14, so that’s how I will plan on wearing it. The fragrance on its own is very gender less, fyi. I received this perfume for free for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been in the beauty industry for over 25 years in the corporate, professional, and retail side and I am always looking for new products to try.  I recently tried Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, and the scent is wonderfully complex, blending warm, woody notes with a subtle hint of sweetness that feels both sophisticated and comforting. It’s perfect for everyday wear.  What I appreciate most about this perfume is its staying power. A few sprays in the morning last me throughout the day, and I receive compliments even after hours of wear. The packaging is elegant and minimalist, which adds to the overall luxurious experience.  I also love the secondary packaging of Maison Louis Marie - it includes the notes and so you can easily reference it or decide if the scent is for you.  I highly recommend to anyone looking for a unique and lasting scent.  I recently tried Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum, and the scent is wonderfully complex, blending warm, woody notes with a subtle hint of sweetness that feels both sophisticated and comforting. It’s perfect for everyday wear.  What I appreciate most about this perfume is its staying power. A few sprays in the morning last me throughout the day, and I receive compliments even after hours of wear. The packaging is elegant and minimalist, which adds to the overall luxurious experience.  I also love the secondary packaging of Maison Louis Marie - it includes the notes and so you can easily reference it or decide if the scent is for you.  I highly recommend to anyone looking for a unique and lasting scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a 9 year verified beauty expert, I found this brand, Maison Louis Marie to be unassuming, by way of their packaging, but it delivers a high quality, lasting perfume that comes with a family history from the Grasse region in France. This is a brand with a history of unparallel experience with perfume and a husband and wife team that are full of passion for their business. The Bois de Balincourt parfum has musky top notes of sandal and cedarwood. The mid notes of cinnamon, nutmeg and vetiver and base notes of amber wood. It is genderless and great for the day or evening with woody, musky notes that stay. I love the scent that lingers and is great for any occasion and anyone. It also fantastic, it takes on a different scent, depending on who is wearing the perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved skin care and fragrance since I was young. It only made sense that I became an aesthetician. My passion for skin care overflowed into make up as well as supplemental. I currently work for a naturopath doctor and we help people heal from the inside out. I perform numerous treatments to help slow the aging process. I couldn't love what I do any more and only wish to help more people through my knowledge and training of skin and makeup practices as well as my education on nutritional supplements. I am 36 with three kids and the signs of aging are creeping up faster than I would like! I love to try things to combat that while staying out of a doctors office. This perfume is so elegant. I can smell the warm sandalwood and amber right off the bat. It reminds me of fine dining next to a fireplace in the comfort of familiar guests. I love pairing it with a vanilla or sweet floral to level it up to a more feminine note. However, it isn’t not feminine on its own. I can see this being worn when autumn is beginning and leaves are changing color. It is such a comforting smell and one I really enjoy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louise Marie - Eau de Parfum No.04 Bois de Balincourt  Where to start with this beautiful, dreamy, romantic scent?? This is for anyone who loves woody, deep yet fresh fragrances. This is a beautiful cottage dream, in the heart of the forest after a long thunderstorm. Is the warm of the fire when the night is cold and the wind hugs your face with a beautiful, calming whisper.  This fragrance is a that and more, you get to experience your own special little tale. The richness comes in waves of cardamom and nutmeg and a beautiful amber wood notes. The packaging is gorgeous yet simple and easy to grab for those on the go. Making this a thoughtful and beautiful gift for anyone who loves luxurious scents. Also, It is vegan and cruelty free.

reviews.review_title: Fresh slightly sweet keeper of a fragrance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like clean smelling scents that aren’t “soapy” and have a hint of sweet, TRY THIS!! I will say this may not be for everyone as it does have a sharp smell that may cause headaches for some. YET for ME as a beauty enthusiast who doesn’t stick to rules of perfumes being for “certain seasons” and loves a variety of scents this one will be in rotation all year long as it’s a nice clean scent on my skin. I find this projects very well on my skin and clothes. I did apply it to well moisturized skin after applying unscented body lotion and body oil which will help with longevity as scent clings better to moisturized skin. For me I find this fragrance mixed with my body chemistry does make it smell slightly sweet which I enjoy. This perfume is definitely for someone who wants to feel comfy and cozy in my opinion. Imagine being wrapped in a nice warm freshly washed blanket watching your comfort show; or maybe lounging in your sundress having a picnic in the park. That’s the images and vibes it gives to me. The only reason I rated this product a 4/5 is due to the fact I think for such a beautiful fragrance the bottle is a little cheap feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 42-year-old female who is relatively new to the fragrance world, so I am still finding my favorite scents. Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum has quickly earned a front spot on my perfume shelf. The beautiful bottle is simple yet aesthetic, which is always a plus for someone like me who appreciates minimalism. It's a light, but sophisticated fragrance that wears well throughout the day, leaving a lingering scent that you catch on and off, which I love. The scent changes slightly as you wear it, and softens over time. The Maison Louis Marie brand has introduced me to the art of learning about different notes in perfumes and how they wear together, and it has quickly become a favorite hobby of mine. This has been my favorite scent so far from Maison Louise Marie and I can’t wait to collect all of their beautiful products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast, I was delighted to have the opportunity to try Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum This delicate and elegant fragrance captures the essence of an escape in the saddle jar. This Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum smells so warm and earthy! This romantic scent is a Sandalwood scent with a dominant cedar and Sandalwood note complemented by a spicy Nutmeg Cinnamon complex with an earthy vetiver note. Top notes are: Sandalwood, Cedarwood! Middle notes: Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon and last but not least base notes: Amber wood! Formulated without: Parabens, Sulfates & Phthalates! They are vegan and cruelty-free, caring about your body and the environment. I find this scent more like a Fall/Winter scent!  This scent is perfect for waking me up in the morning and lingers for a long time. You only need to spray a few times. No. 4 is great for pairing with fruity or floral scents, or can be worn alone as a signature scent. Maison Louis Marie is all about quality and luxury. From the simple and elegant glass bottle and container, to the high-quality mist nozzle, this perfume is a must if you're looking for a warm and elegant scent.  I have received so many compliments! Not strong at all but it lasts a long time. I usually spray it three times and that's enough to get me through the day. Finally, I cannot forget to mention that Maison Louis Marie is a clean perfume - free of harmful chemicals and parabens! *This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first impression of smelling the fragrance was walking through a forest, i live in a forest estate so I walked after a thunder storm, to get the essence. The air was humid and thick with the scent of wood from the wet trees and grass. So I smelling my arm I got the full experience of Maison Louis Marie’s No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum. After I spritz, and let it settle, I smelled the notes and was transported to a serene woodland where the fragrance of nature consumed me. The top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood introduced at first, creating a warm, woody embrace. As the scent settles, the heart reveals a spicy blend of cinnamon and nutmeg, adding a touch of comfort and complexity. The base notes of vetiver and amber wood provide an earthy, grounding finish that is personsal on the skin, recreating a cozy evening by a fire on a camping trip. What sets this fragrance apart is its ability to be both bold and subtle. It projects a confident presence without overwhelming, making it perfect for any occasion.  The fact is clean and vegan friendly, gives me a sense of security. Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt is more than just a perfume; it’s an olfactory journey that captures the timeless beauty of nature in a bottle. It I s a serene woodland experience that reminds you of the eternal camouflage of  beauty in nature with each application.

reviews.review_title: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum
reviews.review_text: First I would like to say the packaging is simple yet great it has a level of sturdiness which keeps the parfum bottle in place. This being my second time trying this brand Maison Louis Marie I will say that the parfum spray seems to be slightly lighter in scent. I do like the fragrance and will continue to wear it though the first fragrance I tried was No.14 Icila Parfum Oil. With the spray you have the freedom of spraying it anywhere you want versus parfum oil, the order of notes compliment one another. Top notes are sandalwood and cedarwood, mid notes vetiver, nutmeg, cinnamon, and the base note amber wood. No. 04 Bois de Balincourt has earthy and woody components that I enjoy but also love that it's a year-round scent, genderless scent, and a layering scent. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the beautiful glass bottle ! It smells so pretty ! It is my new favorite go to perfume for the summer ! It has a nice scent that leaves me feeling refreshed and pretty ! I can use it on the go and it is not over powering at all ! I’m love the way it leaves me smelling so pretty ! The middle is perfect for having a nice spray ! The way it smells is a nice scent that is gorgeous and can wear out to any event ! It is just the right amount of scent for any one who loves a soft scent ! I love the it can be layered also in with their other scents I won myself ! It looks so luxurious on my vanity and I love the clear bottle for my white vanity it fits there perfectly on the sunny vanity area ! It is a perfect bottle and looks nice and luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Immediately after getting it, I spritzed some and was blown away!The amazing woodyness in it is so incredible that me and my husband are fighting over it.Absolutely amazing unisex fragrance with intensity and longevity. Those who lean towards less feminine fragrances,then this is the right choice. The vetiver ambery smell at the dry down is to die for. A spicy mix of nutmeg and cinnamon gives it quite the distinct smell. I went to bed wearing it and smelled it the next day!

reviews.review_title: I’ve feel in love since discovering Maison Louis !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello I’m a 35 year old beauty enthusiast from Northern Kentucky!This Maison Louis Marie No.4 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum smells so warm and earthy! This romantic scent is a Sandalwood fragrance with a dominant Cedarwood and Sandalwood accord that's supplemented by a spicy Cinnamon Nutmeg complex with an earthy Vetiver note. The Top notes are :Sandalwood, Cedarwood! Mid notes : Vetiver, Nutmeg, Cinnamon and then last but not least the base note: Amber Wood! Formulated without: Parabens, Sulfates & Phthalates! They are Vegan and Cruelty-free, Mindful of your body and the environment. I find this scent more of a Fall/Winter Scent! But honestly it smells so woody and earthy that you could wear it anytime of year! This can also be layered is you prefer! All fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body:How to use: apply 1-2 sprays at the pulse points of your body (wrists, neck), or in the creases of your knees and elbows for a stronger, more enduring scent. Reapply as needed. I have found that this has a long lasting smell too! It lasts on me about 8 hours!

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous scent for everyday and layering!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt is an absolutely delightful fragrance.  I am a huge fan of woodsy scents and this one is luxurious and unforgettable.  It has top notes of sandalwood and cedar wood, mid notes of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon.  Lastly, delicious amber wood serves as a warm base note.  When you first read the box, you may think this fragrance would smell either like incense, or like a Christmas treat.  But, as you spray it onto your skin, you get transported into a world of luxury, enchantment, and sensuality.  The notes are not at all heady and intense.  Instead, it is a bit sweet, energetic, elegant, and woodsy!  This scent is perfect for a pick-me-up in the morning and is long-lasting.  You only need a few spritzes.  No. 4 is terrific for layering with fruity or floral scents, or it can be used individually as a signature scent.  Maison Louis Marie is all about quality and luxury.  From the simplistic and elegant glass bottle and box, to the high-quality fine mister, this fragrance is a must-try if you are looking for a warm and elegant scent. Lastly, I cannot forget to mention that Maison Louis Marie is a clean fragrance - free of toxic chemicals and parabens! *This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast and a licensed master cosmetologist with 34 years plus experience I love trying every product I can. I love the brand Maison Louis Marie and tried several fragrances in this line. No.04 Bois de Balincourt is an Eau de Parfum and is different than anything that I have tried before. First of all the packaging is absolutely elegant and eye catching.  As soon as I sprayed I knew that it was some thing that I am not used to wearing  but I actually loved this scent.  I can describe this as natural,  earthy fragrance with a mild spice scent . I sprayed it on and it lasted until I took a bath. I love that it is also something that could be unisex. I think it would be great for a casual fragrance to wear daily, not overpowering but very pleasant. I recommend this for someone who wants something just a little bit different that smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast l was thrilled to have the opportunity to try Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum   This sophisticated and elegant fragrance  captures the essence of a serene woodland escape. I’m obsessed with  its distinctive and harmonious blend of woody and earthy notes.   The packaging is elegant and modern, making it a beautiful addition to any vanity or dresser.  The scent opens with top notes of sandalwood and cedarwood, creating a warm and inviting aura. Heart notes of vetiver and nutmeg add depth and complexity, while the base notes of amber wood and cinnamon provide a lingering, comforting finish. The combination of these notes results in a balanced, unisex fragrance that is both refreshing and grounding.  One of the standout features of Bois de Balincourt is its impressive longevity. A few sprays in the morning last throughout the day, with the scent subtly evolving over time. The sillage is moderate, making it noticeable yet not overpowering, perfect for both daily wear and special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am impressed to discover the Maison Louis Marie's No.4 perfume. The packaging is discreet and sleek. The Parfum comes in a simple sturdy paper box. The bottle looks elegant, making it a beautiful addition to my vanity.   This scent is a balanced blend of sandalwood, vetiver, and amber wood, with a subtle hint of cinnamon and nutmeg. The result is a warm, earthy, and woody fragrance. The scent is unique and complex. It is good for every use as well as for special occasions.   I appreciate that the brand uses clean and sustainable ingredients, making me feel good about what I'm putting on my skin. I feel confident and stylish every time I wear it.  I highly recommend this fragrance to anyone who loves earthy and woody scents and appreciates a brand that cares about the environment and sustainability. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance of a perfect day well spent in a beautiful natural setting elegantly elevated into a wearable scent, that's also a desirable mood. Suitable for any gender, the eathy yet clean notes assert their warm presence gently enough for any occasion and setting. Beautifully and thoughtfully packaged. Highly recommend. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Smells like a morning walk in a magical trail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Right in front of my house there is a trail full of green trees, a small stream, and lots of deer, squirrels, racoons, armadillos and even foxes from time to time. This Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt smells like my morning walks in this magical trail and I will now always associate it with home.   With top notes of Sandalwood and Cedarwood, it definitely has a very woody and earthy touch that is perfectly counterbalanced by the warm and spicy touch of nutmeg and cinnamon, and Amber Wood as base note. It has a very unique, sophisticated and special scent, which is sure to set you apart from the crowd. For my personal taste, it's more of a fall and winter perfume than a summer perfume (because in the heat I prefer fresh, floral or fruity scents), and is 100% unisex.    This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: The Scent That Turns Heads and Wins Hearts!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast who lives for perfumes and fantastic scents, Maison Louis Marie No. 4 Bois de Balincourt has quickly become my new obsession! The moment I spritzed it on, I knew I was in for something special. The warm, woody notes are like a cozy embrace, with hints of sandalwood, vetiver, and amber wood creating a beautifully balanced aroma.  The reactions were instant and amazing – my coworkers were immediately curious and kept asking what I was wearing, and my husband couldn’t stop raving about how phenomenal it smelled. This fragrance is perfect for day or night, adding a touch of elegance and mystery to any occasion.  Maison Louis Marie has nailed it with this one – it’s luxurious, clean, and planet-aware, making it a guilt-free indulgence. If you’re on the hunt for a new signature scent, you’ve got to try Bois de Balincourt. It’s a total game-changer!  - This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is fresh, spicy, woodsy, and truly unique. I can’t think of any other fragrance that smells like Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois de Balincourt. To get the full scent profile, it needs to settle into your skin for a few minutes. I was drawn to this fragrance because I’m a fan of sandalwood and amber wood notes, but No.04 has a very different scent than the typical woodsy perfume. It’s totally unisex in my opinion, much more appealing than the run of the mill woodsy cologne. The nutmeg and cinnamon really stand out to me, a perfect pop of spice among the refreshing woodsy notes. Like other Maison Louis Marie fragrances, it smells inherently luxurious and sophisticated. It has a standard lasting power, and it sprays beautifully into a super fine mist. Overall, a lovely unique fragrance.  *This review was collected as part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finding a signature scent that makes me feel elegant and refreshed is such a joy. This perfume has quickly become my favorite fragrance.  The scent is a perfect blend of sophistication and warmth. The woody and earthy notes create a calming, yet invigorating aroma that lasts throughout the day. It’s subtle enough for daily wear but distinctive enough to feel special. I’ve received so many compliments on it!  It’s like a little luxury that I get to enjoy every day, adding a touch of elegance to my routine. The fragrance is also long-lasting, so a little goes a long way, making it a great value.  It’s a beautiful fragrance that adds a touch of luxury to my everyday life. Thank you, Maison Louis Marie, for creating such a delightful perfume!  I highly recommend this perfume to anyone looking for a timeless and sophisticated scent.  **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: A Clean Warm and Sophisticated Parfum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a health-conscious scent enthusiast. I have been looking for a perfume that is subtle and does not give me a headache. I am also concerned about the many hidden chemicals that are toxic endocrine disruptors because of health issues I have become more aware of what I put on my skin. Thus, I was above and beyond thrilled when I learned about the mission and promise of the Maison Louis Marie. I read through all the ingredients and even scanned it through an app that lets you know if it has anything harmful in it. To my excitement, the Maison Louis Marie No. 04 Bois de Balincourt Eau de Parfum passed the test with flying colors! It was clean and free of parabens, sulfates, and other harmful toxins you find in other brands. So, if you are concerned about your health this brand is a hit out of the park with clean ingredients. The brand is known for its deep respect for the natural world and for making the ordinary extraordinary, hence its focus on quality ingredients and utilizing recycled cardboard for the packaging as well as gorgeous glass bottles. I would agree that Maison Louis Marie is an expert at taking things to the next level. From the elegant packaging to the experience of putting on the perfume they are truly genius in their formulations. When I spritzed it on my wrists and neck it brought an immediate rush of calm through my body. This is the most comforting and sophisticated scent. The first note I picked up on was the sandalwood. As it settled on my skin, I was delighted by the sweet yet woody warmth of vetiver, nutmeg, and cinnamon that hugged my nose. This scent can be layered, but it is a true hero for those wanting to evoke a warm, romantic, sophistication. I also love that this scent is unisex for those who do not want a floral sweet scent. This perfume gets a 5 out of 5 from me and has officially become my signature scent. I never got a headache, it passed the clean test, and it is the warmest and most sophisticated scent that feels like home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My mom bought this perfume and I ended up using all of hers, so I bought some for myself! It's perfect! Such a unique scent (woodsy, sultry, a little salty, spicy). The lasting power is also no joke! It has decent projection but not enough to be offensive. I put thison in the morning and sith no touch-ups, ai can still smell it in the veneing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite fragrance. It has become a staple for me & I hope they never discontinue it. So many memories were built with this fragrance & I cannot live without it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely one of my favorites. You can wear it year round. It last well and I get compliments a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume so much! I love how light the smell is. I get so many compliments when wearing this perfume! It’s my go to for sure!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could say that I'm a perfume girlie, but most perfumes give me a crazy headache. Glossier You has been my go-to for the past two years, but I decided it was time to finally switch it up. This perfume smells like warm clean skin and the forest, it's so yummy. My roommates and friends love the way it smells on me, they literally sniff me. My only qualm is that it doesn't have crazy longevity, but that's why mini perfumes exist.
It has a nice warmth to it, but something about the vetiver and aldehydes makes it smell exactly like hairspray. Also lasts a very short amount of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely warm wood scent, with a hint of spice and powder. Unfortunately it only lasts 3 hrs and doesn’t have much projection.
Stunning scent, I tried over 50 different perfumes to find a clean formula that stays. I love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume as a sample - I loved it and couldn't get enough!  I ordered the full size before I the sample was done.  Sadly, the scent in the full size isn't the same as the sample.  It's now a scent I do not reach for very often; unfortunate since we all know perfume isn't cheap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE SCENTS LIKE THIS ITS GIVING LIKE WOODY AMBER VIBES AND CAN BE WORN UNISEX

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite perfume! I use it with the oil as well and the scent lasts all day and is light and refreshing!

reviews.review_title: A must have for warm fans!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all-time best parfums to date!! This one is so warm and enticing! Highly recommend for anywhere who likes warm woody fragrances. This one also smells expensive and lasts. Buy the oil too and the candle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know what the other reviewers are talking about. I absolutely love this perfume and get many compliments on it, though I will say it does not last very long. It’s a nice fresh perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this perfume because at first it smelt fresh, and clean. But after wearing it for a bit it actually started to give me a headache. I realized that it smelt fresh and clean, because it smelt somewhat like a cleaner or air freshener. Somewhat even like medicine. I had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It may smell mysterious and refreshing for westerner, but us Asian agreed it smell just like incense, like you step into an old temple and that smoky scent hit you in the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I’ve worn this scent for about a year now here are the facts: one, does not turn heads. Two, is not long lasting. Three, very light scent to the point where it’s not noticeable. Four, not a lot of compliments. Hope this helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this is the Sephora advent calendar last year.  My sister loved it so much I purchased the full size for her and it’s perfect! I heard it’s a dupe for Le Labo Santal 33 however I find this one to be softer and more wearable. The perfume is also unisex as my brother also says it’s a fan favorite of his!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I smelled this in store and bought the travel size. I loved it, the person I was shopping with hated it. The associate at the store said this is very much a love it or hate it fragrance. Well, days later I'm buying the full size so I am firmly in the LOVE it camp. To my nose, this smells classy, expensive, sexy, warm, and just all around amazing. The longevity is my only complaint, you'll definitely need to be reapplying throughout the day on your skin. Lasts a but longer on clothes. But that's to be expected with a clean fragrance. This is fantastic for layering as well, I imagine this would layer well with so many scents but a few favorites are with TF Soleil Blanc, MM Replica Beach Walk, and Pacifica Neon Moon.

reviews.review_title: it smells like cucumber, not dill
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this scent makes me smell posh, but i wish it lasted a bit longer. and also, for some reason the travel size i bought 3 months ago is more than halfway empty and i rarely wear perfume.  i'm not sure why people are saying it smells like dill pickles.  when i spray it, i get a strong scent of cucumber, which fades after about 10 seconds.  after that, i can smell sandalwood.  i wish the vetiver note were stronger, because i can't smell it at all, and i am in love with vetiver.  i think i'll buy this scent again but wish there was a parfum option, not just eau de parfum and parfum oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so good!!! I smelled it on my best friend and I had to have it :) It's a fresh clean scent.

I think this perfume is really good as a base scent, if you know what I mean. On its own, it’s pleasant but not a star, but when layered with other top note perfumes, it’s fab. I like to layer Jo Malone with this.

reviews.review_title: Lovely fragrance, but does not last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fragrance. Yes, it is very similar to Santal 33, which I also have and wear regularly, but I think this one is slightly more feminine, whereas Santal 33 is more gender-neutral. However, I am docking 2 stars because it has NO staying power. None. It vanishes pretty much immediately. I guess I can recommend it, if you don't mind frequently reapplying it.

This is such a clean, fresh woody scent perfect for everyday all year long & it’s pretty unisex. It’s inoffensive, but still smells so amazing. Picture a cozy day in a cabin after a long walk in a forest

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It stinks 😷 got a sample from Sephora (Thank God for samples) because this one smells like bug.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this fragrance. Some woody scents are just too heavy, woodsy,  harsh, or smokey, but this on me is soft and clean and creamy. So cozy, like a fluffy blanket out of the dryer.   It's feminine without being too sweet, floral,  or fruity, and it lasts well,  although if you wanted to reapply later in the day,  it wouldn't seem like too much. Almost like a your-skin-but-better scent, although more sandalwood. Recieved compliments on this,  asking if I was wearing Le Labo. Not sure what note in this could possibly ever be mistaken as pickley or briney like some reviews stated,  but it's amazing how differently fragrance can settle on different people.
I really love everything about this perfume but it just doesn’t last very long.  I even moisturize before for a lasting smell but doesn’t help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is the very strong, gives me a headache. It smells very cheap and I feel there is no value for money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never liked a perfume as much as this one. I’m picky and I'm obsessed with it!! It lasts well. Not sure about the reviews - I bought mine in store and the bottle is great. It deserves more than only 3 stars! I will say when I sometimes spray it on myself  instead of clothes, it has an off smell but it’s worth it because I love it’s actual smell so much. I like it better than baccarat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t sure I was going to like this one. It’s beautiful & lovely. Perfect for a transition into Fall and great for everyday! I suggest spraying into your elbows & the nape of your neck to make it last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had zero expectations for this perfume, I received it with a few other samples that I actually wanted to try. But then I just fell in love with this one, I've already bought it for my sister's birthday. Hope she'll like it.   p.s. I can still smell it several hours later and it doesn't happen often for me. looooooove it!

reviews.review_title: Want to smell like Down East??
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells exactly like waking into DownEast. I didn’t get any notes of Amber, it’s allll sandalwood. It’s a fine smell for a department store but it’s not sensual or cozy like I had hoped. It’s difficult o wash off so I guess that’s good if you want to smell like a pile of weood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have gotten a few compliments on this scent and really enjoy it. To me it smells like pine trees but others in the reviews are saying it is a summer scent, so it just depend on the person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the small travel size before committing to the large of this Perfume and was absolutely in love. The reason for the two stars is the larger bottle scent seems to only last an hour. I’m not sure if I got a bad bottle but my travel one I could smell on my clothes all day long where this seems to be gone an hour later. Really disappointed that I spent the money to only get this out come.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really bummed, as I was excited to give this one a try. But unfortunately the pickle smell is true, at least on my body chemistry. Two stars because the other notes are lovely.

reviews.review_title: Love the brand, just not this scent
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I am one of those who also smells a very strong vinegar/brine smell with this particular scent. Maybe it's the vetiver?  Everyone's body chemistry and sent receptors are different, just like with any other scent. I'm sure some people love it. I even tried to wear it overnight while sleeping, and when I woke up the only sent that lingered was a very strong vinegar/brine smell.  That being said, I absolutely love their no. 13 and 12. Very lovely scents *and* this is one of the only high end brands I've tried (including the infamous Chanel) that actually lasts!  I do love this brand overall, just not a fan of this particular scent. Recommend getting the sample set. I did that and loved three out of the six that they include. I'm sure you'll find one you love as well.

reviews.review_title: Amazing! Like Le Labo Santal but softer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am extremely confused by the pickle comments, absolutely no. I also own Le Labo and like this a bit better for women. I tested it in sephora and walked for 20 minutes. The smokiness kept coming out and I loved it more over time. It lasted all day. Hours later, I would lift my arm and catch a whiff and wonder what that gorgeous scent was, then realize it was this. It is different enough from Le Labo that I will own and wear both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I saw the review about the scent disappearing as soon as you spray it, but decided to purchase because there were enough reviews stating the opposite. I should have listened!!!! Scent completely disappears. Don’t waste your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this scent! It’s a beautiful combination of woods. Outdoors. Not overpowering. Lasts all day. My new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really good is a summer fragrance, it last long, you can used it right after the shower I really like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked it the first time I tried it then my nephew said why does it smell like pickles? now I can't smell anything but pickles and vinegar. sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Regretfully, I’m part of the pickle squad. Crazy but true. Sprayed on a sample card, it was fine. Took it home and the moment it began to dry down into my skin, instant pickle. Had to return. The packaging is beautiful and simple.

reviews.review_title: Scent instantaneously evaporates! DO NOT BUY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent fades away the moment you spray on your skin. Don’t waste your money. Buy the oil instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning like the oil. Long lasting. Chic and clean. Have used for years. Gorgeous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was using the oil perfume and was loving it… Very disappointed with the quality of the perfume! Literally stays on me for 5min at the most… very sad because I love this fragrance…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get endless complements about this fragrance! If you think it smells like pickles your pheromones need some checking and stop eating crappy food that makes you stink! You are what you eat, there's a reason for the saying.  I'm not a fan of sweet smells or burnt wood so this has an awesome balance of earthy, woods and an unline of goodness.

reviews.review_title: Scent doesn’t last for more than 30 minutes..
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this smell BUT one huge issue, it lasts for about 30 minutes max and then the smell is completely gone. I’ve noticed the price has gone up as well! $100 for a 1.7oz is ridiculous for a perfume that doesn’t last even an hour!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a deluxe sampler set. I thought it was just ok. Didn’t hate it, but definitely didn’t love it. Well a couple hours later I kept smelling something amazing and realized it was me. Definitely worth a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After being pregnant, I couldn’t handle any perfume, made me nauseous, this was and still is the only smell I love and it’s just perfect. I got it as sample, than traveling size, now full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me.  It smells of coconut and fades very quickly.  Saving it as a summer scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample and although this is not my typical type of scent I love it. You do have to let it sit on your skin because the initial spray is too woodsy for me. Very unisex but more on the fem side IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I came here for the reviews to see if I am only one who thinks it smells like pickle juice 🤣 i have a sample vial of this. In the vial smells like pickle juice and then when placed on skin takes on a smell I can’t even describe and

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Santal dupe this is not!  I agree with other reviewer. Smells like I poured pickle juice on myself.  No thank you!  Thank goodness I only bought the mini size!

reviews.review_title: Not what you think it will be.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try a Santal Dupe. I got a drop on my hand and it smelled strong like pickles not Santal at all. I went out to run a couple errands and by the time I got back it was driving me nuts. I had to scrub it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample of this and wasn’t impressed. It’s very bland and like a bunch of other unisex sandalwood scents out there right now. It’s worst sin is that it’s mundane. It doesn’t evoke a feeling or a place and it’s not something that would stop a person in their tracks. Why even bother?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells really nice. Honestly, it reminds of the cremo body wash palo santo from Target. I had always wanted to at scent in a perfume and I think this is quite nearly an exact match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this perfume but the travel size bottle was leaking when I received it. Definitely not going to travel with it. Hoping keeping it upright in my organizer will keep from any future leaks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with the candle, so when I saw it was a perfume, I said yes ma'am! Smells just like the candle. Soft, sexy and subtle. Unfortunately, it doesn't last. What good is a lovely scent if it disappears into the wind?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely now added to my signature scent collection! I will however, strongly disagree with the person who said to mix with vanilla scent. Specifically the 7 virtues vanilla wood. This produces a very mosquito repellent-esque scent. I would recommend mixing with either Burberry “her” or if you’re more boujee baccarat rouge. Lovely fragrance on it own though!

reviews.review_title: Amazing signature scent, very underrated imo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I smelled this perfume in store at Sephora and couldn’t get enough of it! It’s abstract, unisex, and woodsy without the overwhelming harshness that most woodsy perfumes have. I also love that is made with no pthalates = no thyroid disruption! I layer this with Lost Cherry and I LOVE it!

reviews.review_title: A flop the second time around.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Something is off. This is my second bottle and its not as good as the first in terms of staying power and the strength of the scent. Very disappointed because it lacks consistency.  The warmth of the scent isn't around anymore. Curious to know if they changed the formula. I will not be purchasing this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this fragrance with my order and the scent is quite strange and woody but I also can't stop smelling it. I agree with the review about layering it with a sweeter vanilla scent. Probably will not wear it out as the smell may not be for everyone but overall intrigued.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m soooo on the fence about this fragrance. Firstly I prefer the oil version over the eau, it’s more rich smelling if that makes sense (idk). But overall it smells different than anything I’ve smelled before, it’s just kinda woody and lightly smells like herbs in my opinion? And my dad said he smells a hint of coconut which I agree with. However, how I’ve come to love this is by layering with vanilla!! It adds that necessary touch of warmth and sweetness I feel the fragrance needs. I use Vanilla Woods by 7 Virtues and I’m loving this combo. But I won’t be purchasing a full size because layering is too much work lol I’m trying to find the perfect fragrance for me without needing to add more notes on top because this fragrance just feels incomplete to me and like it’s missing something. But remember fragrance is subjective so there really isn’t one answer. I just felt it wasn’t for me, if you like sweet and warm scents you can skip this one!

Very sexy scent. If you’re looking for a sultry and unique scent, I would recommend this. You almost can’t tell if it’s a woman’s or a man’s perfume that’s how complex it is.It’s not your typical average floral paw wet perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this many times before I got my hands on Santal 33. I tried on the paper and it gave me that Santal 33 impression and on my skin it dry down with cedar.

reviews.review_title: It’s not bad but not something I would purchase .
reviews.review_text: It’s hard to say what this perfume smells like as it seems to smell like all sorts of things but hard to pinpoint what exactly. Someone that works in the same office as me said I smelled like cigarettes and ananoanotindiindivual unsocial

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the warm scent of this perfume year round. I've read people saying it smells like dill it might be your body's response to the perfume, personally I never thought of dill maybe a hint of vanilla.I will say this perfume isn't strong so you do have to refresh during the day.Perfect if you suffer from migraines too.
So I’m not smelling dill pickles, at first it’s a strange smell but once it dries it’s lovely. I’m smelling a floral musk, a bit like fresh soap, it’s definitely a fall/winter smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an awful perfume.it made my husband simultaneously gag and crave dill pickle chips. do not reccomend for anyone but the most ardent pickle lover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely warm scent that is perfect for the fall. I received a sample and I found myself using it quite a bit. I’m not smelling any dill pickle type of scent.

reviews.review_title: Good but not a femme perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
