reviews.review_text: I tried a sample of this recently and I was unfortunately not a fan. Did not pick up any sweetness or cinnamon like the notes suggest. The amber had a very “sticky” smell to it like sap from a tree. The vetiver is cooling and comes through the most. I think this would be a nice cologne for those who are masc presenting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Literally disgusting & pickle smelling. Not a fan of this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice fragrance, and it's super long lasting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Je suis une habituée aux parfums différents de ceux que tout le monde utilise, et je viens de trouver une autre façon différente de compléter mon look. Parfum original, hors du commun, naturel et sexy. Après 30 minutes de l’avoir mis, je trouve que le parfum s’est estompé un peu mais ça n’enlève rien à sa simplicité et à son caractère confident.  Je me devais de faire ce commentaire,(mon premier :-) ). Je suis une personne difficile dans le choix de parfum et celui-là m’a emballé dès la première application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this for a fall fragrance. I have to agree with others, at first it comes off as kind of an odd smell...pickle maybe? More herbal-very natural scent. The best part though is when it wears off about an hour in! It smells amazing!! A softer vanilla/sandalwood, and that remains all day. If you like unique and complex this is it.

I got this in the sephora advent calendar day 1 and it is one of the worst perfumes i’ve ever smelled. I hate it. I will say though it is not in my scent preference (this is kind of florally and more of a sweet girly)

reviews.review_title: Smells like dill pickles on me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I almost thought all those reviews are a joke... but this fragrance actually does smells like pickle. Not a stinky sour pickle (fortunately for that day I decided to wear this fragrance), but like a dill pickle. I didn't smell any of the notes specified in the description, it doesn't have anything cinnamon or ginger, nothing earthy or woodsy. It simply smells like herbs, with a strong note of dill. On my skin it lasted 4-5 hours, maybe a couple of hour more on the clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this scent when I got It as a sample. After purchasing the full size bottle I find it has no staying power on my skin. Unfortunately returning :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hear that some people get pickles when they spray this and honestly, I do too at first. But it wears off and this is a really gorgeous, creamy sandalwood. Great for layering or wearing on its own. The nutmeg note in this really makes it distinct from other sandalwood fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Subtle and sweet, mixed well with my chemistry but didn't have the desired staying power. This scent definitely gives, you're skin but better vibes. A little salty, soft and smooth with a flirty element. I probably won't buy again, as my preferred smells are a little more spicy, but I would absolutely recommend. Also, no pickles lol

reviews.review_title: Perfume is my anti stress solution
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i bought this perfume in a small spray first and use it everyday at work and i'm starting to love it ... it last for 7hrs even it's super hot weather btw i live in Las Vegas and i can't wait for this weekend to get that big bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the sample set and out of the 6 this is my absolute FAVORITE!!!!! I have gotten so many compliments when I wear it that I can’t get enough. I was reading the other reviews before buying since people are saying it smells like pickles lol but it totally doesn’t to me. 10/10 will be buying again once I run out

reviews.review_title: If you want to smell like dill pickle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this perfume, I ended up smelling like dill pickle… the scent did have good longevity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells AMAZING. I got a sample of this in the Sephora Clean perfume sampler box and honestly I thought this would be the only scent that I did not like because I typically am not a fan of woody perfumes. But this literally is my favorite, I cannot stop smelling myself when I wear it. Also people always think I am wearing Le Labo Santal 33, so you basically are smelling super bougie for way less $$. The best way I can describe it is you smell like a expensive hotel resort. Like the Ritz Carlton in Aruba. So so so good.

I originally bought the oil which I loved but wanted something that stayed on your skin a little longer. The oil didn’t last past two hours so I was hoping this perfume would have longer staying power . ( I know oil tend to last longer but I figured perfume would at least stay on your clothes ) the perfume Smells amazing like the oil but it doesn’t last! It’s going back

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fav scent! I love wearing it in fall or winter. It also works well for nighttime. The cent with change slightly throughout the day. It's not overpowering. People often ask if I'm wearing Le Labo. I love a clean sophisticated scent.

reviews.review_title: Clean beauty smell - always receiving compliments
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is fresh, slightly woodsy, yet juicy and citrusy.  I can see how reviews may describe this light smell as dill.  If you wear this everyone in LA will look at you with slightly raised eyebrows and ask “Le Lebo”?  I keep multiples of this scent, perfect for an afternoon touch up, smell fresh instead of weirdly floral. Iseverywhere

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this scent, but all I get from it is smoky/earthy dill. On the bright side, the staying power of the perfume is fantastic: the bottle I purchased leaked, leaving a makeup bag smelling forever of pickles. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like ~fancy pickles~ to me. Glad I sampled before buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing but it doesn’t stay on for long the bottle for some reason leaked in my purse :( I want to buy it again but sadly that won’t happen there’s no point if the scent doesn’t stay on <|3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent, reminds me of a sweeter Santal 33. However, the bottle is horrible. Half of the bottle leaked out in my bag after bringing it to lunch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this fragrance. I love Another 13 by Le Labo and was looking for something lighter for the summer. This is it! Woody, with notes of santal, but very light and airy at the same time. Will definitely be a staple in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bois de Balincourt is the perfect scent. It is memorable and instantly recognizable. I hoard this perfume like it’s going to disappear, but luckily a tiny bit does the trick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most unique and surprisingly gorgeous scents I have ever tried and ever owned. When I tested it at Sephora it came off a bit strong and smelled like dill. However, when I purchased my travel size it was different, in a good way. The dill was not prominent at all and the dry down is simply divine. It’s like a unique combination of herbal and sweet and is so delicate and ethereal. It’s hard to describe but I can truly say I’m in love. I think it’s difficult to really get a good sense about a fragrance until you get it home and apply it on freshly showered skin. I highly recommend this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Earthy, fresh, and not overdone. One of my all time favourite scents. I’ve gotten the most compliments with this perfume out of anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells EXACTLY like Phlur Sandara, my most hated fragrance I've ever bought which I returned a while back. I received this as a sample a few orders ago and without reading reviews or anything I just sprayed it on after my shower and was immediately hit with the nauseating scent of dill/warm pickle juice! It sent me right back to my first wiff of Phlur Sandara and the stomach churn I experienced, I even had to read the sample to make sure it wasn't Sandara. NOT for me and I do not recommend! So happy it was just a sample!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i decided to try this because i saw reviews on tiktok and other social media that this is a good dupe for santal 33, a slightly more expensive perfume than this one, which is why i decided to try this. it kinda smells like santal 33 with that sort of “dill” scent people always describe, mixed with pumpkin pie spice in a way?? it’s not the same at all. it’s it’s own unique fragrance. the cinnamon and nutmeg notes made it a bit too spicy for me. but it’s still a nice perfume. i just wouldn’t see myself reaching for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a extremely well blended fragrance- it’s earthy yet lightly sweet and is just gorgeous! Magical creation… It is worth a sample

reviews.review_title: interesting woodsy scent but proceed with caution
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: initially, i was absolutely repulsed because this eau de parfum smelled like stale urine with a hint of the air freshener used to disguise it...but then i thought i should test it out directly on my skin WITHOUT spraying on my clothing before writing my review (i was previously spraying on both my skin and clothing). i found that by using this manoeuvre, no. 4 bois de balincourt settled on my skin in a very lovely way; while i still got that initial blast of sandalwood and cedar wood, they quickly faded (but not entirely) to reveal the powdery and spicy (cinnamon, nutmeg, etc.) notes. unfortunately, i did find that the lovely effect eventually wore off, leaving the initial stale urine scent that so repulsed me…but keep in mind that it wore off after overnight testing, and i am not a professional! just my experience, and of course everyone will have different results due to differences in skin chemistry.  given how sharp the notes are, the sillage was pretty moderate, leaning more intimate. i found this eau de parfum to have pretty average longevity.  pros: has the “Clean at Sephora: Clean + Planet Positive” seal of approval unisex, leaning somewhat feminine  (very nice option for someone who wants a feminine woodsy scent).    cons: really depends on skin chemistry, otherwise the sandalwood and cedar wood are so overpowering that they end up mixing with the other notes in such a fashion as to smell like a moderately-maintained restroom in a semi-public place - particularly on clothing.  while i am a firm believer in testing fragrances, i was shocked at just how different my experience was with this eau de parfum on the skin versus spraying on my clothing. perhaps this has something to do with the chemistry involving its clean ingredients, but i am no chemist.  i just strongly urge against blind-buying this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very woodsy scent. Hard to describe but makes me feel fancy. A bit peppery but I don’t use a lot of it. I’ve gotten so many compliments on this! Multiple people have asked me to send them the link so they can purchase it. I don’t get a powdery or pickle scent like some have mentioned at all. I like that it is on the feminine side of unisex in my opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: wow, I love this scent so much. it’s fresh, and perfect for someone who doesn’t love when fragrances are super STRONG. Just a fresh earthy scent, absolutely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know how to describe it, but it smells good. It's like woody but you don't smell like nature. You smell like wealth. I liked that it is a clean brand, but the fragrance actually lasted throughout the day. I received compliments several hours after applying and could still smell it on my skin when I returned home for the night. I got this as the sample with one of my orders, but I am plotting to get the full bottle soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s not strong, long lasting! Perfect for date night!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo how do I put this... This smells like dill, but in the best way possible!! This smells very fresh, spicy and dilly to me, with some creaminess and warmth from the sandalwood... I'm surprised there aren't any citrus or coconut in the notes. I am currently testing this in the wintertime, but I imagine this will perform beautifully during the summertime.  I won't lie to you, it is a strange fragrance. But sometimes I like strange. And, strangely enough, I enjoy the fresh/spicy/creamy dilly smell in this haha! I cannot stop smelling my wrists, it is quite addicting and calming. I feel like this is something you would smell at an expensive hotel at a resort or something. I have yet to have tried Santal 33, and now I'm tempted... rip my wallet lol  Nonetheless, it is a very unique fragrance and it has great sillage and performance. I would definitely recommend sampling first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried in store. 3 stars cuz perfume’s subjective…It smelled good at first; after 5 mins I started getting a light, sweet pickle scent, like others have stated. There’s no going back from that. I can also see how another person smelled popcorn butter scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love at first smell! I received a sample in an order, and immediately ordered the travel spray. Heaven. I could wear this every day for the rest of my life! I asked for it for Valentine's Day, and I got it, and I am so happy when I wear this. An extra bonus is my man likes it too! I'm so glad I found this fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the full size not really knowing what to expect, but YOU NEED THIS PERFUME! It smells so expensive and sophisticated, I get tons of compliments whenever I wear it, and it lasts a really long time on me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample in the sample bag this month and hoooo boy it's a full-sizer! if you like peppery, spicy perfumes, this is AWESOME! I can't overstate how awesome this smell is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve found a new favorite. It just smells so natural on me. It’s fresh without being aquatic and it’s absolutely intoxicating. Sometimes I spray it on myself when I’m just hanging out at home that’s how much I enjoy it. Reminds me of the forest on a brisk day. Unique and lovely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample with an order, it smells really lovely but not something I’d wear. I read someone compared it to a candle and that’s kind of a great description. It’s like a room scent. It’s very soft and powdery to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i am usually not into woody scents on myself, however this scent is sooo warm and cozy and comforting. i was not expecting to like it so much, it really grew on me. very inoffensive scent.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it so badly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent but unfortunately it doesn’t last for more than an hour maximum. I’ve tried spraying it on both my skin as well as fabric but it just doesn’t stick. I’ve also tried using lots of product at once but that doesn’t make a difference. There have been many instances where I’ve put this on and asked someone 5 minutes later if they like the smell and they can’t smell anything. Unfortunately I won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first this perfume is super green and peppery, but after about half an hour to an hour it tones down into a beautiful, warm vanilla/sandalwood scent. It’s very feminine and not musky or anything. I feel like the smell lasts for a good amount of time. I also love spray mechanism - it gives a really nice fine mist instead of a normal spray. I usually don’t like warmer earthy scents, but I love this and am so glad I gave it a chance! It’s my new everyday perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was unique, not unpleasant but still odd in an ok way. I tested this at Sephora but on one of the paper strips provided since I was testing a lot of perfumes that visit.  Upon first spray I smelled something Minty. I laid down the strip and let it breath for a good 5 min and then I smelled Lime with a hint of mint that kinda reminded me a little of a Mojito without the booze. Green (which I typically don't like but this one didn't smell like cut grass) and zesty lime. I would consider this one but maybe not at this price. The bottle is very plain & uninteresting; looks kinda cheap.
First time …to buy perfume because of used the samples. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Green, savory, and strong aromatics. Long-lasting, but it gave me a headache.

I really wanted to love this perfume… I love the smell, it starts like woody smell, after a while it smells like vanilla. I’m obsessed with the smell..but the quality of this bottles is insanely bad…I’ve had it since this April and just left it on my desk..the perfume evaporated and ruined the label and the spray part..the silver paint start piling and is falling apart..it’s not a cheap perfume, can they just make it a better quality?!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I *really* wanted to love this scent because I adore vetiver and sandalwood scents, but this one just did not work for me. I didn’t get pickles like a lot of other people did, but I did get a really chemically fake butter (think microwave popcorn butter before it’s popped) scent. My husband smelled the same thing. Then I thought it might fade into a different scent, but nope - microwave popcorn for hours! The scent itself is lovely, it just doesn’t work with my body chemistry. On the bright?? side, I was able to smell it for several hours, even when I tried to wash it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell but it stays for maybe an hour. It is very disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Please change the travel spray packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this scent and it doesn’t smell like pickles on me, more of a clean cotton like smell but I sprayed this once just to make sure the pump worked then didn’t touch it for months. I wanted to wear it on my birthday and when I grab it I found that more than 1/2 the vial had leaked. So sad! This was gifted otherwise I would have returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, this is not a Santal 33 dupe. Similar notes, gorgeous, but unique in its own right. The projection and lasting power is fantastic.  In the dry down I do detect a subtle dill note like others. It's a very earthy, woody dill-like smell. Not at all like pickles, which are sour. I think those with limited experience with dill will associate the note with pickles. But that earthy quality with the sandalwood, vetiver, amber and spices is just beautiful! Love it!!

reviews.review_title: Nice scent, doesn’t last more than two hours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally do not smell pickles at all with this scent lol. I think this smells so good, especially for fall. Unisex. However, I noticed it doesn’t last very long at all. I’d say the scent lasts on the body maybe two hours max. It does last longer if sprayed on clothes, as most do. I noticed they raised the price from $85 to $88..I personally wouldn’t purchase again or recommend due to high price for little pay off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use to only use Le Labo (which is overpriced and overrated) until I discovered Manison Louis Marie No.04 Bois. No.04 Bois s now my “go to” cologne! I always keep at least one gift set on hand since they make the perfect gift and buy one for myself as it’s an excellent value. I love it that they have the same scented candles as the cologne. I have 4 candles throughout the house, one in every room. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Great scent! If you don't notice the pickle scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent!   I did have a few weird incidents where someone would ask if I smelled pickles. I personally do not smell it. I did have to return because I was paranoid someone would say something about pickles again. Returned and end up buying Le Labo Santal as they are pretty similar fragrance wise.

reviews.review_title: love this scent hate the mini bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this scent from a sample so I purchased the mini.  It did not disappoint and smelled the same as the sample.  It is fresh and herbal.  However, beware of the mini bottle.  When I removed the top the spray/pump came with it and spilled 3/4 of the bottle on the bathroom counter and me.  I’m sad so  Much was wasted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Unique fragrance. I only get the pickles if I really think about it, so if you like unique/different scents this is definitely a great thing to try. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My new fall fragrance! I chose this fragrance as part of the Clean perfume sample set. By far the best fragrance of those but I also wanted to review this amazing scent individually! When I smell it I’m instantly reminded of jumping in a pile of leaves or walking through the woods in Autumn. This is the first day I’ve worn it and it’s now the end of my work day and I can still smell it after about 7 hours! I’m a big fragrance girl and most of my perfumes I cannot smell on myself at all after few hours so I’m very impressed with this one! It truly smells like the embodiment of fall to me and is a scent that would smell lovely on any gender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an exact dupe for Santal 33. It smells just as good though it may lack some of the Le Labo longevity. It's not my daily scent so l will take this over the LL for now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i wish the 6ml bottle felt a little sturdier, but the scent is so amazing i’m sure i’d give the full size a 5/5. it lasts longer (can still smell it like 36 hrs later) on clothes than on skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the candle originally and it smells amazing, so I picked up the full size fragrance. It smells good a little different because it mixes with you skin chemistry, only complaint is that it doesn’t last long, especially in humid climates. Only like 2-4 hours. I like how it doesn’t have an over barring scent though very clean and sophisticated. Makes you smell rich.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice scent. Not comparable to Le Labo Santal 31, fades too quick and is soft. Smells interesting but overall an OK fragrance if your expectations are low. Mixes well with other fragrances/as a layering scent. Would not use on its own.

Barely lasts an hour or two, even after heavy application, so I returned it. A single spritz of any of my other eau de toilettes lasts longer than this.  The scent is awesome though, almost spot on like Santal 33 but less leathery and more delicate/fresh. Wish it was stronger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow it’s totally a dupe for santal 33  I don’t know if it’s meant to be for women or men but smells like luxury, wood

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Yup. Pickles. It smells like pickles. I was really hoping I’d fall into the percentage of people who loved this. But alas, I fall into the pickle group. If this really is a dupe for a $500 perfume, I can’t believe people spend that kind of money on pickle juice. I honestly get no other scent from it. I even sprayed over perfume over it, and all over me (I only sprayed one spray in the crook of my elbow) and I STILL smell pickles. So…at least it has staying power if you do happen to like this…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. I received a little sample, then I knew what I wanted for my birthday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting Santal 33 ever since I received a sample. I cherish it and use it sparingly due to the CRAZY price tag ( but is worth every penny) Without knowing this a dupe I tried it in store and melted.. you know that feeling when you fall in love with a scent. I contemplated between the Parfume and the oil but went with the parfume since I like to spray but will be going back for the oil to keep in my bag to touch up. It’s warm, earthy, slightly masculine but a floral note that keeps it feminine. It’s definitely an any time of the year scent but I will be using this as a transitional scent between summer and winter more than wearing in the hot summer months. If you like sweet,girly scents this i isn’t it.  It’s warm and sexy yet not over powering so it’s safe for the office but perfect for nights out. I’m a huge fan and if you are considering Santal 33… try this first. I put my sample of Santal on one Wrist and this on the other and it’s not much difference .. especially for the price difference .. ( and thankfully.. not even close to smelling like pickles on me lol )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I raved about this scent when I first picked it up a few years ago, really woody and sweet when you first spray and more peppery on the dry down. Only 4 stars because I don’t find i ever want to reach for it anymore but I don’t have another scent like it, worth giving it a shot if you want something sort of woody and musky but also sweet and peppery

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pickle Juice, Pickle Juice, Pickle Juice. I kept trying to wear this because it's supposed to be a dupe for Le Labo Santal 33 but it just does not work with my skin. It only smells decent after I've washed it off my arm and waited a couple hours for the dill pickle/cucumber note to go away. I'm really sad because the formula is clean, lasts a long time on me even after scrubbing with soap, and has pretty packaging. But  man I cannot get past that pickley top note

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a lovely scent!! Stays on all day and I get compliments all the time on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vetiver, try it. You won’t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow i am really impressed. I got a sample of this perfume with my order and i wasn't expecting much from this perfume but i have to admit i actually love it. It is the perfect woody earthy perfume and in general i'm not even a person that likes woody and earthy perfumes, I tend to go for floral and sweet perfumes. But this perfume smells so good. it is not strong to the point where it gives you a headache, it's perfect for an everyday perfume. It also has like this classy, elegant feel to it. I would consider this a light, woody, classy perfume. i'm really thinking about purchasing the big bottle!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never thrown out a product as fast as I did this one. I received two samples of this perfume in an order (because the other samples must have been sold out) and after spraying it, I had to immediately change whatever I was wearing. It was very strong smelling that reminded me of a retirement home (not pleasant at all). I was disappointed because I was hopefully to try something new, but this was NOT it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I saw where this was supposed to be similar to santal33 and I actually like it better!  Smells great, not too feminine, lasts, and I’ve received lots of compliments

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like Madewell or Aritzia; peppery, earthy, kind of floral. You definitely need to let it dry down a bit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered the sample after hearing so much fuss about it. Really like the scent overall but it’s not long lasting like some other have claimed, I couldn’t smell it after 30-45 minutes so longevity is not good, which is why I can only give it four stars. Might try a few others before committing to a full bottle purchase, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells... buttery. Idk how else to explain it. It made my head hurt. Whoever described this as a longer lasting Glossier You is absolutely clueless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample included in another purchase by chance and i have never bought something so quickly!! Smells strong at first but it’s not a bad thing bc this lasts all day/night! Got a bunch of compliments within minutes of greeting people!definitely earthy musk scent love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Eeeww, smells just like a jar of dill pickles.  Super gross.  Hard pass!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Can't speak to the lasting power but this is one of the worst perfumes I've smelled. As soon as I sprayed it my mom and I both gagged and I had to wash it off. Really not sure how people can like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like straight up Dill Pickle... not like your average dill pickle chips but the dill you'd get from the farmers market before you start pickling. it's fresh, herbal-y and the underlying notes are nice but i can't get past the dill pickle scent it keeps lingering hours later making me crave pickles or something sour.. not a fan and would not recommend unless you want to smell like fermented pickle juice & that's your thing then spritz away & slay hun
Beautiful, long-lasting scent. Reminds me of Playa’s leave-in conditioning spray scent, complex but not overwhelming. Have ordered the larger bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have Santal 33 and this is a very good dupe! Only caveat is its longevity. Disappears on my skin within 30 mins :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume so much!!!! I need it to come back in stock. Received it as a sample and I’m hooked

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite perfume, get tons of compliments every time I’m wearing it. I am just in love with the smell.Will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like Lipton tea bags and black pepper. I don’t get any of the sandalwood notes that others rave about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has clean and fresh woody smell . Very 2021 . Reminds me of santal 33

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like to layer this with vanilla woods by seven virtues. This has an almost smokiness that is heady and unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful warm, slightly sweet & very long lasting scent. Blends very well with my body chemistry. Perfect date night scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this perfume. Love it. But the bottle sucks. It leaked all over and I ended up returning it. I would buy it again in a heartbeat if they fixed the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume. It’s sophisticated, and makes me feel like a million dollars when I wear it. It’s perfect for girls who like a little more musky, earthy smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells exactly like Le Labo Santal 33. I know this because I already have Le Labo Santal 33. The fragrance is spot on. So if  looking for a less expensive alternative to Santal 33 this one is it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this with one of my orders and fell in love. So fresh and subtle but noticeable and just plain delightful. This is one of my favorite perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got it as a sample with an order just to try and found a scent I need in my life forever. It's smoky, warm, woody without being cloying and still feeling fresh - my ideal winter scent. I love this one and plan on purchasing a full size when I can.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this smell! I even have the candle. This is the scent that New York Pilates used to use.

reviews.review_title: I Really Warmed Up to No. 4 Bois de Balincourt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried the free sample that I received, I was surprised & confused. I didn't think that I liked it at first because it just so different. It actually works really well with my body chemistry once it warms up. The main note that I notice though is vetiver, then the amber & cedar & sandal wood. It really compliments the deodorant that like, which is made with sandalwood & vanilla. I find it very calming & relaxing, like the types of essential oils that my Yogini would diffuse in her classes. It's the most unique scent that I've ever tried. It's not like anything else I have ever worn, but honestly, it has become my new favorite. I'll be purchasing the full-size ASAP because my sample is gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell...my husband likes it and I think it matters he likes it. Other reviews are very sketchy and ridiculous in my opinion. But overall I love the smell, if I like Christian Dior and Tom Ford perfumes, this one makes another one of my favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve honestly never disliked a scent as much as this one.  It smells like dill pickles followed by a floral scent.  It’s dreadful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good perfume! Amber and sandalwood, yes please....however this perfume turn on me rather quickly. it soured and reminded me of pickels! perfume is personal for every person, and I will definitely never purchase this again. I passed it to a friend who loves it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite fragrance of LIFE! I will say- when I first purchased from a boutique in my City, I felt like I needed 1 spray to last all day - unfortunately that bottle lost its life at my friends basement when the glass bottle broke in his apartment ( he still smells it, and that was last  February) SO  not sure if they changed the formula but the one I purchased recently doesn’t last. The same with the oil I purchased. It’s a full 3-4 spritz/spramps until I can get my desired scent. it’s weird. I would LOVE the stronger version back - but I’ll still continue to purchase this fragrance :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A nice fragrance with strong top notes of sandalwood and cinnamon. Good for mornings and afternoons. Tends to fade quickly in terms of scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a unique, interesting scent!  Woodsy, yet feminine.  I find myself repeatedly sniffing my wrists after application, thoroughly enjoying the scent.  This fragrance is absolutely intoxicating and I can't get enough of it! The only downside to this fragrance is that it does not have any staying power.  After less than 30 minutes, the scent completely dissipates.  Such a shame for such a lovely fragrance.  I will only repurchase this product if the scent is reformulated to last longer.  Please, please improve the staying power of this fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Perfect balance between masculin and feminin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. It's the perfect dupe for Santal 33 from Le Labo and I always get compliments when I wear it from the opposite sex.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love amber, cedarwood & sandalwood...this fragrance is musky & lingers on my skin for 8+ hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a sample with an order & immediately ordered the full size. I usually dont like clean scents as I feel they dont project much & often smell like bathroom cleaner. However, this clean fragrance is amazing. Its light but still packs a punch. This would make a great every day fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is SUCH an interesting, captivating scent. I received a free sample from Sephora, and it is unlike anything I usually like (fruity/fresh/sweet scents) NOR anything I have really smelled before! It is woodsy.. yet there is some vanilla-esque (possibly the cinnamon?).. yet other layers. I sprayed it on my arm and cannot stop smelling it. I have looked at this page countless times today.. contemplating a purchase! I had my fiance smell my arm, to which he said, oooh I LIKE that! and said it smells vanilla-y and warm. But it is not just vanilla. There is so much going on here. Layers, complexity, character. I would not be surprised if I purchase this by the end of the week. You HAVE to smell this for yourself!!

reviews.review_title: A winner for this sensitive nose
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not able to wear most perfumes due to allergies, however this one smells amazing and doesn’t cause any reaction for me. I highly recommend giving it a try if you struggle with perfume sensitivities! Smells lightly spicy and woodsy but still feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in another order. I have worn it several different times and I finally gave in and bought the full size today. I've read some say the smell doesn't last for them. I have not had this issue. I use two to three sprays and I smell amazing all day. On me, this smells subtly woodsy and clean. I definitely get a calming feel when I catch a whiff of it. I am very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.review_title: Smells like diluted Fahrenheit by Dior! Wow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am only giving this a 3rd star because this perfume smells like a gentler version of Fahrenheit by Dior.  Fahrenheit adds a nostalgic sentiment of value (for me) related to good moments in my youth.  Why has no one made a direct comparison to Fahrenheit?  I haven’t been able to sample Labo’s Santal, but if it approximates the scent as accurately as some reviewers believe, here’s an idea; spray some Fahrenheit onto one pulse point and repeat w/ No.3 Bois de Bamuncourt on the other.   I guarantee Dior’s F. will outlast by hours and won’t have any residue that smells like cheap bathroom fragrance lingering behind.  In fact, beyond an hour of wear, this perfume fades & cheapens, while Dior’s will linger (keep in mind Fahrenheit is a men’s cologne that is very strong).  Nevertheless, feels like both use the same top notes that attract ppl to this scent, but Dior’s version is cheaper (on sale quite often too).   Someone suggested this to me and once I smelled it, I absolutely agreed - yes! It’s exactly what this scent reminds me of...but a cheaper, diluted version that leaves a weak and strange scent behind (which I very much dislike).  I’m wondering how many of you would agree w/ a direct comparison.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do like the smell but it just reminds me too much of what you would spray in the bathroom- a luxurious bathroom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful scent but the eau de parfum isn't very intense and doesn't last AT ALL. The perfume oil is much more long-wearing and intense - a way better deal too.
Smells amazing. My favorite perfume!!! Definitely buying again when I finish my bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this perfume & I have nothing similar to it. It gives off a very cold and clean vibe. It's wood-y but not the warm vanilla type, I think because it has sandalwood but also vetiver. You might not fall in love with it at first because it grew on me over time but now it's one of my most used

reviews.review_title: I smell like I’m drinking chai in a log cabin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel so luxurious when I wear this!! Not in a stuffy I’m better than you luxury. More like a trendy, well traveled and self assured luxury. Confident, and deliberate. It takes a certain person to pull this off. Definitely not a blind buy. Please test this out with your body chemistry first, as I’ve read that this can pull a dill pickle note on some. On my skin this smells soooo creamy ahhh I love it. Woody, and spicy like chai. The nutmeg is gorgeous in this fragrance, and will shine in cooler temperatures. I feel so good about myself when I wear this. I also have the perfume oil, so I layer that with the EDP for a stronger scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent! Slightly sweet and very uplifting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fabulous fragrance choice - and I am very picky! However, the performance is terrible. It only lasts 30 minutes. Too bad.

reviews.review_title: Does not smell like the $30.00 set :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so sad. I loved the $30.00 set with the spray and little bottle of oil.  So I bought the full size and it smells like alcohol when first sprayed :(  . so what do I do? keep buying the small $30.00 set and send the full bottle back? The depth of the notes are not here. A good perfume should not come out smelling alcohol first thing.  The candle smells like kerosene, and the oil bottle is so small. I was so excited.   I have other good perfumes and none come out smellof alcohol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite perfume ever. It's a dead ringer for Le Labo's Santal 33, but just a little bit softer, which is perfect for when you still want people to notice your perfume, but not be hit in the face with it. It lasts most of the day on me, but not quite as long as Santal 33. In my opinion this is the perfect unisex perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: ❤️ this. Smells a bit like pencil shavings and/or wooden hamster bedding. I know that sounds gross but idc. It’s lovely.

reviews.review_title: Watered down version of the rollerball edp?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so confused. I first smelled this in the rollerball version, and it was so lovely that I could not stop sniffing the test strip the SA in store gave me. I then purchased the full size bottle and just opened it to put it away, but the scent is very watery and the sillage is not nearly as strong as the rollerball. Why is this? Also, for those who believe this smells like Le Labo you are correct, but the rollerball is more nuanced then Santal 33. It also has the feel of Diptyque's Philosykos but w/out the fig note. It is a creamy soft fragrance that smells cozy but also clean and fresh, which is a combination that is very hard to pull off. The full size is like they took the rollerball and watered it down, and does not come close to having the pitch and throw of the rollerball.

reviews.review_title: echoing other reviews - smell doesn't last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I read the reviews that the smell doesn't last but bought anyway... smell doesn't last (not even really for an hour in my experience) which is sad because the smell is really unique and lovely.. not worth the price in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have both - No. 4 and Santal 33. I actually prefer this one! I think it is much more subtle in a perfect way. I knew this was my signature scent the first time I smelled it. I am a perfume junky....I've tried every perfume at every price point, and this is it! love it!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent !! It’s sexy and musky. And it stays really well on me. If you are familiar with the “santal” essential oil scent which is a knock off of a Le Labo fragrance - I’m going blank on the name - it smells just like that!! LOVEE!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing this for a week and I LOOOOVE! I know this is going to sound wild, but to me this smells like woody vanilla, powdery gardenia, and honeysuckle. There's zero floral in this so I'm not sure why I smell that, but here we are. I felt like this had impressive sillage and longevity when I first started wearing it but now I don't perceive it. It's possible I've just gotten use to it and am no longer sensitive to the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased  based on reviews.  A very unique scent with first spray vetiver being dominant,  followed by a creamy but  not overly woodsy scent.  On me, this lasted all day and scent only got better with time. Kept smelling myself  and I felt calm and confident in it. Some of my friends didn't care for it, but I dont think they appreciated the notes. I  love it and that is what matters.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To me, this smells like sweet tea with a touch of fresh laundry. When I was little I bought a bath set for my mom and the scent was iced tea. I was obessed with it! This reminds me of that but a more upscale/grown woman/not from the grocery store version. I'm sensative to smells so don't enjoy anything strong or overly lingering. Like musks. I never buy body sprays because they're typically too artificial everything. NO THANKS Victoria. A scent should meld with your skin and this does that. It also means I can bathe in it without it becoming over powering because it chills right down and becomes one with your essence. But that doesn't mean it doesn't last. I can still catch a hint of it on my wrist the next day. Anyone complaining about this disappearing on their skin is likely becoming nose blind to it (yes that's a thing). If you enjoy smelling yourself no matter where you are, this won't be for you. One cigarette and you'll have to reapply. liberally. Over all (on me) it is light, slightly sweet, warm, and fresh without becoming too powdery. I do get a hint of powder, but it's faint. I don't read this as floral or fruity at all. Like I said, sweet tea and clean laundry. For reference my favs are Burberry Brit Sheer for her in spring/summer, by rosie jane Angie for summer floral, by rosie jane Leila Lou for autumnal fruit, Replica By The Fireplace in fall/winter, and L'Occitane Neroli & Orchidee for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a scent that isn’t too masculine, isn’t too feminine. I found the PERFECT one with this. It’s warm but sweet but spicy - very earthy and lots of vetiver coming through. My favorite. I feel like I’m in a forest when I spray it :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is fabulous!!! I bought the candle and rollerball in No 4. My husband had a fit it smelled so good!!! He never notices anything. Today I visited the web site and bought candles (20) and body oil!! It lasts a long time and it’s a very original beautiful smell

reviews.review_title: scent doesn’t last as long as i’d hoped
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i bought it as a dupe for santal 33, and it smells pretty similar, but it doesn’t last very long on me. it’s a nice, light scent, but i can tell i’m gonna use up the bottle pretty quickly.

reviews.review_title: IF YOU LOVE SANTAL 33 BUT NOT THE PRICE....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: santal 33 is my scent. before it was huge, but this smells so so similar, only slightly more feminine. it lasts pretty long too. i sprayed it when i got it, and the next morning i could still smell the lingering. i love it, it may have replaced my holy grail. if you love le labo santal 33 but sometimes it smells like a 'pickle' this is for you!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! I searched years for my scent, and this is it! I have the oil, perfume and candle. Other reviews are right, the actual perfume doesn't last too long, but I find if I do a small amount of oil in the places I spray, it sticks longer. Recently I've been using one spray of Santal 33 to about two sprays of Balincourt--it softens the Santal 33, while making everything last longer. I've gotten so many compliments. It's such a lovely woodsy, soft, refined scent and is slightly androgynous. Perfect for this hippie lady.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, i haven’t had anything similar to it. It’s extremely long lasting and a small amount goes a long way. The size of the container suits me better because it is small and it takes me awhile to use a whole bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as I loved the Book by Commodity, and this one is very similar but almost a little softer. It’s absolutely gorgeous!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great dupe for Le Labo's Santal 33. Smells almost identical, my husband didn't even notice it was a different perfume. A great substitute if you don't want to break the bank. I only knock off a star because the smell doesn't really last very long. I have to re-apply every 3 hours or so, when Santal 33 usually lasts all day (even night).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A natural, unique scent- a little goes a long way; stays longer than other clean parfums I have tried

reviews.review_title: Loved at store, hated at home
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It isn't the worst scent in the world but was too heavy of a scent for me.  I think it smelled too woodsy.  Loved it at the store, hated it when I got home.  I really would not recommend.

reviews.review_title: Love but scent doesn’t last long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent similar to LeLabo Santal 33. No as woody more fresh. A lot more affordable than santal 33. The only complaint i have is that the scent doesn’t last long at. I’ve done several spray and it only lasts about 2-3 hours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite scent!!! I have been searching and searching and each time I think I find something I like, it ends up smelling terrible on me. Try it for your self— this doesn’t smell remotely of pickles or dill on me like many reviews here are saying lol. This smells incredible on me— it is very beautiful and delicate, and smells mostly of sandalwood cedarwood and Amber, and has a freshness from the vetiver notes. My new favorite and go-to. I like that it apparently smells very different on other people so it feels like a very personal fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the way this perfume smelled in store and for the first few months after I purchased it, but after a few months it started to get a very funky smell. I thought maybe I got a bad batch, but since it was after the 60 day return/refund window I could not get a replacement and I did not want to waste another $80 on a new bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fragrance. It can be on the stronger side so I wouldn't overdo it with the application. It smells similar to Santal 33 by Le Labo, but not as spicy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is very subtle. I find it uplifting and earthy. Very nice. You will be very happy with this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I returned this so perhaps I should not write a review but this was a completely different note when I tried it on spicy almost carnation like and then later it became heavily cedar and something woodsy.I gave it 4 stars but it was not a good experience.I have problems with commercial scents I am very allergic to manufactured fragrances for e Downy is the worst thing I can smell.I thought this would work but the scent it became was slightly sickening for me . Green and clean is great but you have to be careful.I know i don't like vetiver or lemongrass or bergamot and neroli waterlily is also on the list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unique and distinct. I am in love with this fragrance. It’s not overtly feminine but it’s insanely fresh. Love. Love. Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This one is on top of my list.  Love the smell, very unique.  One down side is it wears off very quickly.  Wish the smell would stay on longer. Thats why i give four stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging. I am more of a floral person but this give me a fresh, musky sense, and something new to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells terrible. It basically smells like dried orange peels and is extremely strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: returned, it was stinky and unappealing. super disappointed

reviews.review_title: All I can smell is dill
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like dill to me. I don't see any other reviews saying this, so maybe it's just me? All I can smell is dill. Which I love on my perogies but not as my personal scent.

reviews.review_title: It’s good if you want to smell like old pickles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a sample.. The scent lasts, but it’s horrible.. Smells like stale pickle juice..

reviews.review_title: Spoiler- Don't read if you love this perfume!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the earthy yet floral smell this perfume has! Unfortunately I noticed a hint of dill so now my husband calls it Pickle perfume. Once you smell it, you can't un-smell it. Regardless, I still think it's a very unique, enticing scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful scent. Woodsy and feminine. Disappointed my local Sephora stopped carrying this line in store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wow. i love this so much. this was my first time buying perfume online without trying first. it’s honestly a dupe for santal 33, but i like this way better. it’s a bit more sweet and subtle. everyone says i smell great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am sensitive to fragrances so have been looking for clean fragrances.  I tested this tonight and started having a headache almost immediately which lasted for >4 hours after.  I did not even test it on my neck.  It was on my wrist.  I was so upset that something is supposed to be clean could cause this problem with me.  I washed it as soon as it got home but the smell still lingered.  My search continued now.

reviews.review_title: Disappointed with this even love the sample size
reviews.review_text: I received a sample from my friend and i was totally falling in love with this smell. But when i asked her purchase for full size 50ml, it doesn't smell same with the sample one, feel like lack of something. The sample can last for 2 days but this full size just last for 4 hours??!!?? I'm so disappointed about you guys. Plz don't trick like that. It's so funny. What kind of a professional business like that?? Rate 5 stars and my purpose is buyer should read this before purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing but it's unfortunately it does not last on the body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Soooo good! Everyone who smells it on me ends up purchasing it. My husband also wears it. Reminds us of our favorite hotel- 1 hotel south beach. A mix of nature and spice and ocean scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. It is now my new everyday go to. I had never tried this brand and I’m excited to try other fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent! It certainly lasts all day but does not overpower. Because scents are unique to each, I will highly recommend this perfume because of its packaging and wear time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One od the best woody peppery unisex perfume that I smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell of this perfume! It’s a more affordable version of the one I want ( Le labo Santal33), smells totally similar but I gave 4 stars just bc I feel it doesn’t last that long on me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good! I have the spray as well as the oil. The spray gives off more of a scent (probably from your clothes) while the oils fragrance lasts longer. Will rebuy this again and again. My boyfriend wears it too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the things I love about this perfume is how everyone smells something slightly different. To my nose there's a strong violet leaf note, but some only smell the wood notes. It's incredibly unique and feminine in an earthy, masculine sort of way. Unfortunately it doesn't last forever- expect to reapply after 4 hours. But to me the scent is well worth it. Beautiful packaging as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous scent!  I received an unexpected sample that turned out to be a wonderful surprise.  As others have mentioned it's woodsy and floral without being masculine or too overpowering; I don't have anything like it and my perfume collection is extensive.  I've worn it two days in a row and find that it's lasted much longer than my typical signature scents. I'll be purchasing the full size as soon as it's back in stock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the sense. It’s refreshing and last enough to feel comfortable all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was a bit bummed when the perfume sample I chose did not come. Instead, I received a sample of this. One spray into the air and all my feelings of disappointment quickly turned into a grateful surprise! My next move was to my laptop to place an order for a proper bottle of this exquisite perfume. True story.

reviews.review_title: I cried when I smelled this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have NEVER left a review for any product, and I’ve been shopping at Sephora (too much) for years now. I am absolutely obsessed with this scent. I saw this understated bottle on a small shelf in store, whilst sampling random fragrances. When I smelled this, I cried. I wish I was joking. Never have I ever been so comforted by a perfume before. I immediately felt like I was being held and coddled next to a fire in the middle of the woods...it’s sexy, it’s warm, and it’s delectable. Before this I wore Replica’s Dancing on the Moon, and genuinely thought I’d never find a fragrance I liked as much. I am so glad that I was wrong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love! This is so good. I can see it being worn all seasons. Just lovely and unique!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product. I initially had the sample, almost as an afterthought as I’m pretty happy with the perfumes I use. The sample left me stunned because it was such an amazing, clean and unique smell. After using the sample for several weeks I purchased the large perfume. It lasts all day and I get so many compliments. It’s one of those rare perfumes that I can smell on myself, throughout the day and it gives me the best feeling. It’s rare for me to get this excited about a perfume but it’s honestly that beautiful. I haven’t tried the oil, but will consider it down the road. It’s a decent price too, considering my “regular” perfume is 120.00. Overall, I’m extremely happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is intoxicating. I'm not one for flowers, sweetness, or fruits on my perfumes. This is totally me in scent form. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected! Honestly, I wasn't sure about this at first. I think this smells better as the day goes on, even though other reviews say it wears off too soon. I love getting a whiff of this on my sweater during the day. Also nice when you give a friend a hug and they tell you how nice you smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this scent as a sample and a am so thankful I didn’t actual purchase this. I can see this as a soap or candle maybe but I would not wear this as a perfume and I love all things Sandalwood. This smells like the inside of the cedar chest my mother gave me, and I would not wear that as a scent. Again it’s comforting as a candle or soap but personally I would not wear this as a perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is incredible but does not last long whatsoever. I really wish this would stay on your skin but after I spray it on myself, the fragrance disappears nearly immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! My new favorite. I usually alternate between several Jo Malone perfumes for winter and then use Martin Margiela’s Beach Walk in the summer. With this fragrance I believe you could use it year round! It’s sexy, woodsy, yet light and leaves you smelling so fresh yet delectable. I’ve had so many compliments! Not heavy at all but it does last. I usually use three spritzes and that’s enough to get me through the day. I also bought the oil for my handbag for a touch up at night - it’s amazing too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I want to say that at first sniff I was not impressed. But then...I became obsessed and I need to be wearing it every minute. I got a sample when purchasing some foundation and drowned myself it in one day. That first day I was like “ehhh” the next day I was cleaning up and smelled it on my cardigan. Such a beautiful smell that lasts days on your clothes. It’s light earthy and pretty. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not in the majority here but I will be honest, this No.04 Bois de Balincourt perfume is disastrously nefarious. I cannot detect any sandalwood, Amber or spice at all in this scent. Just vétiver and something else that just makes me smell like an ooooooold lady. I truly was hoping for something spicy, sultry and evocative but this just smells like wet socks that have marinated in pickle juice!!! So gross!!! Unfortunately, projection, sillage and longevity are quite strong so I am trying to not gag...but I had to see what all the rave was about... I also very much disliked No.05 Kandili, but at least, I tried it on and let it stay for several hours... They are both going back. If you want something spicy, woody and Smokey, try Vanilla Woods by the 7 Virtues. Now that is a wonderful scent made by a wonderful company!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting. Unique scent. I absolutely loved it!  I wish it came in a bigger size!

Loved it in store, so I purchased.  Unfortunately, that sandalwood scent I was hoping for smelled a bit rancid.  I am lening a bit more towards Phlur Sandara.  If you're looking for a lighter version of sandal 33, Sandara is a better replica. If you'd like to add a touch of violet to that scent to lighten the scent, add a touch of Sunny Side Up by Juliette has a gun.  I absolutely love the mix!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my top favorites of all time. I got this as a sample in one of my orders and decided to try it's staying power. It lasted all day and that was very impressive. I knew I had to buy the full size (which I did and I also bought the oil) before they sold out. I'm so happy I bought it, I get a lot of compliments when I wear it. My sister loved the scent so much that she also bought it for herself. The scent is fresh and woody at the same time. Nothing too overpowering, soft, yet sexy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a huge perfume person, but I am in LOVE with this scent. I was at the bar with a couple of my friends and noticed that they smelled really really good. I basically rushed to the store to buy this perfume. To me, the smell is irresistible - my lizard brain wants me to continue smelling it and never stop. It's earthy, but not manly. It's complex, but you can still pick out some of the individual scents. I find it strong when I put it on, but it fades throughout the day to a nice mellow scent that is still just as nice as when you first put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: SMELL BOUND - SPELLBOUND !  I found my new signature sent. Please don’t change a thing. This is just right & don’t listen to anyone it last.  Spray it on you neck near the back of the ear and hairline.  2 sprays one on each side that all it takes last all day.  SO MANY COMPLIMENTS.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent as an alternative to Santal 33 but the scent doesn't even last 5 minutes. I'm going to try the oil and see if that smells stronger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this scent, I like to find scents that are more unique and this is perfect. It has good depth to it, the sandalwood is strong but is supported so well by the warm spice notes. I tried le labo Santal and I preferred this one. I get told all the time I smell amazing and all the girls ask me what I’m wearing. I wear this everyday and switch to a tobacco and vanilla by Tom for for special occasions out.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful and natural scent, lingers well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure why a lot of people are saying the scent doesn't last. It lasted all day for me both on skin and on clothes. My friend even smelled it after a hot yoga session. This is definitely a dupe for Le Labo Santal 33. My body naturally turns things a little sweeter so if yours does as well, after an hour or so this scent on my skin has the slightest warm vanilla musk layered into the woodsy scent. It's very clean and natural, doesn't smell artificial or give you a headache, and reminds me of nature and winter. If you like mixing perfumes, this goes well with the Atelier Cologne Vanilla Insensée. Those two together have become my signature scent. Overall, this is a great choice for those who like the earthy and woodsy smell without it being too overpowering or masculine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample spray of this in my last Sephora order. I had not sampled any of this brand's fragrances before, but this was such a happy surprise! If you like woody fragrances, this one is definitely a holy grail. The sandalwood is front and center, closely followed by the amber wood. The spicy notes are subtle but detectable. I love the inclusion of vetiver in this and that it is used sparingly, because it can be overwhelming if not balanced. I know some people are unhappy with the staying power, but it actually lasted pretty well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While I love the smell of No.4, the spray does not seem to be as strong as the oil nor does it last. I feel like I keep spraying and spraying myself but I still don't smell it! Very disappointed since it was very expensive and seems to just be watered down version of the less expensive oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: My son just purchased it in oil, since came from Sephora I thought this was my, it is the most amazing smell of woodies and musk, Earthy smell. I’m ordering the perfume and candle as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Scent is Amazing- but performance is weak. Doesn’t last after you spray.  The oil is better .....but agree with other reviewers that you need to be very close to smell it.
Smells great, a softer Santal 33. However, performance is abysmal get the perfume  oil instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Someone asked about the perfume vs oil...I have only bought the oil but had the perfume as a spray sample. The oil lasts forever (at least 24 hours) BUT has virtually no projection (is this called sillage?) So it's terrific for smelling your wrists but unless someone is cuddled close, it's not perceptible. I'm going to try the perfume. I can't recall how long the perfume lasted, unfortunately. But the fragrance is fantastic: somehow woody and light at the same time, while also green.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this brand - hands down my favorite perfume. It's sultry, earthy, woody, but not too heavy. I can't praise it enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Light, airy, fragrant without being too sweet. Great staying power for such a subtle perfume. LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just received a sample of this.  I am blown away by how beautiful it is.  I want to bathe in it.  Now the question is do I order the spray or the oil?  Can anyone comment on both?  Do they smell any different?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my god.  I got this as a sample and it is everything I’ve been looking for in a new perfume.  It’s not exactly floral, fresh or woody, but kind of all three at once.  I don’t know where you can smell this in person, but find out how to and do it!  I will be buying the full size ASAP.
